story:
I’m Don Bacon – inventor of the Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboard.

The objective here is to really make learning how to play the guitar not only painless, but dramatically easier than it traditionally has been.

How the Idea Came to Be

When I first attempted to learn to play guitar, I wasn’t successful.  It was a frustrating experience and I was very disappointed – I was sure I was going to become at least a decent casual guitar player.

Before I retired, my occupation took me into many private homes.  And a surprising number of times I’d spot a guitar in those homes, sitting on a guitar stand in front of a fireplace or leaning in a corner, and I’d say, “Oh…do you play?”  Well it turned out there weren’t many guitar players in those homes.  The answers I’d get were, “Oh…I used to” or, “I fool around a little” or, “no, not really.”  Being a failed guitar player myself I’d pursue those conversations and invariably I’d find I was talking to folks pretty much like myself.  They’d really wanted to play the guitar but they’d become frustrated and disappointed and ended up setting their guitars aside.  But they hadn’t gotten rid of their guitars because they still wanted to play guitar.  And I learned that the reasons they had become discouraged from continuing to try learning guitar were exactly the same reasons I’d given up in my efforts. 

1.Their fingers very quickly became sore after very little practice.

2.They found it quite difficult to properly form the various chords you have to learn when first taking up the guitar.

So two thoughts came to mind:

1.There are a lot of disappointed “would be” guitar players out there.

2.There must be an easier way.

Well, I was right about the first thought…but I was wrong about the second thought – there was no “easier” way – I learned that by scouring the internet and visiting music stores.  Now my third thought was, “Well, there ought to be an easier way,” which brings me to the Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboard.

The Issue of Sore Fingers

If you press your soft little finger tips repeatedly down on hard, narrow steel stings – they’re going to become sore – there’s no way around it.  The only existing advice from guitar instructors is, “Well you just have to play through the pain long enough to develop callouses on your fingertips” – and of course, that’s true.  But number one, I don’t want to “play through the pain” and number two, if you start to learn guitar and then stop playing for a little while, the callouses go away.  Then when you pick up the guitar again you have to “play through the pain” all over again.  I didn’t want to play the guitar so relentlessly that the callouses would never go away – I wanted to play when the mood struck me and in a sort of casual manner.

The Finger Friendly solution was to eliminate the necessity of those soft finger tips having to press down on those hard, narrow strings by creating a keyboard (not unlike a computer keyboard) so the player can press down on the key in order to play the string.  Your fingers simply don’t get sore any more – no matter how long you play or how infrequently you play.

This Challenge of Playing Chords

Well, the strings are too darn close together, even for average sized fingers like mine and for people with thick fingers, forget about it!  To add to the problem of playing clean chords, no matter how large the area above the fret is, the string has to be depressed rather close to the fret in order to produce the proper sound.  If you push the string down too far away from the fret you get a bad result – a buzzing.  Half of the area above the fret turns out to be “wasted” space – it isn’t really “useable.”  So now the effective playing area for the string are really close together.

So this is how Finger Friendly Guitar Keyboard eliminates the problem of those strings being too darn close together:  We take our keys, which eliminate your sore finger problem, and position them in such a way as to take advantage of all that “wasted” space above the fret.  We “stack” the keys which play the strings.  The keys which play the one, three and five strings take up that heretofore “wasted” space so that the keys give your fingers a very large target area to play the string.  But the tip of the key (which makes contact with the strings) is very small and depresses the string close enough to the fret to produce a clean sounding note or chord.  The keys which play the two, four and six strings give you that same very large target while those smaller tips depress the strings exactly at the fret.  Once again – good, clean sounding notes and chords.

And see what it enables you to do; you can play the one and three strings with only one finger – something you cannot do when playing guitar without a finger friendly keyboard; even the one, three, and five stings – only one finger.  And, of course, the same concept holds true for the two and four strings and even the two, four and six strings.  You have a very large target to play each string and you can’t touch a string you don’t intend to touch – perfect, painless chords every time.

And finally, thumb levers.  Most folks can’t play the strings of a guitar with their thumbs.  Now some very accomplished guitar players can manage to play the sixth string by wrapping their thumb around the guitar neck – but for the average Joe it just isn’t going to happen – unless…you’ve got a Finger Friendly Keyboard attached to the neck of your guitar!  The thumb levers allows you to play the sixth string and even the fifth string with the thumb; in fact you can even play them both at the same time using your thumb.

How It Works

The keyboard quickly and easily attaches to any standard six string acoustic or electric guitar.  Two patches of easily removable Velcro placed on the back of the neck of your guitar, and it straps firmly into place, ready to play, with absolutely no harm to your guitar.  If you’ve got more than one guitar just transfer the keyboard – easy as pie.  And, of course, you can tune your guitar with the keyboard attached.

The Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboard is the one and only invitation for everybody to join the guitar playing party.  Now it’s not likely to turn you into the next Eric Clapton, but most of us simply want to play a nice, decent sounding guitar.  So when we’re sitting around on a Sunday morning playing our guitars they’ll be a chance that that significant other in our lives will walk by and say, “Geez honey, that sounds nice!”

What We Need

The Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboards you’ve seen in this video are 3D printer created prototypes.  In order to mass produce the parts which make up the keyboard it requires injection molds – a lot of them – a very expensive proposition.  If Indiegogo will help put the Finger Friendly Guitar Company keyboard in the marketplace I’d love to send you one at a delightful discount or even one free of charge.

Thanks for watching my video.  I love this invention – and I think you will too!

Risks and challenges

Risks:

All but one risk has been eliminated. A problem was identified, a solution was created, a patent was awarded. The final unanswered question is, "Am I correct in assuming that a significant number of other folks will see the keyboard as an appealing solution to learning guitar?" If I'm right, happy days! If I'm wrong, I'll make enough keyboards to thank my Indiegogo supporters and then wander on down to the Nice Try Saloon.

Challenges:

Finding an injection molding manufacturer willing and able to take on this project - very tight tolerances! Went through five "we'll pass" vendors before hitting pay dirt.

We haven't yet personally mastered the art of injection molding so the tricky (and costly) part of creating the keyboard is in the hands of others. Fortunately the plastics manufacturer we've chosen to work with has proven their expertise and reliability by delivering the main structure plates (to which all other parts are affixed) precisely formed and right on schedule. That leaves assembly, packaging and shipping in our own hands - which makes us feel pretty well in control of keeping our rewards promise.

no “easier” way – I learned that by scouring the internet and visiting music stores.  Now my third thought was, “Well, there ought to be an easier way,” which brings me to the Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboard.The Issue of Sore FingersIf you press your soft little finger tips repeatedly down on hard, narrow steel stings – they’re going to become sore – there’s no way around it.  The only existing advice from guitar instructors is, “Well you just have to play through the pain long enough to develop callouses on your fingertips” – and of course, that’s true.  But number one, I don’t want to “play through the pain” and number two, if you start to learn guitar and then stop playing for a little while, the callouses go away.  Then when you pick up the guitar again you have to “play through the pain” all over again.  I didn’t want to play the guitar so relentlessly that the callouses would never go away – I wanted to play when the mood struck me and in a sort of casual manner.

The Finger Friendly solution was to eliminate the necessity of those soft finger tips having to press down on those hard, narrow strings by creating a keyboard (not unlike a computer keyboard) so the player can press down on the key in order to play the string.  Your fingers simply don’t get sore any more – no matter how long you play or how infrequently you play.
This Challenge of Playing Chords
Well, the strings are too darn close together, even for average sized fingers like mine and for people with thick fingers, forget about it!  To add to the problem of playing clean chords, no matter how large the area above the fret is, the string has to be depressed rather close to the fret in order to produce the proper sound.  If you push the string down too far away from the fret you get a bad result – a buzzing.  Half of the area above the fret turns out to be “wasted” space – it isn’t really “useable.”  So now the effective playing area for the string are really close together.


So this is how Finger Friendly Guitar Keyboard eliminates the problem of those strings being too darn close together:  We take our keys, which eliminate your sore finger problem, and position them in such a way as to take advantage of all that “wasted” space above the fret.  We “stack” the keys which play the strings.  The keys which play the one, three and five strings take up that heretofore “wasted” space so that the keys give your fingers a very large target area to play the string.  But the tip of the key (which makes contact with the strings) is very small and depresses the string close enough to the fret to produce a clean sounding note or chord.  The keys which play the two, four and six strings give you that same very large target while those smaller tips depress the strings exactly at the fret.  Once again – good, clean sounding notes and chords.


And see what it enables you to do; you can play the one and three strings with only one finger – something you cannot do when playing guitar without a finger friendly keyboard; even the one, three, and five stings – only one finger.  And, of course, the same concept holds true for the two and four strings and even the two, four and six strings.  You have a very large target to play each string and you can’t touch a string you don’t intend to touch – perfect, painless chords every time.


And finally, thumb levers.  Most folks can’t play the strings of a guitar with their thumbs.  Now some very accomplished guitar players can manage to play the sixth string by wrapping their thumb around the guitar neck – but for the average Joe it just isn’t going to happen – unless…you’ve got a Finger Friendly Keyboard attached to the neck of your guitar!  The thumb levers allows you to play the sixth string and even the fifth string with the thumb; in fact you can even play them both at the same time using your thumb.
How It Works
The keyboard quickly and easily attaches to any standard six string acoustic or electric guitar.  Two patches of easily removable Velcro placed on the back of the neck of your guitar, and it straps firmly into place, ready to play, with absolutely no harm to your guitar.  If you’ve got more than one guitar just transfer the keyboard – easy as pie.  And, of course, you can tune your guitar with the keyboard attached.
The Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboard is the one and only invitation for everybody to join the guitar playing party.  Now it’s not likely to turn you into the next Eric Clapton, but most of us simply want to play a nice, decent sounding guitar.  So when we’re sitting around on a Sunday morning playing our guitars they’ll be a chance that that significant other in our lives will walk by and say, “Geez honey, that sounds nice!”
What We Need


The Finger Friendly Guitar Company Keyboards you’ve seen in this video are 3D printer created prototypes.  In order to mass produce the parts which make up the keyboard it requires injection molds – a lot of them – a very expensive proposition.  If Indiegogo will help put the Finger Friendly Guitar Company keyboard in the marketplace I’d love to send you one at a delightful discount or even one free of charge.


Thanks for watching my video.  I love this invention – and I think you will too!
Risks and challengesRisks:All but one risk has been eliminated. A problem was identified, a solution was created, a patent was awarded. The final unanswered question is, "Am I correct in assuming that a significant number of other folks will see the keyboard as an appealing solution to learning guitar?" If I'm right, happy days! If I'm wrong, I'll make enough keyboards to thank my Indiegogo supporters and then wander on down to the Nice Try Saloon.Challenges:Finding an injection molding manufacturer willing and able to take on this project - very tight tolerances! Went through five "we'll pass" vendors before hitting pay dirt.We haven't yet personally mastered the art of injection molding so the tricky (and costly) part of creating the keyboard is in the hands of others. Fortunately the plastics manufacturer we've chosen to work with has proven their expertise and reliability by delivering the main structure plates (to which all other parts are affixed) precisely formed and right on schedule. That leaves assembly, packaging and shipping in our own hands - which makes us feel pretty well in control of keeping our rewards promise.

story:
Who are you, guys? And what are you about?

Hey there, we're Radio Plush band, based in Kyiv, Ukraine.

Inspired by the diverse music and a firm dream to rock the stages around the world, we have arranged our garage studio and started to play. That is the place, where our first EP and singles were created and recorded and also the shelter, where our dreams have been started to turn into action.

Currently, we are determined to record our first full-scale album on the professional studio and finally hit the road.  How can we do that? With your help only.  And by "we", we mean Radio Plush's every contributor and person, who supports us, rock music overall and all good content spreading throughout the internet nowadays.

What's your mission?

To create a valuable and ass-moving music, which is widely heard around the world, as well as the high-quality product, which we will all be proud of; to free everybody's hidden desire to have fun, to reach your minds and souls (we know, it sounds so pathetic, but we really want to do that:)) on the gigs and to be happy!

So, we've just concluded, it is happiness that lies beyond our campaign essentials  :)

Let's be honest, we are all lack of it from time to time nowadays, so why not to donate some money in its favor and come closer to such :)

Ok, guys, so what do you need?

In order to record a professionally mastered album and videos, we need to raise $7500:

  1. $3500 of which will be allocated for the recording itself.

  2. $1500 for hiring the production professionals and, in turn, shooting  two video of a high-quality.

  3. $2000 for the album promotion purposes, as well as for arranging the band tour.

If I decide to donate, what will I get in return then?

Not only is it our deepest respect and appreciations, of course :)

We're pleased to offer you the interesting stuff.

Here is our part of the deal:

  • For $15 donation you will get a downloading link for the released album in mp3.
  • For $25 donation you will get a downloading link for WAVs + mp3, ten days before the album is released.
  • For $40 donation you will get a CD + branded T-shirt + downloading link for the released album in mp3.
  • For $150 you will get a 1-hour Skype lesson from the chosen member of the Radio Plush band.
  • For $150 you can get a personal skype gig broadcasted from our garage studio.
  • For $250 you can play your favorite song with the Radio Plush on our gig during the tour.
  • The $500 donation? Wow! You are in the sponsor list, which will be indicated in the video clip, our social networks, and album + CD, branded T-shirt and downloading link + personal gig via Skype.
  • For $1500 you will get a personal skype gig + vinyl, CD, branded T-shirt and downloading link + a year subscription to all our gigs + guitar with the Radio Plush signatures.
  • The $3000 donation? Really? Wow, our hearts just started to beat faster! Radio Plush will write and record a personal song for you + all the pack mentioned here :)

Sounds good! Just in case. What does distinguish you from other bands, that create music in garages and dream of a successful path of rock stars?

Possibly, we may be just as talented as many other unknown rock bands around the world. However, it's definitely our passion as well as persistence, and stubbornness, that drives us to dream and work harder so that to reach the sky. That's why we constantly give another try of breaking a wall with our foreheads. Ouch, one more time? Sure! That's a rock'n'roll and it's worth it, cause we love it! :)

One more question. What's next, once you achieve the goal?

We're about to come to your town or city and wrap you with the inspirational fibers of rock music; to find our soulmates in every town and city; to play with the prominent rock bands on the same stage around the world. It is the huge space for unbelievable achievements. And you may attain them with us.

P.S.

Guys, we highly appreciate each and every your donation, which is a big step for our success in a long-term run.

In case you are out of money right now, that's ok. Cheer up, cause you can easily become a valuable part of our band in another way:

  • share our music and this campaign with your friends and other people.  Indiegogo has a great tool for that :)
  • subscribe on youtube, instagram, and facebook. Leave your comments and feedback here and there, we are open to the dialogue 24/7.

Thank you for your time and support!

Peace and love!

Radio Plush

story:
I started working on my new album more than a year ago. Most of the production work has been self-financed. From these sessions I was able to produce "Ultima Escena," one of the titular songs of the album. However, self-financing the entire album is a task that would take years, if not decades. That is why I want to ask for your help.

By supporting my campaign you are helping a hard-working songwriter finally achieve her dream of releasing her second full-length album--one that I would package beautifully to reflect the songs held within, using my own art work and design. I have learned that success is when you do what you love and what you create can impact other's lives. So, I hope you will fall in love with my music and dare to join me in this fantastic journey.

What I Need & What You Get

Every song is like a baby for me and after that magical moment of initial creation, there is still a lot of behind-the-scenes work that must go into each sound and the production process can be lengthy and arduous. I am aiming to raise $10,000, and these funds would help me pay:

  1. The producer, who will help me materialize, craft, and construct the music I've created by selecting instruments that will fit the style of each song. 
  2. Musicians, each song requires at least 6 instruments per song.
  3. Recording Studio, paid by the hour.
  4. Mix and mastering, a task for a professional recording engineer, the final touch of the song.
  5. Art work, be it for posters or the cover for the CD and other promotional printed and digital material.
  6. Replication, of CDs and other physical and digital forms in order to promote the album, which include: Uploading the music online as well as on digital distribution stores like iTunes, Amazon, CD baby, and others. 
  7. Video, which will be the musical video for one of the songs on this album (if the target funding for this campaign is exceeded).

At a first glance $10,000 does not seem even enough to cover everything on this list, but this is the amount I am requesting in addition to the other self-financing forms that will go towards the album, be it from musical performances or other self-financing sources.

You can contribute in many ways and receive the following perks in return according to the level you choose:

  • Digital and physical copies of both albums
  • The actual album "Las Puertas del Corazon" in addition to the upcoming album
  • Signed posters and handwritten lyrics of one of my songs
  • A special thank you on my website and social media shout outs
  • Tickets for an upcoming show as well as the launch party for the album
  • And YOUR NAME included in the credits for the album

All donations are welcome and regardless of your budget, you´ll be sure to have access to any one of the mentioned perks.

I have chosen to make this a flexible funding campaign, which means that even if I do not reach the target funding for this campaign, all backers will receive the promised perks. However, not reaching the funding goal may affect the delivery date of the alubm and might limit the design and format of the release.

If I exceed the target, I will invest this in making the music video for one of the songs "Ultima Escena,” since it has been the most popular song up to date with my followers when it came out as an unplugged version for the Tiny Desk Concert. Check it out below:

The Impact

The music industry is in a huge state of upheaval and it is becoming increasingly difficult for independent artists to stay afloat. I, as millions of other musicians, work a full-time job to make a living, making time to breathe life into our passion on the side. When you help an artist like me, we can all be part in the promotion of this new industry model of crowdfunding/pledging--which has the potential to make every artist relevant and accessible, regardless of management, backing or corporate funding.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest hurdle with a project like this is forming a team you can trust. I have been making music since I was in my country. Being in Miami for Fifteen years allowed me to build an all-star production team, consisting of Grammy, award winning players and the most important, people who believe in my project.

This is not only a dream or a project, I can’t stop doing what I love and part of that love is people, when I see their reaction at the shows which every new song, a collection of songs written, while touring, about my world and the people around me. This is the album and these are the songs I am excited to share. To showcase my songwriting and my life in under 4 minutes.  From something that existed only in my head to your ears and hopefully hearts. I love what I do, love the people I've met, and can't wait to see what is ahead. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help by contributing, please remember:

You can still help by spreading the word about my campaign and album online and social media.

You can follow me on facebook at https://www.facebook.com/diananaranjomusic/

You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to help me get this campaign out there!

Thanks and un abrazo!

Diana.

story:
Introduction

My name is Somtow Sucharitkul, and I'm generally known as the novelist (S.P. Somtow) or as a composer of operas.  After immigrating to the US 40 years ago, I've spent the last 18 years working in Thailand and building up classical music as a cultural bridge.  Last year, I was the first Asian to be awarded the European Cultural Achievement Award for finding innovative ways of connecting east and west.

The Siam Sinfonietta

This is my personal project, working with young and brilliant musicians to fast track them towards a fully professional life as classical musicians, using a new method I've evolved for training them that involves holistically examining the culture, history, and context of music to create a deeper understanding.  The orchestra burst into prominence in its second year, when it won first prize at an internation competition in Vienna.  It's since received four more gold awards from places like Carnegie Hall and Disney Hall in Los Angeles, and performed to standing ovations in Berlin, Munich, Prague, Dresden, Abu Dhabi, and numerous other places.  The orchestra is 100% scholarship — kids are admitted by audition on the basis of talent alone.  They never have to pay anything towards tuition, tour expenses, or camps.  

The Annual Camp

Each year,  Siam Commercial Bank sponsors the location for a retreat in which the kids can spend a week tackling one of the most challenging works in the repertoire.  They join with tutors from all over the world, this year led by the amazing Hungarian violinist Vilmos Oláh.  This year's work is the iconic Mahler Six, the "Tragic Symphony" and the performance will take place on August 31st.

Funds

We're looking for emergency funds as we are still somewhat short of being able to cover all the expenses of this camp.  By helping you will have joined in a unique adventure.

story:
I'm Kaspar Bindeman, a multidisciplinary artist from Riga, Latvia, residing in Barcelona, Spain. The major part of my creative work is music, cinema and theater, as well as graphic design and multimedia art. I have graduated from percussion class and composition class (Grammy nominee composer Pēteris Vasks), later studied design and acting. Made pretty successful career in my homeland as a musician, actor and director, then decided to spread wings, moved to Barcelona and started everything from the scratch. For the last ten years I've worked on my album, gathering the musicians from every continent, including the best professionals from Latvia, such as Inga Šļubovska, the prima donna of Latvian National Opera and Ballet, the Choir of Riga Dome Cathedral and many more. The style could be described as world music, built on the foundation of funk and rock, with a very strong Spanish and Latino flavoring and a little sprinkle of electronic, psychedelic  and academic music.

Unfortunately, after such a long work, I have reached the point, when my own resources are exhausted and I need your help. This first phase requires amount of €10,000 - to finish the work, left on mixing and mastering, post production of music videos, remixes, paying the distribution and promoting company for their services and eventually launch the first two singles with the videos and remixes. If I don't reach the goal, work doesn't stop, it will just go slower and at this point every cent helps to move towards the destination.

Regarding the perks, there is a number of options, starting song or album download, signed CD, merchandise, artwork prints, live show invitations, album presentation invitations, private gigs, etc..

N.B. The current list of perks is just basics and can be updated an discussed - I'm always open to creative ideas. I can even be your travel guide in Barcelona. :)) Not to mention special thanks to everyone, regardless the amount of money donated.

Art, especially music, is my life - through it I talk about the things I care about - love, peace, humanity, brotherhood, empathy, passion, compassion... I believe, although just a little bit, with my work I could contribute to make the world a better place.

Even if you can't contribute to my project financially, I'd truly appreciate if you helped to spread the word, following me on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/KasparBindemanMusic), YouTube (http://www.youtube.com/user/KasparBindeman), Instagram (http://www.instagram.com/kasparbindeman) and Twitter (http://twitter.com/KasparBindeman)

Cordially/Cordialmente,

Kaspar Bindeman

Regarding the perks, there is a number of options, starting song or album download, signed CD, merchandise, artwork prints, live show invitations, album presentation invitations, private gigs, etc..
N.B. The current list of perks is just basics and can be updated an discussed - I'm always open to creative ideas. I can even be your travel guide in Barcelona. :)) Not to mention special thanks to everyone, regardless the amount of money donated.
Art, especially music, is my life - through it I talk about the things I care about - love, peace, humanity, brotherhood, empathy, passion, compassion... I believe, although just a little bit, with my work I could contribute to make the world a better place.
Even if you can't contribute to my project financially, I'd truly appreciate if you helped to spread the word, following me on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/KasparBindemanMusic), YouTube (http://www.youtube.com/user/KasparBindeman), Instagram (http://www.instagram.com/kasparbindeman) and Twitter (http://twitter.com/KasparBindeman)
Cordially/Cordialmente,
Kaspar Bindeman

story:
Short Summary

Hello!
My name is Vanina Vincent, I'm an independent Singer-Songwriter. After years of live concerts and events in Europe and South America, I've recorded my debut album.
Inspired by experimentation and inclusiveness, I have created a music and painting interaction project called "Enciende el Color de la Musica" thanks to which, each song will be represented by a drawing created while the artist is listening to the song. The idea is a result to my personal desire to merge my music with its visual reflection represented by the artist’s inspiration which freely creates a drawing out of a song.

“If it is true that sounds touch the soul, why should it not be the same for colours?”
 V. Kandinsky

 

What We Need & What You Get

The album has already been self-funded and recorded by Nak’s studio during July and August 2019 in Buenos Aires. It is composed of 8 songs in pop/latin folk experimental style with Italian and Spanish lyrics.
The artists for the interaction project have been chosen based an aesthetic research that comprehends different styles and techniques.
Selected artists:
Youniverce (Germany) - Ciredz (Sardinia) - Ana Jaren (Spain) - Viktorija Skafaru (Lithuania) - Maya Boll (Italy) - Alice Cappellari (Italy) - Boxi Trixi (Argentina) - Georgina Ciotti (Argentina)

In 2020, thanks to this crowdfunding, I will present the album in different European cities. They will be enriched by the visual side coming from the union of creative arts.

High quality copies of the artworks will be printed and donated to the crowdfunding sustainers or you can have your T-SHIRT or ECO BAG printed (you can choose the artist you want to have printed).

“ Lend your ears to the music, open your eyes to painting and stop thinking!
Ask yourself if this effort has allowed you to stroll inside a world unknown until now. If the answer is yes. What else do you want?” (V. Kandinskij)

 

The Impact

How many songs are created in one day worldwide?
How many of us, 7 billion people still believe in creativity?
Every new-born song tells a story…
It incorporates the moment in which it was created, its emotion and its purpose...
And, in this case, each song has its own artist who has translated it into colours based on what the melody and lyrics convey.

Thanks to this experimental fusion I reach a special listener who transforms music and recreates it with colours. After that, the album will be embellished with artistic painting.
Experimentation is at the base of every research I do.

“Art is part of our unconscious! The artist needs to express himself! And he has to do it directly! He does not have to express his taste, his own education, his intelligence, his knowledge or his abilities. In short, he does not have to express what he has acquired, but what is innate, what is instinctive[…] I do not believe that painting has to be necessarily objective. On the contrary, I strongly believe in the opposite.” (Schönberg)

 

Risks & Challenges

Creating something (a song, an album, a drawing, a tour, a campaign) involves the risk and the fascination of adventure towards the unknown.
Giving life to something previously absent means to believe in and explore its potential.
At the very least we follow an ideal of loveliness which is authentic because it is our own, and which is an alternative in a world sedated by consumerism.
We find different ways to arrive at the same destination: beauty.

The crowdfunding has been launched to raise the awarness of the meaningful contribution that indipendent artist give to the world. By this, each gift, aside of the its physicality, is a way for you to help funding this project and to give the right recognition to indipendent artists.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help financially, you can still be a big help!
Things you can do:
-    Share this campaign with your friends, talk about my music and the project
-    Share the campaign video on social media such as Facebook, Twitter e Tumbler
-    Like my Facebook page
-    Subscribe to my YouTube channel
-    Follow me on social media and help me with a like/ share/ retweet

https://www.facebook.com/VaninaVincentMusic/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP7Q0TuYJ34BPD15apSAt9g

https://www.instagram.com/vaninavincent/

http://www.vaninavincent.com

 

ALBUM TEASER (promo preview):

https://youtu.be/fw33V7Qkdpg

https://soundcloud.com/vaninavincent

 

ARTISTS INFO:

https://youniverce.com/

http://www.ciredz.com/

http://www.anajaren.com/

https://www.vskafaru.com/

https://linktr.ee/maya.boll

https://www.facebook.com/alice.cappellari14/

https://www.instagram.com/boxitrixi/

https://www.instagram.com/ciotti.georgina/

story:
Lotus and Roses

-A Fusion style of Chinese and Western music concert will be presented by local musicians with a mission to share an appreciation of chamber music performance and collaboration between Chinese instruments and Western instruments. Even though there are cultural differences between the Orient and the Occident, music is our common language and a bridge to connect the world.  We mix some different elements together and make a brand new view of music for this concert. Program will be including Chinese songs Moonlight over the Spring River; Nevus of Love; Libertango by Piazzola and more. The performance will feature Jing Lu on the Yangqin, Western-Li Summerton on piano, Damon Flick on Pipa, Quinn Liu on cello, and guest artist Yi Sheng on the Chinese Zheng.

 

About the Artists

Jing Lu, Yangqin player

Jing Lu began studying yangqin (Chinese dulcimer) at age four, when she became known as a child prodigy. She received her B.A. degree in Yangqin Performance from the top music conservatory in China, Central Conservatory of Music (CCOM) and M.F.A. in Stage Management at Columbia University. She has performed solo and chamber music concerts in many cities in China and United States include Off-Broadway production of David Henry Hwang’s Golden Child at Signature Theatre in New York; Sound of Summer Concert at Central Connecticut State University; The Bridge Chinese Dulcimer Solo Recital at Carnegie Hall. Jing Lu relocated to Portland in 2017. She is luckily on the faculty members of the Portland State University. She also professionally serving as Special Music Project Coordinator for Confucius Institute at PSU. Her projects are including music concerts, music cultural activates and International Summer Music School programs in China yearly. She performs and teaches in the region as well.

www.jingluarts.com

 

Western-Li Summerton, pianist

Western-Li Summerton is a pianist, teacher, and aspiring composer based in Portland Oregon. Born in Bellingham, Washington, he has studied with numerous pianists and pedagogues including Judith Widrig, Ralph Markham, Kenneth Broadway, Anita King, Jean-David Coen, and Hwakyu Lee, and has performed in numerous recitals, festivals, and competitions throughout the Pacific Northwest. Summerton is currently finishing his Bachelors of Music in Piano Performance at Portland State University. Additionally, he is a ballet accompanist for Oregon Ballet Theatre, Bodyvox, and NW Dance Project. 

 

Damon Flick, Pipa player and guitarist

Damon Flick is a multi-instrumentalist and composer with a passion for global music and local expression. After picking up the trumpet in 2008, Damon has been fortunate enough to share music with a variety of musicians in across two continents and one island chain. After growing up in the multi-cultural Hawaiian island of O’ahu, Damon moved to the PNW to peruse education and graduated from Portland State University with a Degree in Composition and an instrumental focus on Guitar. Through PSU he spent two summers in Beijing studying the Chinese traditional music through the Chinese Lute knows as a Pipa.  He is currently playing and teaching music in and around the beautiful Rose City. 

 

Quinn Kun Liu, Cellist

Born in Xinjiang, China, Quinn Kun Liu began her cello studies at age of eight and won her first cello competition at ten. Quinn received her Bachelor’s Degree in Cello Performance at The Shanghai Conservatory of Music in China and Master’s Degree from University of Cincinnati, College-Conservatory of Music (CCM) where she received a full scholarship. As an orchestra musician, Quinn has served as the principal cello and cellist in a variety of orchestras such as the Oregon Sinfonietta, Oregon Pro Arte Chamber Orchestra, Portland Cello Project, San Diego Symphony Orchestra, Inland Valley Symphony. Previously, she also played in Hangzhou Philharmonic Orchestra and Shanghai Philharmonic Orchestra in China. Quinn is an active chamber musician and she has been invited and performed in several music festivals in the States and Asia. Aside from music, Quinn also works as director of operations at Abroad & Future Inc. for International Education Programs.

www.quinnliumusic.com

 

About the Guest Artist

Yi Shen, Guzheng Player

Yi Shen received her B.A degree in Guzheng Performance from the Central Conservatory of Music (CCOM) in China and she was admitted to the Graduate School of the Central Conservatory of Music with the first prize, under professor Sha Yuan. Yi has performed in many Concert Halls in China including the National Grand Theatre, CCTV and Xi'an Concert Hall. She also performed at Calgary University in Canada and Columbia University in United Sates. On 2018, Yi was invited by the Confucius Institute to be a music teacher at CIPSU and offer Guzheng class.

www.youtube.com/watch?v=QP3RyrBSn9Q&feature=youtu.be

 

What You Get

Benefits of Your Support; This performance will introduce your ears to the exotic charm of the Chinese instrument Yangqin, Guzheng and allow you to better understand the musical traditions of the Eastern world. This is an opportunity to enjoy Chinese classical repertoire performed by one of the most outstanding players.

 

Our goal is to raise $650

Fees for the composer: $150

Fees for the musicians: $100x4=$400

Fees for the graphic design: $100

 

To support us with a payment through credit card or PayPal, just click on the "Contribute Now" button near the top or bottom of the page.  ANY donation amount is accepted.

 

 

 

Lotus and Roses concert

Cafeˊ Artichoke, 2001 SE Powell Blvd., Portland, OR 97202

Sunday, May 19, 2019, 7:00 p.m. to 9:00 pm. Doors open to the public at 6:30

Tickets: $15

Tickets available at  https://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/4233540

TEL: 503-232-8845

story:
HI FOLKS!

We're South African Based Rock Band - COLDFIELD

We're a NEW band in the SA music scene,BUT all our members have been around in various project,and recorded in different countries,in different genre bands - SO WE LOVE MUSIC!

We're currently in rehearsals preparing for our live gigging cycle,as well as writing tracks for our Debut EP.

As life goes,the only way in this day and age to record an  EP or Album is to either have bucket loads full of cash,a rich daddy,a drummer with a sugar mommy or a label interested in making money off of you (yeah We said it!) - So here we are!

As Music Teachers,we don't make the big bucks of let's say a fish packer in Alaska or a male stripper in an all female prison,but we work hard - But as life is expensive,it leaves little cash to inject into the band at the moment.

We've built a decent relationship with a Professional and Hard Working Producer on this side.We've also built up a relationship with a Mastering Engineer based in Alabama,so we're just pushing ahead to record more singles and compiling an E.P. or Album by end of the year latest.

WHAT DO WE NEED?

We're looking at recording a Single or 2 a month and releasing as needed,to keep the flow of material fresh and constant during our gigging.

We MAINLY need Funds for the following:

  • Recording (5 tracks Minimum)
  • Mixing
  • Mastering

We'll also use some of the Funds for the following:

  • Promo Shots (just the space,as we have a photographer on the team!)
  • Basic Merch (Get the alternative income streams up and running)
  • Distro (Itunes and other digital avenues)
  • Promo (target based ads etc.)

Why not just pay for it ourselves at the moment?

Whilst we are getting ready to break local stages,and earning fees from these performances,we really need the support of the Global Musical Community until we get on our feet.

We understand that in this day and age,nothing is for free,so have a look at some of our potential Rewards,once we get the ball rolling!

Without music,life would have no soundtrack (Deep,We Know!)

We appreciate any support you music loving folks out there can give us to push our craft and passion forward,without having to sell our kidneys!

Have a look at the potential rewards,if that warm and fuzzy feeling you get for helping us reach our goal isn't enough.

Feel free to check out our Social Media (we'll be adding more pages soon!)

http://facebook.com/coldfieldbandza

http://twitter.com/coldfieldza

Much Love

COLDFIELD

story:
In 2013 we went into the studio to record our first album, "Wicked Game". Since releasing our first full length album we have gone on to record a Christmas EP, and our very first single, both with the Royal Scottish National Orchestra, which reached number 1 in the Official UK Classical Charts on iTunes, as well as perform at numerous concerts around the world. 


We have wanted to release a follow up album for numerous years now, but this takes considerable financial backing. Whilst we can contribute a fair amount ourselves, we are going to aim to raise the remaining funds that we need in 60 days. With your help, your pre-orders for the CD will be put directly back into the project and help us to pay for things such as arrangements, musicians and studio time.  

We hope you'll be as excited about this project as we are, the chance to record and release new music would be such an amazing opportunity for us, and you'll get to be with us every step of the way, as you'll join us from the beginning of the project. 

At this point we have not started anything, as without the remaining funds this CD cannot go ahead, also please note this will only be a pre- release order. Realistically the CD could take up to a year to get right, possibly longer so you will need to be very patient with us, we will be doing everything we can to keep you as updated and involved as possible along the way.

 

Our aim is to raise £7,000. It may sound like a lot, but believe us, this amount of money has a long way to go. Costs we need to invest your pledges in are the following

Musicians, studio time, arrangements for the orchestra, mixing, mastering, production costs, the list goes on.... 

Our plan is to produce a 5 track mini album with the money raised, but for every extra £1000 raised we are able to add an extra track to the CD to hopefully produce a full 10 track album. Also wether the final CD has 5 tracks, or 10, the cost will still remain the same, so we won't be charging you any extra if we are able to produce more songs. 

We plan on releasing some limited edition perks for you so that you want to get involved. Things like being personally thanked on the album booklet for your support, having one of the album tracks dedicated personally to you (only 5 available) or coming along to the studio to watch us record the vocals. We'll also have signed photo's and CD options as well as brand new posters which will be taken from the new album shoot. Sadly if we don't reach our goal we will not be going ahead with the album so you will be refunded 100%

 

We had such an amazing response the first 2 times we used pledge music, we successfully managed to raise funds to film our album showreel and to create our Christmas EP "Stardust". Hopefully we can re create what happened with our, as of yet, untitled album. If you have any questions or concerns about anything what so ever, please do not hesitate to ask, we want to be as open and as helpful as possible so that you know exactly what will be going on. 

 

Even if you can't contribute, your support goes a long way! We'd love you to be able to share this campaign with as many music lovers as possible, or anyone you think might be interested in our music, you never know, we could gain a new follower from it!

Musicians, studio time, arrangements for the orchestra, mixing, mastering, production costs, the list goes on.... 
Our plan is to produce a 5 track mini album with the money raised, but for every extra £1000 raised we are able to add an extra track to the CD to hopefully produce a full 10 track album. Also wether the final CD has 5 tracks, or 10, the cost will still remain the same, so we won't be charging you any extra if we are able to produce more songs. We plan on releasing some limited edition perks for you so that you want to get involved. Things like being personally thanked on the album booklet for your support, having one of the album tracks dedicated personally to you (only 5 available) or coming along to the studio to watch us record the vocals. We'll also have signed photo's and CD options as well as brand new posters which will be taken from the new album shoot. Sadly if we don't reach our goal we will not be going ahead with the album so you will be refunded 100%
 
We had such an amazing response the first 2 times we used pledge music, we successfully managed to raise funds to film our album showreel and to create our Christmas EP "Stardust". Hopefully we can re create what happened with our, as of yet, untitled album. If you have any questions or concerns about anything what so ever, please do not hesitate to ask, we want to be as open and as helpful as possible so that you know exactly what will be going on. 
 
Even if you can't contribute, your support goes a long way! We'd love you to be able to share this campaign with as many music lovers as possible, or anyone you think might be interested in our music, you never know, we could gain a new follower from it!

story:
Hi everyone,
I'm an underground Singer-Songwriter artist from Montreal, Canada.
The reason why I chose to have this Fundraising is to finance my first Ep.
A small music Album in which I'll be sharing a little bit of my journey towards wellness.

In essence, my mission is to use my art to encourage love, boost self-esteem and advocate recovery.

As a Full time Jazz singer student I can't unfortunately meet all the expenses required to make the EP myself. Let me finish by saying how important this is for me since it always has been one of my biggest dreams and I’m more than determined to make it happen and to help others with my music.☺️


In hope of a positive response,please help me reach my goal

story:
Fi Station is the first music station of its kind in the world, combining professional sound recording, high fidelity audio play, and 4K HD video play. 

Thanks to being equipped with the newest Android system, all of these functions can be controlled by the FI Station’s touchscreen capabilities, and with multiple inputs for hardware use of all kinds, you’ll find that there’s little that the Fi Station can’t handle. 

Whether you want to record or play music, DJ, or play 4K HD quality video through it, the Fi Station can handle any request with ease.



These days, music products can feel more like robotic, highly technical machines that are designed for a small number of hardcore professionals. 

They’re often expensive single function products that have poor user experience, and this is something that we felt needed to be improved upon. 

Sometimes you find yourself needing to buy several products to meet your different needs – you might need a professional sound card to record, a Hi-Fi player to listen back to lossless audio, and a separate TV box to play HD videos. 

And even after you’ve bought all of these separate products, you’ll find that very few of them are compatible with each other. 

That’s why we created the Fi Station – an easy to use product that can be used in different scenarios, with high quality input and output capabilities, neatly wrapped up in a stylish design.

During the development of the Fi Station, we’ve lost many significant artists and musicians, many of whom inspired our work on the Fi Station, but thanks to the countless hours of wonderful music they left behind, their inspiration lives on. 

We can only hope that in the future, the Fi Station will be used to add on to the catalogue of wonderful music created by artists around the world.



Why do we need your help?

For over two years, we’ve dedicated all of our time and resources to developing the Fi Station. It was a long but rewarding two years, with all of the time and money resulting in a stellar product. 

Now we’ve reached the stage where we are ready for mass production, and that’s why we need your support. In order to reduce the cost of mass production, we need to make a large order of the expensive high quality components that goes into each Fi Station. 

The development of the software is already well underway, and we are ready to move forward with the Fi Station, but we need more people to get involved, and give us their feedback. 

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions by SNS or by email.

Risk Assessment

The riskiest part of a product launch like this has already been largely completed – the development of the hardware. 

We didn’t want to make any mistakes along the way, so we spent a lot of time in the preliminary development and risk evaluation stages, making the process of making the Fi Station as smooth as possible.

Now we are at the stage where we will analyze and test the coding of the software to get as many of the bugs out as early as possible, but never fear, we’re ready to speedily update the software to fix any problems our early users will meet. 

That’s why your support and feedback are vital to us, and we look forward to having you on board for the journey.

Purchase or Share

Whether you decide to purchase a Fi Station or not, we hope that you share this campaign with others. 

You may not need a product like this, but we’re sure you know someone who does! 

You can share the Fi Station to your SNS, and when the project is over, everyone who has helped us, even those who didn’t purchase a Fi Station, will receive a gift from us.

Easter Egg

Finally, as an added bonus, we will be developing a portable battery, special box, microphone, and other equipment for the Fi Station, and they will all be available for a heavily discounted rate for those who take part in this project.

FAQ:

Q: How to use the FI station?

A:

1. Standalone mode, It’s independently work on the android, also you can use any APK of android. Such as Soundcloud, Spotify, Sing!, soundhound, Netflix, youtube, HBO, and more. All of the sound through USB audio output. So you can get a very high-quality and super low-latency sound.

2. Multi-link mode, when use the Multi-Link port cuold be connected to tablet, phone, or computers , Fi station as an USB audio interface, they were remix in Fi panel, so you can use different software for each system, such as connecting to the WINDOWS desktop, you can use CUBASE, SAMPLITUDE, NUENDO, SONAR, REAPER, and other audio software, connect to the MAC OS, you can use pro tools, logic and other software, and even connect to the IOS, there’s a lot of music APP. Important that they can work with Fi sation’s software of android at the same time, A revolutionary connection lets you create better music.

Q: What is the differences between e series and p series?

A: Screen is the important difference, the screen of p series is 4:3 just like IPAD. When it connect with TV or monitor, it is inappropriate for 16:9 widescreen. The display area will be affected. E series is 16:9 widescreen, it is appropriate for display when it connect with TV or monitor. If you use it as professional sound card frequently and fewer external shows, P series will be more suitable for you. If you use HIFI music or FHD movie player more frequently, you can choose E series.

Q: What is the difference between 3.1 / 2 series,

A: P1 and E1 storage is 32G, P2 and E2 storage is 64G, two types of audio input and output indicators is different, P2 and E2 have a higher sound quality.

Q: Can Fi station support ASIO and CORE AUDIO drivers?

A: When the Fi station connected to computer, It can supports ASIO, CORE AUDIO, WDM, MME different drive.

Q. What is the Fi panel?

A: Fi panel is the Fi station control APK in android.  

You can control the all the parameters: MIC-preamp / headphone amp gain, input / output channel volume and pan, audio sample rate and delay settings through the Fi panel.

Q: Does Fi station support DSP effects?

A: Yes, all of the input and output channels can insert DSP effects like EQ, Reverb, Compressor and more.

Q: What about Fi station ports? What can be connected?

A: Two analog inputs, support MIC-preamps, 48V power, and DI channel switch.

  You can connect two dynamic or condenser microphone, electric guitar or bass and so on.

  Two analog outputs, one headphone output.

  It can be connected to active speakers, and high impedance headphones.

  Two digital inputs, two digital outputs, one MIDI input, one MIDI output.

  You can connect amplifier, digital speakers, DJ controllers, and MIDI keyboard or sound modules.

  One HDMI port.

  It can be connected to monitor, TV, projectors or other display devices with HDMI.

  Two USB2.0 ports.

  You can connect any USB devices.

  A Muitl-Link port (standard USB2.0 port)

  You can connect to computer and tablet or any other device supports USB AUDIO.

Q: What can I do with Fi station?

A: Musical recordings, vocal recording, mixer, DJ remix, Live shows, kalaok, HIFI players, FHD movie,android app, game player.

  Of course, there are more different mix of playing with other device, waiting for you to explore.

Q: How could we work on customer support and firmware updates, and after-sales support?

A: We will provide fi panel through our website, app store, and google play with software updates, Android firmware updates, and DSP effects update, you can download updates through the website, or upgrade by FI panel directly in the cloud at the future.



Connect us @
twitter

facebook 

fihifi.com

story:
In September 2017 we have released successful album "To the Northern seas" on major folk-pagan label Soundage productions. We are  proud of it! This is a first part of fantastic saga about mighty  Northern  Fellowship. Thorgard and brave warriors are bound by oath and now on a long and dangerous journey to the shores of Sleepland.

Sleepland: Path to the northern seas. Part I

This legend begins since very Ancient times when the brave sons of the North ruled this glorious land, named Sleepland. This peaceful country had been ruled by the Race of Kings till it faced a mighty power of the Woodlands’ attackers. As the Prophecy tells it was the wrath of the Ancient Gods, who had brought down the mighty fellowship and all the power warriors were expelled from their native land, and the way there became covered with a veil of mists. Nobody knew what had happened to the rulers of these lands and why the path to the Northern seas was cursed…

Years passed, and once, a descendant of the Northern kings Thorgard by name had a vision. He learned that the time to return the lost Ancient land of his Forefathers came, but a really great warrior had to be chosen to lead the ship thought the waves and mists. The warrior had to resist the impacts of disasters, had to be able to return the path to the Northern seas for fellowship and break the Gods’ curse. The Ruler had lots of brave and faithful warriors and each of them could give his life for the Northern lands, but there was no the Warrior. So the wise Thorgard once gathered his courageous and ready to sail to the Northern seas men on the seashore and told them about his vision. Thorgard looked at the fellowship and saw light brighter than the star shine in one’s eyes and heard a heartbeat through hundreds of other sounds. He found him, the Warrior. He was the one written about in the prophecy!!! He was Halmar – chosen by the Gods!!!

With the first sunshine rays the fellowship started sailing to the Northern seas. Drakkar so famous in the sea battles had been one of the courageous warriors itself now became home for the heroes. Storm-clouds were brewing and the shroud of mist covered the Drakkar. The path became harder and harder. Only the bright hymns of Scald really helped our brave sons of The Northern lands. Suddenly, the surface of the sea became waves and all the fury of the winds hit the board. So they met the great storm from prophecy and none seemed to be able to escape his inglorious death. But Halmar rose from his knees and covered all the warriors with his shield from the furious winds and waves. After the long battle with his shield in his hands he helped one sunray to break through the Grey mists and cold dark waves. The Ship passed the obstacle and before the fellowship appeared Sleepland – the forgotten land of their Forefathers. The prophecy became true, and the brave warriors went ashore in the sunset. They were met by the native lands and fjords, cold winds and songs of the sea surf. But would the paths on these lands be so glorious? And what adventures would wait for our Sons of the North in the next battle?


Our music based on own ideas and we need for some moneys for releasing of our third album! We will welcome any support of our project and just all warm words.. Hope,we can interest you. It would be cool! Its very importrant for us! 
Join the mighty Northern Fellowship and sail away  to the Northern seas together!

story:
What's wrong with labels now?

This is an easy question to answer in industry talk, but let's point some things out in simpler words:

  • Artists frequently sign 3- 5 album deals limiting control of their future from day one.
  • After signing, they're only entitled to 12% of the PROFITS from sales.
  • Musicians contractually get paid quarterly from their labels. Commonly not at all.
  • Most labels own those recordings/rights FORVER and will continue to profit off of them long after they've crashed and burned an artist's career to increase said profit. "Churn and burn"
  • Artists have a particularly high rate of mental health issues, addiction problems and homelessness inside of their community. Much of this is fueled by financial circumstance as a result of poor treatment in the industry.
  • Since they're in competition with other media companies, labels often fail to incorporate these alternate revenue streams for their artists.

 

What Are We Doing About It?

  • One album deals at a time. We'll never own an artist's future. Ever.
  • 50-50 deals on everything we'll ever touch.
  • Monthly and weekly paydays for various royalty types. Daily payouts are on the table but we'll need to kill it out of the gates to make it real;)
  • Once an artist completes their contract, they own the recordings, rights and royalties to THEIR music outright. Forever.
  • Every One Off artist will complete an online workshop focused on business education and addiction / risk awareness in our field of work.
  • Making things like, contracts, statements, and sales metrics public information.
  • Focusing on other areas of the industry our artists can create constant residual income from, and facilitating/promoting it for them as well.
  • As a stretch goal, we're launching a housing initiative to put a roof over 3-5 musicians heads for the first 6 months of our operation while giving them 24/7 access to studio time and other content based resources. We're hoping to make this a permanent One Off fixture. -However, if we don't fully fund, anything over our initial goal of $33k will be donated to a voted on cause.

 

These things are seemingly easy to understand but somehow hard to control. Ask yourself: "If I had the chance to change how some of my favorite artists and peers are treated, would I take it?" We're hoping that answer is "yes!". So, here's how we make this real;

 

What We Need

  • FUNDING! $44.5K to facilitate the creation of One Off, sign 3 acts, fulfill crowdfunding perks and open a studio space that will also house 3- 5 previously homeless musicians for the next 6 months while offering them round the clock access to studio time as well as other jumpstarting resources.
  • Exposure. We're certain that what we're aiming to offer is needed by many musicians but the uphill battle is getting word out. Tweet about us to your favorite artists, your friends, tag us in your Instagram story. You get the idea.
  • Your support for our artists, especially the first 3 that this campaign finances. The better we do, and the more artists we're able to break, the more we prove the need for ALL labels to function this way while simultaneously providing a more stable income for artists. 
  • SUBMISSIONS! We need to hear your band, project, or song. Tell a musician friend about us or submit them on our site yourself. This whole "label" thing won't work without music.

 

What You Get

  • Some amazingly exclusive perks only offered to backers ranging from custom iPhone cases, card wallets and hoodies to a daily video stream briefing invite for the first 3 months of our startup or even equal ownership in a fan ran sub label we're starting along with all of this!
  • Access to a record label and hopefully some of your favorite artists in ways that have never been offered before by any label.
  • Actual credits on records and various other press releases as an investor in a label set to achieve some actual world and industry firsts.
  • A CHECK while simultaneous improving quality of life for all our artists. Anyone who backs the fan ran label tier will get a deposit every month of their profit share! 
  • The opportunity to take part in the first music industry experiment of it's kind.

 

THE IMPACT

We're almost done with bullet points and you pretty much get the picture by now but here's what we hope to achieve by funding this project.

  • More money, more consistency, and better treatment of musicians on a contractual level.
  • PRESSURE on other labels to treat their artists right. If we fund, just by existing we up the bar of what contract signers can expect from other labels.
  • Setting true transparency as the industry standard. We want all of our contracts, negotiations, streaming metrics and royalty statements available to EVERY backer. It sounds like a lot to tackle but we've handled the logistics and can roll things like this out on day one.
  • 3-5 musicians without homes will receive housing, food, and 24/7 access to studio, streaming, and other tools necessary to start from scratch for the first 6 months of our startup. Our aim is to keep that going and provide even more help.
  • A BETTER ENVIRNMENT FOR THE NEXT GENERATION OF MUSICIANS TO CREATE IN! At the end of the day we know that if we create a safer space for these people, the music will reflect that, and that's all we truly want.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Financial help is what we need most but it's not the doorstop, and to be honest times are CRAZY. We get that. Here are some other ways to join our effort:

  • Join our email list.
  • Reach out to info@oneoffLTD.co if you know a musician who is currently housing insecure or struggling to make ends meet.
  • Link as many musician friends you have to our corner of the internet and show them what we're trying to make happen.

 

The music industry has functioned in a really broken way for a long time. Please consider backing our campaign and join the fight for better artist treatment!

 

Much Love, 

Goliath, Phil and Travis<3

 

P.S. Here's our budget breakdown, and since we'll be operating publicly with the highest degree of transparency known to any record label in 2021, all of our spending statements will be accessible 24/7.

Making things like, contracts, statements, and sales metrics public information.
Focusing on other areas of the industry our artists can create constant residual income from, and facilitating/promoting it for them as well.
As a stretch goal, we're launching a housing initiative to put a roof over 3-5 musicians heads for the first 6 months of our operation while giving them 24/7 access to studio time and other content based resources. We're hoping to make this a permanent One Off fixture. -However, if we don't fully fund, anything over our initial goal of $33k will be donated to a voted on cause.

 
These things are seemingly easy to understand but somehow hard to control. Ask yourself: "If I had the chance to change how some of my favorite artists and peers are treated, would I take it?" We're hoping that answer is "yes!". So, here's how we make this real;

 
What We Need

FUNDING! $44.5K to facilitate the creation of One Off, sign 3 acts, fulfill crowdfunding perks and open a studio space that will also house 3- 5 previously homeless musicians for the next 6 months while offering them round the clock access to studio time as well as other jumpstarting resources.
Exposure. We're certain that what we're aiming to offer is needed by many musicians but the uphill battle is getting word out. Tweet about us to your favorite artists, your friends, tag us in your Instagram story. You get the idea.
Your support for our artists, especially the first 3 that this campaign finances. The better we do, and the more artists we're able to break, the more we prove the need for ALL labels to function this way while simultaneously providing a more stable income for artists. 
SUBMISSIONS! We need to hear your band, project, or song. Tell a musician friend about us or submit them on our site yourself. This whole "label" thing won't work without music.


 
What You Get

Some amazingly exclusive perks only offered to backers ranging from custom iPhone cases, card wallets and hoodies to a daily video stream briefing invite for the first 3 months of our startup or even equal ownership in a fan ran sub label we're starting along with all of this!
Access to a record label and hopefully some of your favorite artists in ways that have never been offered before by any label.
Actual credits on records and various other press releases as an investor in a label set to achieve some actual world and industry firsts.
A CHECK while simultaneous improving quality of life for all our artists. Anyone who backs the fan ran label tier will get a deposit every month of their profit share! 
The opportunity to take part in the first music industry experiment of it's kind.

 

THE IMPACT
We're almost done with bullet points and you pretty much get the picture by now but here's what we hope to achieve by funding this project.

More money, more consistency, and better treatment of musicians on a contractual level.
PRESSURE on other labels to treat their artists right. If we fund, just by existing we up the bar of what contract signers can expect from other labels.
Setting true transparency as the industry standard. We want all of our contracts, negotiations, streaming metrics and royalty statements available to EVERY backer. It sounds like a lot to tackle but we've handled the logistics and can roll things like this out on day one.
3-5 musicians without homes will receive housing, food, and 24/7 access to studio, streaming, and other tools necessary to start from scratch for the first 6 months of our startup. Our aim is to keep that going and provide even more help.
A BETTER ENVIRNMENT FOR THE NEXT GENERATION OF MUSICIANS TO CREATE IN! At the end of the day we know that if we create a safer space for these people, the music will reflect that, and that's all we truly want.


 
Other Ways You Can Help
Financial help is what we need most but it's not the doorstop, and to be honest times are CRAZY. We get that. Here are some other ways to join our effort:

Join our email list.
Reach out to info@oneoffLTD.co if you know a musician who is currently housing insecure or struggling to make ends meet.
Link as many musician friends you have to our corner of the internet and show them what we're trying to make happen.

 The music industry has functioned in a really broken way for a long time. Please consider backing our campaign and join the fight for better artist treatment! Much Love, Goliath, Phil and Travis<3 P.S. Here's our budget breakdown, and since we'll be operating publicly with the highest degree of transparency known to any record label in 2021, all of our spending statements will be accessible 24/7.

story:
Great News! PalmBand is now your stand-alone MIDI BLE(Bluetooth Low Energy) device, which means you can seamlessly connect with the GarageBand App anywhere you want! You can switch between multiple note ranges using gestures and choose 100+ instruments at will as it’s always capable of.

 

 

Different play modes, including somatosensory guitar and drums, are waiting for you to explore. No matter if you want to edit and play a variety of instrument combinations or hold a symphony orchestra by yourself, you’re all set up! Suitable for Apple, Android, TV, desktop computers and other platforms! So now let’s jump in the music playground, perform like a real artist!

 

 

 

 

Equipped with advanced motion sensing technology, PalmBand is the most portable smart gesture-controlled musical instrument & synthesizer in the world, capable of playing up to 128 MIDI instruments and seamlessly switching between them to create your musical masterpiece. With an 8-point touchscreen & 3+ virtual note ranges, it delivers an incredibly realistic playing experience with ultra-low latency. No matter where you are, pick up PalmBand and you’re ready to learn, practice, record, and make music in an easy and fun way!

 

 

 

With up to 128 MIDI instrument presets in the app, this creative device can track your motions to create clear, distinct instrument sounds in real-time including guitar, piano, drum, & bass… and many more. Learning or making music, or simply just for fun, it’s all in a twist of the wrist!

PalmBand is a portable, lightweight and compact smart watch & instrument collection that fits right in your palm. You can wear PalmBand as a watch and when the mood strikes you, simply wear it on your palm and connect to your phone, tablet, or TV to fully immerse yourselves into the magical world of music! It’s the perfect musical gadget to take with you on the go so that you can play and create anytime inspiration strikes. And with headphones, you won’t need to worry about disturbing others either!

 

 

 

Equipped with Somatosensory Technology, PalmBand captures even the slightest movement and transforms it into clear & realistic audio in real-time. Any motion such as tapping, spinning, shaking, or swiping can be translated into beautiful musical notes. Supporting advanced playing techniques for guitar, guzheng, and more, PalmBand gives you the best and most life-like musical instrument playing experience. NOW is the time to get creative with PalmBand and jam along in your own way!

 

*The Tech Behind PalmBand

Somatosensory Technology is mainly based on MEMS (micro-electromechanical) sensors to sense the physical parameters of body movements. It integrates gyroscope (angle), accelerometer and magnetic gravity sensors, using these physical parameters to implement the basic functions of musical instrument performance (different notes, ranges and various performance techniques). At the same time, you can touch the screen with your fingers to reach the pitch of any instrument.

 

 

 

Music is Freedom. And PalmBand makes music easy and fun. In PalmBand app, we’ve developed different Play Modes & Functions that let you quickly dive into the world of creative music.

 

 

 

Regardless of your skill level, you can always have fun making music with PalmBand! With in-app tutorials, it only takes several minutes for beginners to pick up the basics and begin to create unique hits.

 

 

 

For those with more experience, PalmBand is just like musical Legos: building sounds into songs with endless possibilities. It’s easy to learn, play, and record music like a pro. In the Music Station, you can create tracks using Rock, Blues, Pop or other popular musical genres. It’s like having a music studio in the palm of your hand, ready for you to create hit songs.

 

 

 
 

If you’re in a band or music club, you should definitely try the Band Mode to perform with your team! Pick out your favorite instrument, jam with your friends and immerse yourself in a virtual live show!

 

 

 

In One Person Symphony, you don’t need to set up all the instruments to build beautiful, layered sound. Simply choose the instruments in app and spin to switch between instruments, you can play anything from Beethoven to Mozart or compose your own symphonic melody!

 

 

 

With a 120-degree customized screen angle and 3D curved screen, PalmBand is created for everyone and fits into palms of different sizes. With advanced software & hardware support, you can choose your preferred playing hand and even customize screen angle and keynotes space!

 

 

 

  •  One Person Symphony 
  •  Virtual Drum  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Qianyin Tech is an innovative high-tech enterprise dedicated to the development of intelligent musical instruments. Our team has maintained long-term scientific research and academic cooperation with music professors and many research institutes worldwide. The technical backbone of our company comes from the software team residing in Waterloo, Canada. Software and hardware-independent research and development are what we are best at.

 

The intelligent motion-sensing musical instrument series developed by our company has obtained a total of 26 patents and software copyrights, including invention and utility model patents, software copyrights, trademarks, and so on.

 

Our goal is to build a world of less depression and more happiness through music, intelligent hardware, and more. Hopefully, we can lower the threshold of music performance, enable more people to enjoy the elegant art of music, help society to improve the level of music appreciation, and provide an epochal product for music art and music education.

 

 

With years of experience in product development, our team is confident that we are prepared to successfully execute the launch of PalmBand. However, there often can be unforeseen setbacks or difficulties in the process. If any unexpected problems occur, we will keep our supporters notified and updated about the status of the project and how we are solving any issues that may arise. Thank you for your support.
