story:
Swallow the thing and then for ten hours BANG the feeling inside your stomach BANG insanity BANG joy BANG horror BANG elation BANG extasy BANG BANG pain BANG BANG BANG BANG...

This world-unique and experimental device for enjoying music from the inside is small as a pill. When swallowed it starts beating within you innards at a preset BPM. Restless feeling will pump you up to insanity. 

ABOUT VIDEO: the second part of "musical component" in this conceptual art by Jan Poope comprises of an Italian medical device Sirio (see the video above), originally designed for healing injuries with low-frequency ultrasound waves. Author noticed a peculiar side effect – whistling sounds within the patient’s head. Outside observers hear nothing, but the experimental object experiences an intensive acoustic perception. Low-frequency ultrasound waves are modulated as they travel through the body (a bit like a dental drill). Ultrasound scratching on human bodies is a brand new music genre. Sirio device is not part of the project an Indiegogo!

Audiopill (pill) will make you feel like you are standing in the middle of a concert hall with a powerful audiosystem inside your body. Or like you are standing in a factory workshop full metal working machines and ramming an impact drill into your stomach. The only diference is there’s an absolute silence all around and you are experiencing the music in perfect privacy and only from the inside. 

After swallowing, it takes the Audiopill about an hour to make it through the upper parts of gastrointestinal tract (in the first minutes you have to press your palm on your chest to feel the beats). But after it descends to the pelvic area, the effects become very intensive. You may for a while regret your experimental courage.

You are at a 10-hour party of one and only hypnotic rhythm, and there’s nowhere to escape. 


The beating within you abdomen induces a unique feeling of restlessness, amazement and elation, but if you have a shorter life than the battery inside (10 hours and can’t be switched off when swallowed!), it can pump you up to insanity. And there’s yet another effect the Audiopill provides. As it meanders through your GI tract, it can serve as a teaching aid for your own medical or even maniacal introspection.

How to use it

You can simply set up your favorite BPM. Remotely controlled magnetic reed relay is built in an encased capsule. Audiopill settings are indicated by LED control.

off, LED out
1x apply the magnet: slow 95 BPM vibrations and the LED blinks in the same rhythm. Vibrations last 3 seconds – then the Audiopill only blinks for 30 more seconds without vibrations = time for swallowing the pill (vibrations off to prevent gag reflex) after this period the Audiopill vibrates perpetually until the battery is fully discharged (or the magnet is applied again)
1x apply the magnet again: Audiopill speeds up to 130 BPM (the same procedure applies as above)
1x apply the magnet again: Audiopill speeds up to maximum 143 BPM (the same procedure applies as above)
1x apply the magnet again: Audiopill switches off completely

Features 

Weight: 8 g
Length: 35 mm
Three preset beats:
~ 95 BPM (Grinderman, No pussy blues)
~ 130 BPM (Die Antwoord, I Fink U freeky)
~ 143 BPM (M.I.A., Bad Girls).
Controls: remotely controlled by a neodymium magnet
Battery: approx. 10 hours of vibrations, Audiopill cannot be switched off when swallowed
Motor: Precision Microdrives
Senzor: Standex Meder electronic
Color Versions:
~ Clear empty space (unisex transparent)
~ Juicy juicy juicy pink (for girls)

Author

Jan Strmiska by his real name. He created the Czech edition of the tech magazine T3 (Tomorrow's Technology Today). After a few years as the editor-in-chief, he left for the men’s magazine Maxim where he worked as Fashion Dictator for more than ten years. 

The last year he’s been working on a project of prolapsed buttocks (Prolapse of Love project - picture above), spent some time surfing, developing the Audiopill, breaking his ribs while driving his Kawasaki and learning massage techniques to better understand the human body.
He also remembered the legacy of his father, a food chemist and inventor of the famous thermised cottage cheese called Lučina. Jan rebuilt his flat into a lab and learned how to preserve pig innards. He also experimented with polymer materials suitable for encasing his Audiopill device and tested various methods of potassium ferricyanide crystallization. He tested on himself effects of toadstool and breathing techniques on human perception.
He’s an autodidact and kamikaze explorer.

What I Need & What You Get

Audiopill is a part of the art project Prolapse of Love. It is a fully functional prototype yet. If is this crowdfunding campaign successful, anyone in the world will be able to make their dreams about exciting musical self-destruction come true. 

Now it produces Audiopill strictly handmade style. It is not possible to produce more than a few pieces. For the large-scale production is necessary to design a custom PCB and standardize the manufacturing process.

Electronic handmade part:

Chemical handmade part:

Help me with the investment and you'll be among the first who swallow a musical instrument.


Warning

Swallowing this electronic capsule is based on the same principle as the medically approved capsule endoscopy. However, this is an experimental art device. During development of the device, many doctors and four polymer experts who were consulted on encasement materials, warned the author "to never ever swallow anything like this". Therefore, everything is at the user’s own risk. The author waives all responsibility for any potential health problems. It is also strongly recommended that you inspect your faeces to be sure the device has made it through and out safely (in approx. 48 hours). 

Colors: Clear empty space (unisex) and Juicy juicy juicy pink (for girls):

And that's all. If you can't contribute, please share my project, and the music will thank you!

story:
Electroterrier


da il secoloxix:

"La loro musica fa riferimento ai canoni del miglior indie-rock statunitense di fine '80/primi '90: Husker Du, Dinosaur Jr., Sonic Youth, Pixies, robusta ed al contempo emozionale, capace di trascinare con adrenalinica potenza, ma anche di cullare l'ascoltatore sprigionando infinita dolcezza. I due protagonisti (...) dichiarano di amare (...) i Beatles, graditi in particolare da Valerio, Nick Drake, ispiratore di Andrea. Certamente il grunge (...) è entrato nel loro dna, come in quello di tutti i ragazzi della loro generazione, esercitando un'influenza inevitabile. Preziosissimi i testi: intelligenti, ironici, lontani dall'insopportabile banalità del cantautorato italiota di oggi. Anche gli electroterrier (...) si preparano a cercare fortuna al di fuori della nostra ostica Riviera, spesso poco sensibile alle proposte musicali più sincere ed innovative. In ogni caso buona fortuna, nella speranza (...) che ritornino con una certa frequenza dalle nostre parti, ad allietare ancora una volta le nostre serate."


VOLETE SCOPRIRE O RISCOPRIRE LA PRODUZIONE DI QUESTA BAND? 

E' ora disponibile una Usb-card celebrativa e numerata con inediti della alternative-band di Sanremo, attiva tra il 2003 e il 2005.

Mp3 e wav, foto, video mp4 del concerto a rock in the casbah 2004, più alcune demo del progetto solista kosheda. Materiale inedito

Tutti i ricavi sono destinati alla beneficenza (istituto dei tumori di milano). contributo di 19 euro! 

Un'occasione imperdibile per conservare la memoria di una delle alternative-band più rilevanti del Ponente ligure.

story:
Small Creatures is back ladies and gentlemen, and weʼre back with news that weʼre excited to share! Recently, we gathered together a monster ensemble of musicians, and went to United Recording (formerly Ocean Way Studios), to record all new music!!  

 

Small Creatures has been working silently and furiously for over a year on this body of work, and we cannot wait to share it with you! As independent artists, every part of our work has been self-funded up to this point. We're asking for you, our supporters, to partner with us for the completion of the mixing, mastering and distribution of this project.

You all have shown us so much love already, and we just can't do it without you! 

 

 

We're making this upcoming album available for pre-order right now!

  • Just 500 pre-orders would cover the costs associated with mixing, mastering, and distributing this record. 
  • But that's not all! We have lots of cool perks that we'll be offering as a way to say thank you for partnering with us!
  • T-shirts (designed by us), Vinyl test pressings, customized video messages, music industry Skype consultations, and more are available! 
  • We're also making our previously unreleased music available for FREE for the duration of this campaign!

Every contribution helps.

Our whole hearts and souls have gone into the production and quality recording of this music. We have created a body of work that we're truly proud to share and put out into the universe. 

We've been blessed to be apart of the music of so many successful artists, and now we are ready to officially present Small Creatures to the world. 

Even if you are unable to pre-order or give, please spread the word! Tell ya friends! Post and share this campaign. Partner with us to continue making quality music and art! 

Thank you in advance!

Your support has carried us this far already, and is absolutely invaluable!! 

"For Small Creatures such as we, the vastness is bearable only through Love."
story_txt:
Small Creatures is back ladies and gentlemen, and weʼre back with news that weʼre excited to share! Recently, we gathered together a monster ensemble of musicians, and went to United Recording (formerly Ocean Way Studios), to record all new music!!  

 
Small Creatures has been working silently and furiously for over a year on this body of work, and we cannot wait to share it with you! As independent artists, every part of our work has been self-funded up to this point. We're asking for you, our supporters, to partner with us for the completion of the mixing, mastering and distribution of this project.
You all have shown us so much love already, and we just can't do it without you! 
 


 
We're making this upcoming album available for pre-order right now!

Just 500 pre-orders would cover the costs associated with mixing, mastering, and distributing this record. 
But that's not all! We have lots of cool perks that we'll be offering as a way to say thank you for partnering with us!
T-shirts (designed by us), Vinyl test pressings, customized video messages, music industry Skype consultations, and more are available! 
We're also making our previously unreleased music available for FREE for the duration of this campaign!


Every contribution helps.
Our whole hearts and souls have gone into the production and quality recording of this music. We have created a body of work that we're truly proud to share and put out into the universe. 
We've been blessed to be apart of the music of so many successful artists, and now we are ready to officially present Small Creatures to the world. 
Even if you are unable to pre-order or give, please spread the word! Tell ya friends! Post and share this campaign. Partner with us to continue making quality music and art! 
Thank you in advance! 
Your support has carried us this far already, and is absolutely invaluable!! 

"For Small Creatures such as we, the vastness is bearable only through Love."

story:
I am 25 years old musician and songwriter. Writing and playing music has been one of the most inspiring and important things in my life since I was 15.

I just completed 10 best songs that I feel I ever wrote and I believe that THIS IS IT! I am trying to reach my dream to record a great album. I will need to use a professional studio to achieve the best sound quality. Thank you for your help and contribution to realize it.


A lot's of my lyrics in this album are about hope, fulfilment, dreams, goals and luck. When writing songs my aim is to create good mood, to give hope and smile, and light up passion to follow our dreams.
See my latest song and music video here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEV5OHa47kE&amp...

I'm bringing this new album to a higher level. The style of the music will be slightly different. It's going to have more depth, will be more melodic and emotional. This album is going to have one message for all "Do not forget to dream!".

There are no risks... there is nothing in this World that will stop me in releasing this album.

Thank you for any of your help and for sharing my dream.

story:
THE DREAM

Feeling Radio is just …..“Magic”

Four years ago, a man called George, a dreamer of  love and music, managed to make his dream come true by the help of Itube Enterprises Feelings Radio Group. Having met a few more people with the same music dream, started broadcasting music in May 2013…and that’ s when music becomes love…and love becomes a voice!

Only after had the microphone been switched on for the first time, they realized that broadcasting was not just a dream. On August 3rd, 2014, George & Andreas, the main group, presented their own radio program on air, and Feelings Radio just started its own trip all over the world.

Feelings Radio makes history….. 

Being the first web radio station in the world with animated background and interactive site with welcome message to all listeners, Feelings Radio makes history! It is located next to the sea, in Piraeus, with a marvelous view to the main port, where all boats and passengers start their own trip…

But…..without all you….your love and support to our dreams….nothing would have happened….

George Ntoukas & his partners, Itube Enterprises & Feelings Radio, would like to thank you all in advance for your love and support in order to make OUR dream comes true.

Let us be on air….for you!

With Your Support

We need your help in order to keep Feelings Radio “on air”. Having all you, our supporters, we will be able to provide for you more magical moments broadcasting for at least three years, by paying all fixed costs, server expenses and any variable cost is needed.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you’re not in the position to donate money, please consider sharing this page and talk to anyone you know who might be interested in supporting Feelings Radio! Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU SO MUCH!

story: Hello Friends! I have an upcoming gig, and it ain’t in your local dive bar! I’ve been given the amazing opportunity to represent my state and my country in Krasnodar, Russia this fall for their City Day festival, and Tallahassee being their sister city with an FSU campus there, they’d love a Tallahassee local. I was lucky enough to be selected.The big thing is, I need some help getting there. This campaign is to help cover travel expenses t that they arnt already covering,any little bit helps!

story:
Who are Red Bandit?

We are a young band from the Paisley area trying to get on in the music industry. We have been gigging and look forward to recording our Debut Album later this year with your help.

We all attend Castlehead High School and are passionate about music.

With your help we can take the first step in a professional recording studio.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise £1,000 to be able to record up to 12 song in a local recording studio and produce the first run of CDs of our Debut Album.

  • We offer lots on return ... besides our eternal gratitude!
  • Depending on the level of support you can bag yourself some great perks... from one of the 1st RUn of CDs, Red Bandit T-shirts, Tote Bags, Mugs, and Guest List Tickets at our Album Launch.
  • It is our plan to keep on fundraising until we reach our target ... this is HUGE for us!

 

Why Us?

We are singer songwriters who also value a good education and wish to finish our High School exams before taking on full time jobs - so we know money can be tight and value every pound of support.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't Contribute you can still help us ... by:

  • Using the Indiegogo share tools! To let others know
  • Supporting us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/TheRedBanditOfficial

story:
Hi friends,

My name is Sonya and I live in Armenia.  Months ago I was supported with the Turkey-Armenia Travel Grant to visit Istanbul for creating digital mapping of the Armenian cultural heritage in Istanbul. The program was very close to my heart because my roots come from Turkey. As a painter I know how the art and culture can reflect the things that are impossible to express with the help of words. This was a little project and it is already over.

The Impact

    We could finish this project with the help of my Turkish friend, we are both volunteers. Now we are creating a nice website which will help tourists from all over the world  to consider and choose the nearest active church and to find it easily in Turkey. Our aim is to make our own little step for normalization of the relationship between two neighborhood countries. But we are not going to stop on Istanbul only, there are hundreds of ancient churches and monasteries  spred in Turkey, the majority of which are either in ruins or are being used for other purposes. Many of them are still in active use and they belong to various denominations.

   So my target is to attractively arrange bunch of all these places on my website and to publish a nice photobook, named as ‘’Stones 100 and more years old”.As well,we are going to make digital mapping of the all mosques in Armenia. But these are only plans for future. To realize this dream, we need your support. 

Your donations will help make this field trip possible! We believe that the ancient cultural places will brighten up the the lives of those who will see them. Most importantly, this event will be so exceptional for many faithful people! 

 Challenges

  Anyway we are going to get the photo project up! We hope that we can meet our funding aim to cover the costs.

 Your donations to this project will cover the transportation costs and the professional camera will contribute to the later development of the project (before we were using our phones), through your contribution we will be provided plane tickets to Turkey and back, funds raised will also go towards the printing of postcard size images of the cultural heritage of both countries and publishing the future photobook. 



Other Ways You Can Help

   In case you are as excited about this project as we are but are unable to contribute, you can help by sharing our website link on your social media platforms, like us on facebook and help us spread the word.

Thank You.

story:
About Us

Waking Dreams came alive in the dark Berlin, Angela Chambers and Jason Letkiewicz came together in collaboration with Cameron Findlay on drums. Written and recorded in Berlin. Mixed in Baltimore, USA. Their debut album ‘'Askew’' will be released on vinyl and digitally in April 2020 along with three singles from the album.

Angela and Jason first met in New York in 2012, where they recorded their first songs together. Shortly after, Angela moved to Berlin and Jason came over in 2015, and they began work on their first studio album ‘'Askew''. At the time, both were coming from Electronic, House, and Italo Disco backgrounds. While holding on to elements of the past, their debut album ‘'Askew’' adds an Indie-pop rock twist to the equation. They perform live as a duo, with Angela writing and singing deep velvety vocals, intertwined with hypnotic synth and flute melodies, meanwhile Jason plays mesmerising guitar harmonies weeping around rhythmic bass lines. In 2018 and 2019, Waking Dreams toured in the Europe and in the US.

Or Have a private listen to the album here: https://soundcloud.com/chamberla/sets/wakingdreams-askew/s-jUjNL

We would like to share our debut album with the world and we are happy to have the support of our fans! It has been a long road and a challenging process. With your contributions, you will be helping us to cover some of the production costs, vinyl pressing, tour support, PR Campaign and any extra funds that will be left over will go to the production of our second album.

Our debut album will be released in April of 2020 and we are planning a tour in September 2020. Help us play a show in your town in 2020!!

What We Need & What You Get

Production Costs

Vinyl/Tapes Pressing: 1,300€

PR Campaign: 2000€

Tour Support: 700€

Music Video Support: 1000€

Total Funds Needed: 5,000€

Any and all Donations are greatly appreciated and will be used towards reaching our goal!

As a Thank You for your contributions, we are offering a few different perks for our contributors to choose from.  From Digital Downloads to Tapes and Vinyls, you can take your pick!

The Impact

  • Our aim is to bring our music and creation to the world.
  • We want to play more shows for you!!

Risks & Challenges

Musicians are all about taking risks, testing out new waters, and challenging themselves to know the people around them. We rely on building our audience and the help from our fans out there in order to bring something unique to the table. 

  • In the last year, our most challenging task was creating our audience, but now you are helping us to step into the light!
  • We have had to take many risks along the way, especially when it comes to time and money.
  • We want to cross the first bridge so that we can continue steps to our second album.

Other Ways You Can Help

Being an artist is one of the most difficult paths to choose in life. These days, we find it hard to get ahead and stand out because It becomes the road so many have travelled, and once you begin the journey, it is hard to turn back around. The hands of time keep moving and we must also keep on. The reason we keep going comes out of a strong passion for the music. We understand if you cannot donate money for our cause, although there are many other ways that you can help us along. 

  • One of the most valuable things you can do to help us out would be to use your social media platforms and inform anyone you can about our campaign: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube, Tumblr, Soundcloud, Bandcamp, and Indiegogo Share Tools... Anything counts!
  • The next best thing you can do is tell people by word of mouth!! Spread the Word to the World!!
  • Feel free to contact us with any questions and to stay in touch!
  • Email: flutechambers@gmail.com

We hope to play in a town near you in 2020!!

With Love and Peace in the New Year!

We hope all your dreams come true....xoxo
Waking Dreams Band

story:
ENGLISH VERSION

(à noter: traduction en français en bas!)

THE IDEA!


As a musician (vocalist) I have always wanted to make a connection with mankind through my music because it is possible touch people very deeply and in different ways when you make music from the bottom of your heart.


Many people in today's society face daily challenges and I believe that those challenges can be easier to face if we feel real empathy with the world around us.

I did some research by talking to friends and strangers: people are struggling and although they manage to survive somehow, they often feel left alone.
For this reason I started looking for a way to make a difference in their lives.

My first stop was the VIRAGE Foundation. It is an agency that provides assistance during cancer treatment. VIRAGE also helps people with reintegrate into society and gives them back their dignity.

Finally I have found my first platform where music can make a change by giving people hope, freedom and a measure of peace in their daily life.



WHY A CD?


We will make a recording with jazzy-classical music, with standards and songs composed by the great Don Thompson.


In 2010 I founded Trio Désirée with cellist Coenraad Bloemendal and harpist Erica Goodman, both renowned Canadian musicians. Through Coenraad I met Don Thompson, who helped us by composing a piece for our group called "Autumn Nostalgia". And so we started this wonderful journey combining jazz with classical music!

Thanks to Don's  magical jazzy arrangements, I am able to sing with my classically trained voice in a jazz style. This unique approach has opened up a hidden world of of truth and beauty that I had never before experienced. Don's musical sensitivity has touched us all.

We will work in collaboration with the VIRAGE Foundation and its patients for having a unique CD that can be used within the workshops VIRAGE is offering.

Later, in 2016, the VIRAGE Foundation will organize a fundraising event where we will perform songs from our new CD. We will give the CD's to the foundation to help them in order for them to raise money and give people pleasure at the same time.

This is the start of real empathy, real help and end to isolation!



HOW CAN YOU HELP?


Every time you donate a dollar, you will help twice:

  • to build awareness of people with cancer

  •  by supporting the fine work of the VIRAGE foundation


We need a total of $12,000 to reach our goal and to make a difference in someone's life. If we reach the required amount, we will make a recording in Toronto at Inception Sound with the great Chad Irschick (sound engineer), Don Thompson (piano, vibes), Coenraad Bloemendal (cello), Erica Goodman (harp) and Désirée Till (soprano).

Later on in 2016, VIRAGE will organize a concert for us where we will officially donate CD's to the Foundation. VIRAGE will sell the donated CDs and uses them for its activities.

If we do not reach our goal, all contributions will be refunded within 3-5 business days, we won't be able to make a recording nor spread the feeling of empathy as we would like to do!

Please note: contributions can only be made by PayPal.

So let's focus on positive thoughts; let's hope, let's fund and make some music!



OR HELP IN A DIFFERENT WAY!


If you cannot contribute, but still want to show your empathy ... no problem! You can still help to get this recording done by doing the following:


1. Tell everyone you know about our wonderful project. Please SHARE this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, your blog, etc.
2.  LIKE here our Facebook page to stay informed
3. stay informed through TWITTER @musicvirage!
4. You can always contact Desiree with questions or ideas: musicvirage@gmail.com.



WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?


It will cost us $12,000 CAD to make this recording. This amount covers all direct expenses related to the recording.

It is not a salary for the musicians.


Once the recording is finished, ERDECO recordings will prepare it for online distribution.


Here are the details:



for your help and your caring for other people by saying it with music!



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


VERSION FRANÇAISE


UNE IDÉE NAÎT


En tant que musicienne (chanteuse), j’utilise ma musique pour tisser des relations avec autrui; la musique a cette particularité qu’elle nous touche profondément et diversement lorsqu’elle naît du fond du cœur.


Nous sommes confrontés au quotidien à toutes sortes de défis. Je pense que ces défis seraient assumés plus facilement si nous étions réellement capables d’empathie.

Ayant sondé amis et étrangers, je me suis rendu compte que beaucoup de gens n’ont pas la vie facile et se sentent souvent isolés même s’ils réussissent à se tirer d’affaire. Aussi, j’ai commencé à chercher une façon de changer les choses.

Je me suis alors tournée vers la Fondation Virage pour le soutien au cancer, dont le travail permet aussi aux personnes de reprendre leur dignité et de se réinsérer dans la vie active.Voilà donc une façon d’utiliser la musique pour embellir le quotidien des personnes atteintes du cancer, faisant germer chez elles l’espoir et un sentiment de liberté et de paix!



POURQUOI UN CD?


Nous allons enregistrer de la musique classique jazzy, avec des standards et des chansons composés par le grand Don Thompson.


En 2010, j’ai fondé Trio Désirée avec le violoncelliste Coenraad Bloemendal et la harpiste Erica Goodman, deux musiciens canadiens de renom. Par l’entremise de Coenraad j’ai rencontré Don Thompson, qui a composé pour notre groupe la pièce intitulée Autumn Nostalgia. Ainsi a démarré une merveilleuse expérience qui combine le jazz et la musique classique.

Grâce aux arrangements magiques de Don, je peux chanter du jazz, moi qui suis formée à la musique classique. Cette approche originale nous amène dans un monde d’authenticité et de beauté qui m’était jusque là inconnu. La sensibilité musicale de Don nous a tous touchés.

Nous allons travailler en collaboration avec la Fondation Virage et ses patients en vue de créer un CD unique qui pourra être utilisé dans les ateliers qu’elle offre.

Dans le cadre d’une activité de financement qui sera organisée par la Fondation Virage en 2016, nous allons présenter des chansons de notre nouveau CD et offrirons des copies à la fondation à la fois pour aider à la collecte de fonds et pour égayer les gens.

C’est ici que commencent l’empathie et l’aide effective et que prend fin l’isolement!



Comment pouvez-vous aider?


Vos dons remplissent deux fonctions:

  • Sensibiliser le public aux épreuves que traversent les personnes atteintes du cancer; 
  • Soutenir le travail extraordinaire réalisé par la Fondation Virage.


Nous avons fixé notre objectif à 12 000 $CA pour changer la vie de quelqu’un. Si nous atteignons le montant établi, nous pourrons enregistrer notre CD à Toronto dans les studios de Inception Sound avec le soutien du grand ingénieur du son Chad Irschick; seront au piano et au vibraphone Don Thompson, au violoncelle Coenraad Bloemendal, à la harpe Erica Goodman et à la voix (soprano) Désirée Till.

En 2016, la Fondation Virage arrangera un concert dans le cadre duquel nous lui ferons don officiellement de copies de notre CD. La fondation en vendra certaines pour réunir des fonds et en utilisera d’autres dans ses activités.

Si l’objectif de 12 000 $CA n’est pas atteint, tous les dons seront remboursés dans les trois à cinq jours ouvrables suivant la fin de la campagne, et nous ne pourrons pas procéder à l’enregistrement de notre CD ni partager le sentiment d’empathie qui nous inspire!

Important : Les dons peuvent être reçus par l’entremise de PayPal uniquement.

Restons positifs, gardons espoir, soyons généreux et… place à la musique!



D’autres façons d’aider


S’il vous est impossible de contribuer par un don mais vous désirez quand même témoigner de votre empathie, voici trois autres façons de nous soutenir:


1. Faites part de notre projet à votre entourage; partagez (SHARE) notre campagne
sur Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, votre blogue, etc.

2. Aimez-nous (LIKE) sur votre page Facebook pour suivre les développements ici
3. Suivez les dévloppements par notre compte TWITTER @musicvirage !
4. Communiquez avec Désirée si vous avez des questions ou des suggestions : musicvirage@gmail.com.



Comment l’argent sera-t-il utilisé?


L’enregistrement du CD coûte 12 000 $CA. Le montant couvre les dépenses directement liées à l’enregistrement et non pas le salaire des musiciens.



Une fois l’enregistrement terminé, ERDECO recordings s’occupera d’en faire la distribution en ligne.


Voici les détails :






MERCI de votre soutien et de vous soucier des gens à travers la musique!
story_txt:
ENGLISH VERSION (à noter: traduction en français en bas!)THE IDEA!

As a musician (vocalist) I have always wanted to make a connection with mankind through my music because it is possible touch people very deeply and in different ways when you make music from the bottom of your heart. 


Many people in today's society face daily challenges and I believe that those challenges can be easier to face if we feel real empathy with the world around us.
I did some research by talking to friends and strangers: people are struggling and although they manage to survive somehow, they often feel left alone. For this reason I started looking for a way to make a difference in their lives.
My first stop was the VIRAGE Foundation. It is an agency that provides assistance during cancer treatment. VIRAGE also helps people with reintegrate into society and gives them back their dignity.

Finally I have found my first platform where music can make a change by giving people hope, freedom and a measure of peace in their daily life. 


WHY A CD?

We will make a recording with jazzy-classical music, with standards and songs composed by the great Don Thompson. 


In 2010 I founded Trio Désirée with cellist Coenraad Bloemendal and harpist Erica Goodman, both renowned Canadian musicians. Through Coenraad I met Don Thompson, who helped us by composing a piece for our group called "Autumn Nostalgia". And so
 we started this wonderful journey combining jazz with classical 
music!
Thanks to Don's  magical jazzy arrangements, I am able to sing with my classically trained voice in a jazz style. This unique approach has opened up a hidden world of of truth and beauty that I had never before experienced. Don's musical sensitivity has touched us all. 


We will work in collaboration
with the VIRAGE Foundation and its patients for having a unique CD that can be
used within the workshops VIRAGE is offering. 
Later, in 2016, the VIRAGE Foundation will organize a fundraising event where we will perform songs from our new CD. We will give the CD's to the foundation to help them in order for them to raise money and give people pleasure at the same time. 
This is the start of real empathy, real help and end to isolation!




HOW CAN YOU HELP?
Every time you donate a dollar, you will help twice:


to build awareness of people with cancer
 by supporting the fine work of the VIRAGE foundation


We need a total of $12,000 to reach our goal and to make a difference in someone's life. If we reach the required amount, we will make a recording in Toronto at Inception Sound with the great  Chad Irschick (sound engineer), Don Thompson (piano, vibes), Coenraad Bloemendal (cello), Erica Goodman (harp) and Désirée Till (soprano).
Later on in 2016, VIRAGE will organize a concert for us where we will officially donate CD's to the Foundation. VIRAGE will sell the donated CDs and uses them for its activities. 
If we do not reach our 
goal, all contributions will be refunded within 3-5 business days, we won't be able to make a recording nor spread the feeling of empathy as we would like to do!
Please note: contributions can only be made by PayPal.
So let's focus on positive thoughts; let's hope, let's fund and make some music!





OR HELP IN A DIFFERENT WAY!

If you
cannot contribute, but still want to show your empathy ... no problem! You
can still help to get this recording done by doing the following:

1. Tell everyone you
know about our wonderful project. Please SHARE this
campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, your blog, etc.2.  LIKE here our Facebook page to stay informed 3. stay informed through TWITTER @musicvirage!4. You can always
contact Desiree with questions or ideas: musicvirage@gmail.com. 



WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?

It will cost us $12,000 CAD to make this recording. This amount covers
all direct expenses related to the recording. 

It is not a salary for the musicians.

Once the recording is finished, ERDECO recordings will prepare it for online distribution. 
Here are the details:





for your help and your caring for other people by saying it with music!




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------


VERSION FRANÇAISE



UNE IDÉE NAÎT




En tant que musicienne (chanteuse), j’utilise ma
musique pour tisser des relations avec autrui; la musique a cette particularité
qu’elle nous touche profondément et diversement lorsqu’elle naît du fond du
cœur. 




Nous
sommes confrontés au quotidien à toutes sortes de défis. Je pense que ces défis
seraient assumés plus facilement si nous étions réellement capables d’empathie.
Ayant
sondé amis et étrangers, je me suis rendu compte que beaucoup de gens n’ont pas
la vie facile et se sentent souvent isolés même s’ils réussissent à se tirer
d’affaire. Aussi, j’ai commencé à chercher une façon de changer les choses.
Je me suis alors tournée vers la Fondation Virage pour le soutien au cancer, dont le travail permet aussi aux
personnes de reprendre leur dignité et de se réinsérer dans la vie active.Voilà
donc une façon d’utiliser la musique pour embellir le quotidien des personnes
atteintes du cancer, faisant germer chez elles l’espoir et un sentiment de
liberté et de paix!





POURQUOI UN CD?

Nous allons enregistrer de la musique
classique jazzy, avec des standards et des chansons composés par le grand Don Thompson.


En 2010, j’ai fondé Trio Désirée avec le violoncelliste Coenraad Bloemendal et la harpiste Erica Goodman, deux musiciens canadiens de renom. Par l’entremise
de Coenraad j’ai rencontré Don Thompson, qui a composé pour notre groupe la
pièce intitulée Autumn Nostalgia. Ainsi a démarré une merveilleuse
expérience qui combine le jazz et la musique classique.
Grâce aux arrangements magiques de Don,
je peux chanter du jazz, moi qui suis formée à la musique classique. Cette
approche originale nous amène dans un monde d’authenticité et de beauté qui
m’était jusque là inconnu. La sensibilité musicale de Don nous a tous touchés.
Nous
allons travailler en collaboration avec la Fondation Virage et ses patients en
vue de créer un CD unique qui pourra être utilisé dans les ateliers qu’elle
offre.
Dans le cadre d’une activité de
financement qui sera organisée par la Fondation Virage en 2016, nous
allons présenter des chansons de notre nouveau CD et offrirons des copies à la
fondation à la fois pour aider à la collecte de fonds et pour égayer les gens.


C’est
ici que commencent l’empathie et l’aide effective et que prend fin l’isolement!

Comment pouvez-vous
aider?

Vos dons remplissent deux fonctions:

Sensibiliser
le public aux épreuves que traversent les personnes atteintes du cancer; 
Soutenir
le travail extraordinaire réalisé par la Fondation Virage.


Nous avons fixé notre objectif à
12 000 $CA pour changer la vie de quelqu’un. Si nous atteignons le montant
établi, nous pourrons enregistrer notre CD à Toronto dans les studios de Inception Sound avec le soutien du grand ingénieur du son Chad Irschick; seront au piano et au vibraphone Don Thompson, au violoncelle Coenraad Bloemendal, à la harpe Erica Goodman et à la voix (soprano) Désirée Till.
En
2016, la Fondation Virage arrangera un concert dans le cadre duquel nous lui
ferons don officiellement de copies de notre CD. La fondation en vendra
certaines pour réunir des fonds et en utilisera d’autres dans ses activités.
Si l’objectif de 12 000 $CA n’est
pas atteint, tous les dons seront remboursés dans les trois à cinq jours
ouvrables suivant la fin de la campagne, et nous ne pourrons pas procéder à
l’enregistrement de notre CD ni partager le sentiment d’empathie qui nous
inspire!
Important :
Les dons peuvent être reçus par l’entremise de PayPal uniquement.
Restons positifs, gardons espoir, soyons
généreux et… place à la musique!




D’autres façons d’aider

S’il vous est impossible de contribuer par un don mais vous désirez
quand même témoigner de votre empathie, voici trois autres façons de nous
soutenir:
1. Faites part de notre projet à votre entourage;
partagez (SHARE) notre campagnesur Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, votre blogue,
etc.
2. Aimez-nous (LIKE) sur votre page
Facebook pour suivre les développements ici3. Suivez les dévloppements par notre compte TWITTER @musicvirage !4.
Communiquez avec Désirée si vous avez des questions ou des suggestions : musicvirage@gmail.com.



Comment l’argent
sera-t-il utilisé?

L’enregistrement du CD coûte 12 000 $CA. Le
montant couvre les dépenses directement liées à l’enregistrement et non pas le
salaire des musiciens.

Une
fois l’enregistrement terminé, ERDECO recordings s’occupera d’en faire la distribution en ligne.
Voici
les détails :

story:
POLE POSITION is a melodic hard rock / metal band fronted by a female vocalist from Aalesund, Norway.  And now is the time to perform with our music to a stage near YOU!

After several requests to travel to the States for touring, we found out that we have to try to achieve that.  But there is a tiny problem. It cost !!!

Since we all have family and obligations too them. We can't just run off and play rock stars for a periode of time :) 

So....We need   help to raise some green. We need YOUR help


PS: You will all get the money back, if we don't reach our goal

Homepage: http://polepositionofficial.com/

"PARANOIA"  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2m_dBOhnk4

story:
Overview

Hello! My name is Orlando Romulo Sanchez, and I am the promoter/manager for the great German classical concert pianist Marie-Luise Hinrichs. I am here to raise funds to produce a new CD of piano music, featuring Marie-Luise playing a solo-piano version of J.S. Bach's "Cello Suite #1", plus a collection of her very own new original compositions inspired by and dedicated to animals! 

Bach's Cello Suite #1 is the most famous composition ever written for cello (Yo Yo Ma's rendition is part of popular culture). The piece is rarely ever heard on the piano. But after Marie-Luise received the sheet music as a gift, she enjoyed the music so much that she wanted to share her enthusiasm for this great masterpiece with the world through a recording of her own interpretation on piano. If there was ever a musician who was meant to bring this piece to life on the piano, it is Marie-Luise Hinrichs. I say this because of the spirituality she always brings out of the music that she plays. Please watch the promotional video above to see and hear what I mean! Marie-Luise is also a well-respected Bach interpreter, which you will also be able to hear from the video. 

The spiritual aspect of music is the driving force behind Marie-Luise's artistry. It is something that she does not want to go without, and it has been her inspiration all throughout her career. All of her music is infused with a feeling of love and goodwill toward the listener and toward the world. There is also a deep reverence for God and for the mystery of the Creation, which Marie-Luise also wants to share with the world. 

Marie-Luise is a highly- acclaimed world class concert pianist, famous for playing music by great classical composers (you can learn more about her at http://www.marie-luise-hinrichs.com). During the last 10 years, starting around the time she began studying the life and music of Hildegard Von Bingen, Marie-Luise has felt increasingly and irresistibly inspired to compose her own music, including these animal songs, which are some of her most recent. She loves animals very much, and this love has shown up in these compositions. She even organized and performed in a benefit concert for an animal shelter, through which she raised almost 400 Euros, and donated this to the animal shelter!

The animal-songs part of the CD will be entitled "Tierbilder", which means "Animal Pictures" in German. The function of these animal songs is to describe and celebrate animal life, similar to the musical animal characterizations in Sergei Prokofiev's "Peter And The Wolf". These are short and sweet compositions that will appeal to both kids and adults who love animals. It will be music that you can play for your kids without worry! 

Marie-Luise currently owns an elderly cat, and she has owned several dogs and rabbits throughout her lifetime. Several of the animal songs will be dedicated to her beloved dog Stella, who passed away in August this year, of old age. Marie-Luise has been heartbroken by this loss, and she says "Stella will always be in my heart." 

Other animals that will be described by the animal songs include: Cats, rabbits, mice, butterflies, a fox, a camel, and more! 

Marie-Luise's sister, Marianne Levien, a painter, will paint pictures of all these animals, and these paintings will be reproduced in the pages of the CD Booklet! To learn more about Marianne Levien, here is a news article written about her (in German): 

http://www.derwesten.de/staedte/nachrichten-aus...

And here are three examples of Marianne Levien's beautiful paintings. These particular examples will not be part of the CD booklet for this project, but these are just to show you what style she paints in. Here are a horse, a chameleon, and a dolphin! 

 

 

Impact:

Contributors to this project will be helping to bring great music and art into the world! It is music that is healthy for the spirit. Without your help, this CD may not get produced! 

Also, if this project is successfully produced, it will open up possibilities for Marie-Luise to use her musical talent to help more animals. As her promoter, I imagine enlisting the help of animal welfare organizations to help distribute and sell copies of the CD to animal lovers who also enjoy piano music, and splitting profits so that the animal welfare organizations benefit from it, as well as Marie-Luise herself. Nothing like this is officially arranged right now, but I am just hoping for things like this to happen. 

 

Expenses:

The expenses of this project include: 

Piano Rental: .........................................................................1300 Euros

Piano Tuner Fee: ...................................................................200 Euros

Professional Sound Engineer: .............................................500 Euros

CD and Booklet Design and Printing...................................1000 Euros

Artist Fee for Marie-Luise Hinrichs and Marianne Levien...2000 Euros

 

Team:

Sound Engineer: To Be Announced 

Booklet design: Anne Hoss

Booklet printing: Flyeralarm

CD Burning: Hofa Media

Piano Rental: Steinway Haus Dusseldorf

The Painter: Marianne Levien

The pianist: The great Marie-Luise Hinrichs herself! 

 

Risks and Challenges:

I can't think of any risks or challenges other than raising enough money. If I am able to raise the money, we will get the project done for certain. Marie-Luise is an experienced professional world-class recording artist, and she knows who to work with, and how to get it done. Money is the only issue. If I fail to raise enough funds, then the project will be set back many many months. 

Furthermore, I am aware that it is a very unusual project, but much of Marie-Luise's success as a recording artist has come from unusual projects. For example, her piano arrangements of monodies by German abbess Hildegard Von Bingen (1098-1179) spent many weeks in the European classical music charts in 2011, and one music journalist raved that "Hinrichs has erected a signpost pointing piano music in a new direction." Her interpretations of keyboard sonatas by Spanish composer Padre Antonio Soler (1729-1783) are considered by some to be among the best ever recorded. Marie-Luise single-handedly transcribed the first ever solo piano version of "Stabat Mater" by Giovanni Battista Pergolesi (1710-1736), a 40-minute masterpiece originally written for voice, strings, and organ. 

Other ways you can help

Even if you can't contribute money, you can help us immensely by sharing a link to our campaign through your social media! (For example, Facebook, Twitter, e-mail, text, etc.) This will help spread the word, and increase our chances of success. We would be very grateful! 

About Marie-Luise Hinrichs 

At the age of seven, Marie-Luise Hinrichs took her first piano lessons; by the time she was fourteen, her career was already underway with a public performance of Mozart’s C Major Concerto, K467. In the course of her studies at the conservatories of Hamburg, Essen and Cologne, Hinrichs went on perfecting her truly unique piano touch – that sensitive, mellow tone which has continually placed her performances in a class of their own, then as now.
“What a great blessing to have the chance to express oneself through music”, as German pianist Marie-Luise Hinrichs says. Released by the labels EMI and CPO, her outstanding recordings of the sonatas of Padre Antonio Soler – a hitherto neglected composer – established her international renown.
Reviewers in FonoForum magazine and in the dailies Le Figaro (Paris) and FAZ (Frankfurt) have repeatedly pointed out Hinrichs’ songlike, balanced timbre, nuanced sensitivity and utter stylistic assurance.
 

Thank you very much for reading!

story:
About me

My name is Anna Bulkina and I'm a concert pianist. During my life I was traveling a lot all over the world, experiencing the life of a freelancer artist. I visited many countries and played in many beautiful venues. One of the countries that I particularly liked was Germany. Composers of German Romanticism always were among my favorite. When I visited cities where they lived and worked, had their triumphs and fails, love and death - their music became much more meaningful for me. After my first visit to this country the idea of CD crossed my mind. I picket two significant works of two the most brilliant composers of this period - Schumann and Brahms. 

Another facet of the CD is an anthology of Russian composers that studied or worked in Moscow Conservatory.  Although I did not do it deliberately, somehow one can clearly see the line of composers started with Tchaikovsky and finished with Gubaydulina, representatives of one school but so different from each other, with different lives and destinies. 

 

Where the money go

The audio material of the CD is already complete. I only need to launch it now with the recording company. The budget will go for post- production costs, printing and distribution costs. This last step turned out to be the most hard one in terms of funds. Here I need you to go with me on this journey and I'm sure that together we can bring this project to life!

If the project will be successful I will also organize several concerts to promote the CD. 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

From the moment when the task of collecting funds is complete the recording company would need only about one month to launch the CD. Of course, there could be some delays in the process of distribution due to some extraordinary circumstances, but I'm positive that with your help I can launch the project in the frame of one month. 

All help will be highly appreciated - spread a word about this campaign among your colleges and Facebook friends, use Indiegogo share tools to make the process easier!
story_txt:
About me
My name is Anna Bulkina and I'm a concert pianist. During my life I was traveling a lot all over the world, experiencing the life of a freelancer artist. I visited many countries and played in many beautiful venues. One of the countries that I particularly liked was Germany. Composers of German Romanticism always were among my favorite. When I visited cities where they lived and worked, had their triumphs and fails, love and death - their music became much more meaningful for me. After my first visit to this country the idea of CD crossed my mind. I picket two significant works of two the most brilliant composers of this period - Schumann and Brahms. 
Another facet of the CD is an anthology of Russian composers that studied or worked in Moscow Conservatory.  Although I did not do it deliberately, somehow one can clearly see the line of composers started with Tchaikovsky and finished with Gubaydulina, representatives of one school but so different from each other, with different lives and destinies. 
 
Where the money go
The audio material of the CD is already complete. I only need to launch it now with the recording company. The budget will go for post- production costs, printing and distribution costs. This last step turned out to be the most hard one in terms of funds. Here I need you to go with me on this journey and I'm sure that together we can bring this project to life!
If the project will be successful I will also organize several concerts to promote the CD. 
  
Risks & Challenges
From the moment when the task of collecting funds is complete the recording company would need only about one month to launch the CD. Of course, there could be some delays in the process of distribution due to some extraordinary circumstances, but I'm positive that with your help I can launch the project in the frame of one month. 
All help will be highly appreciated - spread a word about this campaign among your colleges and Facebook friends, use Indiegogo share tools to make the process easier!

story:
Short Summary

  • Independent record label 47 Canaryz has plans to release 5 albums this summer (47 Canaryz, Seuss // Ka$o, Seuss the Rapscallion, Ka$o, Jordan Lair)
  • After having over $2000 of studio equipment stolen, we are unable to achieve the level of quality needed to complete these albums
  • By donating you will not only be helping us to be able to finish the projects we've put our time and effort into, but will also get exclusive rewards and be the first to hear the music we're able to complete

What We Need & What You Get

  • Over $2000 of equipment was stolen, but we're able to get by on the bare minimums if we can raise $500
  • Pre-order singles/albums from 47 Canaryz Artists, order merch, custom songs, private concerts and more

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share the campaign link on social media
  • Contact a 47 Canaryz artist for more information

Contact a 47 Canaryz artist for more information

story:
❈ Hello & Welcome! ❈

My name is Aneesha - I am an Artist, DJ, Music Producer, Video Creator, Motivational Speaker, Empath, Healer & Lover of Life!

 

First & foremost, thank you so much for taking the time to look at my campaign. This is something I have spent my whole life building up to and it really does mean the world to me - quite literally.

I have big visions & a strong desire to make a powerful, peaceful impact within our global community - through following my passions, staying within my truth and sharing my experience along the way.

My belief is that we are all connected and when we cooperate together alongside nature, supporting one another, we can build a world of all-encompassing unification.

To me, this means a world without violence, poverty or suffering of any kind. A place where every living being thrives, as they should within accordance of the laws of the universe.

❈❈❈

As far back as I can remember, art & music have been my two of my greatest passions. Over the years I have explored them in many ways from abstract painting & manual photography to playing bass in a rock band as a teenager.

I am now at the stage in my lifetime where I have chosen a specific set of artistic crafts, with the intention to develop and master them - namely, these are - producing music & videos, DJing and creating mandalas.

Alongside this, I am a very spiritual being and strongly believe in the power of meditation; as it was upon my discovery of this, that my life truly changed for the better.

 

 
❈❈❈
 
 

 

My 3 main goals from this campaign are as follows:

❈ To help fund my visit to India this December - where I'll be spending time in Samarpan ashrams, DJing, creating art & investing time with the charity I support.

❈ To fund the production of my upcoming LP entitled 'Eudaimonia' with release set for Summer 2018 AD!

❈ To enable me to upgrade my portable technology - this helps me with music & video production, keeping you updated on my experience, capturing photos & footage and taking care of business while I'm travelling!

The outcome however means so much more - each of these goals contribute to providing a platform for me to share my experience, creativity & insight with the world on a massive scale...

❈❈❈

 

The reason for the relatively short timeframe in which to reach my target is because of the proximity to me traveling (and it also makes it rather fun, don't you think?!) However, I will extend the campaign after this so you can keep investing even after the initial deadline has passed...this is part of a much bigger ongoing project so the more the merrier!

❈❈❈

 

As mentioned above, the outcome of this campaign means a great deal - allow me to delve deeper…

I first visited India in March 2017 AD - this was such a special and monumental time for me as my Grandmother grew up in Gujarat before relocating to Uganda & then the UK as a refugee (now this is a whole other story!) It felt so amazingly incredible to re-connect with some of my roots & one of my homelands...

❈❈❈

During my time in Goa I was able to finally meet one of the founders & some of the children housed by 'El Shaddai Charitable Trust' - this is a truly wonderful charity that a good friend of mine had already introduced me to & we support from the UK.

The only words I have for this situation is 'pure love'. I will never forget the moment I first saw all those beautiful faces beaming up at me, their gazes touched my soul…I couldn't imagine what some of them would have endured in their young lives, yet they are all just so full of love, to the point where I felt completely surrounded and engulfed by it - they brought me into complete alignment with my true nature.

And It was on this day that a major part of my purpose in life became clear to me - to help El Shaddai expand across India and also to learn from them, so I can go on to set up services similar to theirs in other parts of the world.

 

You can find out more about El Shaddai and all the amazing things they do here:

https://childrescue.net/

https://www.instagram.com/eschildrescue/

❈❈❈

On my return from India with my new gained clarity, I decided it was time I really started stepping up in life in order to see my visions become reality. I invested in mentoring, began offering a bespoke mandala service & after 10 years of dreaming about it - I began DJing as part of the independent, Leeds UK based, label - Released.

 I started with more traditional vinyl record DJing and I am now also expanding my horizons and taking to the MP3/CDJs as well - enabling me to play a variety of venues and travel much easier while doing so. 

It is through Released that I met the talented Jorgie, one of the co-producers for the Eudaimonia LP, who I will now take the time to thank as she kindly let me use her music for my campaign video - thank you Jorgie!

https://www.facebook.com/jorgiemusic/

We have already started creating music together and I am so excited to see where it takes us as well as sharing this with you & the rest of the world!

❈❈❈

 

❈❈❈
  
Eudaimonia - I first came across this concept while studying the philosophies of Aristotle. It excited me as I felt like I had finally found a theory that encapsulated what I believe life is all about - achieving a state of sheer happiness through living up to your full potential.
There are various theories and definitions of the word - one I like is "human flourishing".
To me, Eudaimonia is the highest state of mind and existence, true divine nature; love - achievable by anyone & that I am in everyday of life :)
 

The first single & video is set for digital release in Spring 2018 AD with the full LP following both digitally and on vinyl in Summer 2018 AD.

£1 of every LP sold, digitally & physically will go to El Shaddai!

http://released.co.uk/

https://soundcloud.com/aneesha-khimani

https://soundcloud.com/kmah-radio/released-reco...

 

 

❈❈❈

Earlier this year, I also gained a strong connection with Samarpan Mediation. With ashrams all over the world & the biggest following currently in India - these ashrams are places full of vibrations and consciousness that welcome all people of all backgrounds. The objective of Samarpan is to bring peace and unite the world into one family, irrespective of ones religion, race, country, language or spiritual practice through meditation. It is the desire of all those involved that we shall have world peace.

Every year, in India, Samarpan hold an International Retreat - this is an amazing opportunity for those around the world to come together & connect with one another as well as being in the presence of the Satguru. 

Visiting Samarpan ashrams & the Satguru will give me all the spiritual and energetic tools I need to begin offering meditation sessions within my community in the UK. I also have future aspirations to bring this into schools.

http://www.samarpanmeditation.net/

http://www.joincollectivityonline.com/

❈❈❈

Recently, I started a YouTube channel - Rising Up In Herstory. Through this I share my insight and creative experiences, with the intention to inspire & uplift people to reaching their full potential. With an updated smartphone, I can begin my vision of more live and higher quality videos, as well as being more active on other social media platforms so I can build a stronger following & run my business while I travel.

 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4ZdN_pzENrLNl...

❈❈❈

 

One of my biggest inspirations and daily motivations in all of this are the youth -  they are my teachers as well as students in life and I believe that by investing our time in and nurturing them in a way that helps them to flourish, they will help us and we can really make the world of our dreams - because lets face it, who doesn't want to live in infinite abundance of worldly riches everyday??

 

Love & gratitude to the elders & the rest of you as well -  you always remind me of the essence of life!

❈❈❈
 

I'd now like to give a huge shout out & thank you to my trusty tools...

All this so far has been created using the following Late 2007 Macbook & iPhone 4:

They have both done so well over the years, we have worked on many projects together, captured & shared many memories! However as I'm sure you'll appreciate - things are advancing and now is the time for change :)

❈❈❈

 

There are so many ways in which you can help me with this campaign... 

❈ Invest in me through Indiegogo to receive your perk

❈ Follow me on Instagram to see my world in pictures  

❈ Follow me on Facebook for updates on international events & live videos

❈ Subscribe to my YouTube channel for a boost of inspiration & more live videos!

I understand that not everyone is able to make a financial donation and I totally get it, thank you for reading - something you can do though is to invest a bit more of your time...by using the share tools to share the link to my video and campaign page you are helping to spread the word far & wide!

- For this, I truly am eternally grateful ✨  

With Love,

Aneesha

❈❈❈

As previously mentioned, this is part of a bigger project - 

I created the concept of 'Back To The Roots' a few years ago while beginning plans for a journey to Uganda with my mother - this is happening next year. It has now been 45 years since our family were forced to leave their home in Fort Portal, Uganda and this will be my mums first time back to the land where she was born. It is my intention to make a short documentary film capturing the experience and exploring the notion of diaspora.

This part of the project is called - Back to The Roots: Scatterings of Africa

You can follow us here for updates on this:

https://www.facebook.com/groups/235326136594869/

 

❈❈❈

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

Hi,I'm Carl Orr, a London-based guitarist and composer. I have performed jazz and jazz-influenced music all over the world with some of the finest musicians in the world including Billy Cobham,George Duke,Randy Brecker,Ernie Watts,Bennie Maupin and Don Grusin, and I have jammed onstage with the likes of Marcus Miller, Nigel Kennedy, Bill Summers and Eric Krasno . I have written lots of material for the globally popular Rockshool guitar exams and I write production music for Warner Brothers. I have recorded eight albums of my original compositions and am now working on the ninth. I am happily married and my wife and I have two grown-up kids.

My aim is to create music of the highest standards with a truly original approach. I have  used my background and training in jazz performance and composition to create music which is simpler and more accessible than most modern jazz. My compositions feature memorable melodies, concise solos and meticulously crafted rhythms.Some of the rhythms are strong and funky and some are gentle and soothing but all of them will capture and hold your attention. I also focus a lot on varied instrumentation and the album features a great many instruments; electric and acoustic guitars, bass, grand piano, electric piano, Hammond organ, drums, percussion, soprano saxophone, bass clarinet, violin, voice,sitar, tablas, gyill(a Ghanaian marimba-like instrument) and oud(Turkish stringed instrument).

I grew up listening to the great pop music of the sixties and seventies and my aim is to make modern, mostly instrumental music with the warmth and emotional generosity of the music of the great artists I grew up listening to; artists like The Beatles,Stevie Wonder, James Taylor, Aretha Franklin,Joni Mitchell, Glen Campbell, Burt Bacharach, Simon and Garfunkel and Donny Hathaway. The following track from my previous album, 'Forbearance' is an excellent example of this approach.

 
My aim is to make music that you can either listen to in a concentrated way or you can put on in  the home to create a warm, inviting and energised atmosphere, or you can listen to it while you are walking, driving or travelling by plane, bus or train to help to pass the time in a more enjoyable way. A man who bought my last album says he puts it on every morning while his family are eating breakfast as it creates a great mood to start the day.
I strongly feel that world needs to hear this music.
Our precious world is increasingly becoming a frightening and dangerous place and music is needed more than ever to make people feel calm and reassured. For me it is simply not good enough for  my music to simply be a manifestation of a chaotic world. However this is not 'new age' or background music; this is music of great power and energy. I am a performing musician of 37 years experience and I have played at many of the world's major jazz festivals and jazz clubs, so I am highly experienced in creating music to connect with and energise audiences. 
I purposefully create music with the aim of completely engaging the listener, drawing them in with beautiful sounds, compelling rhythms and melodies that will capture and retain their attention, so they can forget about their problems for a while, think clearly about life and gather their strength to move their life forward in the best possible way.
The risks and challenges are as follows; there is always the risk that an artist will not complete a project. However, this project is now at a very advanced stage; I estimate that 70% of the work has been done. I also have a flawless track record of finishing projects with eight albums to my credit, most of them self-produced, so there is no risk of the album not being completed.
The challenges also are largely completed; the main challenges are writing and rehearsing the music, booking the musicians and recording followed by the practicalities of artwork,  distribution, disc pressing and promotion. So far I have got to the stage of having done the great majority of the recording, with only a couple of days recording remaining to finish off, and as far as the rest of the challenges in completing the album, as I have stated before, I have a great deal of experience and have total confidence in myself to bring it to completion. The only thing I don't have is the necessary extra money to cover the remaining costs.
 

Can you help me to get this important music out into the world?

So far I have got to the stage of having done the great majority of the recording, with only a couple of days recording remaining to finish off, and as far as the rest of the challenges in completing the album, as I have stated before, I have a great deal of experience and have total confidence in myself to bring it to completion. The only thing I don't have is the necessary extra money to cover the remaining costs.
 
Can you help me to get this important music out into the world?

story:
The world currently exists under a layer of fear. Thousands are infected with COVID-19, entire countries are being quarantined, businesses are closing, and stocks are falling. In the midst of self isolation, the entertainment industry has been hit particularly hard. Tours have cancelled, sports seasons have been suspended and clubs are ceasing operations.

There is one thing you can count on- THIS WILL NOT STOP US. Join us at the Isolation Music Festival - a live streamed, online music festival where artists large and small bring their talents from their home to yours! Enjoy live sets from multiple genres and chat with your favorite musicians after their set!

We're collaborating with artists from all over the country! Be sure to check back for updates to the growing lineup! 

WHO WILL BENEFIT?

Artists
Artists and entertainers are being pummeled by these
unfortunate circumstances...particularly local artists. Funds
from this festival will help preserve their ability to make
music you love!

YOU!
Don't tell us you're not going crazy with boredom.
There's only so many sports reruns and Netflix binges that
one can take

story:
Short Summary

Newark, NJ’s hometown girl, Shariese Katrell, has been singing since the age of six. Music has always been very important and has helped her through many difficult times including bouts with epilepsy. Shariese’s condition was diagnosed a year after high school. From then on life started to change. For over 5 years she has been an Anita Kaufmann Foundation Epilepsy Awareness Ambassador. As an ambassador she has assisted the Foundation and Universities across NJ about Epilepsy and other hidden disabilities. She has used music to help her fight through having brain surgery and overcome the many challenges that life presents while living with epilepsy.  This cause is important to Shariese Katrell as an advocate and a person living with epilepsy to share creative avenues of music with the world and convey that epilepsy has a voice and those living with this hidden disability have their own individual stories. 

Through the contribution and support of others, educational and physical materials to promote epilepsy awareness can be obtained and shared with the community and more importantly, the world! In addition, your donations can help obtain professional musicians from other states together to participate musically to complete an inspirational song, engineers, producers, and promotion.

Some donations will be utilized for an inspirational epilepsy awareness video once the song is completed; as well as assist with hiring Graphic designers and photographers. In addition, donations will be used to secure a live venue in order to reach the public so those with and without epilepsy can enjoy a live release of the song together and be educated and entertained.

Donations are needed to promote the song which will be available on iTunes, Amazon, Spotify, and other music outlets which will allow contributors to see the result of their donation and all proceeds from the song will go to the Anita Kaufmann Foundation.

It is with great hope that this campaign will shine a valuable light on the hidden disability of epilepsy and the challenges that a person living with the disability as well as their families face on a everyday basis. Epilepsy is a disability that not too many people are aware of and this in itself poses a great challenge in educating the public. In addition, there is not enough media outlets that we see today that promote Epilepsy awareness and Purple Day (March 26th).

Even if you are not able to physically donate monetary contributions, we welcome your support in other ways such as: volunteering, sharing information through social media outlets, like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Snapchat, as well as the Indiegogo link featured.

story:
FUNDING

Hey! Beautiful – New Single by Black MP Well

Black MP Well is raising funds to promote his new single across the globe.

Campaign Theme: Beautiful Woman: Rise Up!

OVERVIEW

Greetings to my wonderful family, friends and fans out there!!

With your generosity, I am able to use my new single titled “Hey! Beautiful” 

  • To create awareness and empower or motivate women all around the world irrespective of color, shape, size, origin and prove once and for all that every woman is BEAUTIFUL.
  • To inspire all women to feel better and happy about themselves by alleviating beauty related anxieties.

How do we get the message across the world? That’s why I am here to ask for help in releasing and promoting my new single “Hey! Beautiful”. The funds from this campaign will be used for the following:

  • Distribute the song digitally to all music stores worldwide via CD Baby Pro
  • Promote or Boost the campaign via social media such as Facebook Ads and YouTube channels or Google Ads
  • Promote the song via online Radio stations and traditional radio stations, Press and Other promotional expenses to help deliver the message across the world
  • Make music video to help deliver the message across the world
  • Television Ads to deliver the message across the world.

IMPACT

Those of you who support Black MP Well will be putting smiles on our mothers, wives and daughters faces by instilling confidence and make them say to others and themselves that “I AM BEAUTIFUL” irrespective of color, origin, shape, and size.

CHALLENGE

It will be tough or difficult to spread the message across the world without your support. I cannot do this alone without you being part of this project or campaign. 

PERKS

  • Firstly, my sincere gratitude to you for making this campaign come to light and to reach worldwide to support all women
  • You will receive a digital download link to download the song on/after the release date 1st January 2021.
  • You will be invited to an online listening/Pre-release Party on 31 December 2020 @ 1900 hrs. EST via Facebook live or any other concert online (TBD) and again express my gratitude to you for making it possible
  • Men will receive “#Hey! Beautiful” T-shirt and women will receive “#Am Beautiful” T-shirts.
  • There are other perks available as well such as Black MP Well Magnets and Stickers.

Other Ways You can Help

  • Follow me on social media and subscribe to my channels:

Facebook via https://m.facebook.com/blackmpwellsantibon/

Twitter via https://twitter.com/blackmpwell

Instagram via https://www.instagram.com/blackmpwell/

YouTube (Subscribe) via https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbN1t8v1MBGYY0GzAAIh4sg

Soundcloud via https://soundcloud.com/blackmpwell

  • Share the campaign via email, social media , apps and other platforms or let people know.
  • "Hey Beautiful" song is available for pre-saving on Spotify. Click the link to pre-save it for January 1st, 2021 via https://show.co/YaD3YjG

Thank you so much for being Part of this Movement and your Generosity!!!

Kindly Email your T-Shirt size and shipping address to:

Artist Manager

Richmond Owusu-Ansah

richyelitepaam@gmail.com

story:
Dear friend. I want to tell you a little story about me. From a very young age, I already said that I wanted to be a singer. Nobody gave me the support I needed because the thought of that time was that being a singer was not profitable or a profession. I became a publicist, and with that job, I financed my career in music. Studying singing was, always, one of my most consistent activities to this day. My first album was manufactured thanks to the sale of 120 Christmas cakes I made. And when that album obtained the Nominantion to the National Prize of the Artist as "Musical Revelation of the year", I ratified that the music was my way. Since then, from the sale of one album I have been financing the next one. But times have changed a lot for the Venezuelan people; and it´s time for me to ask again for your generous help. We must never stop fighting for our dreams, so I invite you to join mine, which has always been genuine and beautiful. This way, I will be able to continue sharing the music and awaken the love in many people, something that is so needed in the world.

Maybe You can´t contribute, but that doesn't mean that you can't help: please, share this message with your friends and use the Indiegogo share tools, and invite them to join my cause!

In return, I will send you one of this new album and get some other benefits, depending on your contribution. In advance, I want to thank you for your support and kindness for reading me.

All of my best wishes for you and your own dreams!

story:
Hi!, we desperately need your help to finish the production and promotion of our new album “sin e’ madik’ to be released early 2019! We are passionate about our music and feel the world needs to hear our amazing songs. With your help we can make our dreams come true and spread our music to the world! We are asking for donations starting at $10 or more.

But the best part is with your donation you will get a copy of our albums via digital download, which includes the new album to be released! That’s a total of 38 songs!!

Please take a moment to visit our website and discover our amazing journey up to this crucial point in our music career. With your help we can spread the word and take the next step in our musical journey!

After the donation is made please provide your email address to airwavesspectacular@gmail.com and you will receive access to all of our songs for digital download.

Thanks!
