story:
Short Summary

Gareth Jones, the legendary Producer and and Mix Engineer behind many iconic artists such as Depeche Mode, Erasure, Nick Cave and many more has just released his debut album, "Electrogenetic". This is Gareth's debut album which is a glimpse into his life, his mind and soul. Having heard this album prior to its release, I was very impressed by the production, passion and sheer attention to detail whilst at the same time I was deeply moved by the themes, atmospheres and emotion in this stunning body of work. This album takes you on a journey and it shows not only the technical genius of one of electronic music's most iconic producers but also the depths of his soul. The album was released digitally and on cassette on the 18th of September 2020 under the Calm & Collect Label. After hearing this incredible album, I felt strongly that it most certainly deserves a vinyl release!!

Vaughn George 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Gareth and I are looking to gauge interest and to potentially raise the funds to get Electrogenetic printed on vinyl.
  • This vinyl record will be released and distributed under my label, "Aggro Monkey Records".
  • How many we press, will depend entirely on YOU and the interest of the community.
  • The album will be pressed on premium heavy weight 180 gram vinyl.
  • The the vinyl mastering and vinyl cut will be done by the brilliant Alex Wharton from the famous Abbey Road Studios in London.
  • Every vinyl will be individually signed and numbered by Gareth Jones himself.
  • Inside the vinyl sleeve, will be a separate inlay card. The inlay card will feature YOUR NAME and the and names of every other person who contributed to this vinyl pressing.
  •  The funding goal of €2350 is guide based on the formula of pressing 250 vinyls. This will cover the production costs as well as the Abbey Road vinyl cutting and mastering. The figure amount is only here really because the INDIEGOGO platform requires that we specify an amount. The whole idea of this campaign is to gauge the interest. If it turns out that there is not enough interest,  your money will be refunded to you. The vinyls will be priced at €23 each (excluding shipping). Please note that we are not liable for any additional duty or customs charges which you country may charge.
  • Following the success Aggro Monkey has achieved with the Brian Griffin Depeche Mode artwork poster prints, I know we can make this a reality and a success for all involved!!

Your money is safe

Please understand that this is a pure passion project and we are putting a lot of love and attention to detail into this project. YOUR funding will help make this a realty but please note, if for some reason we do not reach our funding goal, you can be rest assured that your money will be refunded to you in full. There is no risk to you at all!! 

Thanking you in advance for your involvement and support of Gareth Jones and Electrogenetic.

Vaughn George Eunson :-)

story:
My Story

I am a born & raised musician from Namibia (Africa) that steadily worked his way up the tough music industry spreading the Afro rhythm to first world countries. End of 2018 I won the German X-Factor with my Band which motivated me to give it another push for my special sound, so I invited 4 top German music producers and a Filmmaker to my homeland in Africa! We set out and created the "Game Changer" (Album) and filmed the whole process of creativeness in the middle of the African wildlife and desert.



...BUT THEN after being turned down by the Major Label I was signed to, various other Record labels and so-called industry moguls (...bare in mind - none of them even had a listen to my demo Album!!!)
...I quickly realized that without proper funding - this masterpiece of connected culture sounds between Europe & Africa will not be released and reach the audience it deserves to spread the positive dancing music vibes of Africa!

THIS IS MY BEST ALBUM I HAVE EVER DONE!!!
...so I am putting in all my effort and knowledge to make this CHANGE the GAME and even have the whole making of the album be professionally filmed into a cinema movie.
But I cannot do this alone so I am asking for your help to be part of this moment in time and PROVE the stubborn/greedy music industry WRONG!!!
...show them that music from the soul is priceless.

    Your SUPPORT will ...

    • get my raw demo album mixed and mastered by top German studio engineers & studios
    • get the independent radio, tv & online promoter push to the launch
    • shoot 3 high-end music videos & full cover/poster/online designs done
    • get the album pressed on CD and USB and shipped to you
    • get the cinema movie of the album edited/color-corrected & 5.1 sound designed
    • get the film into independent cinemas in Germany/Austria & Switzerland & online
    • prove the commercial music industry wrong
    • SHOW WHAT WE CAN ACHIEVE TOGETHER!!!

    Here a budget overview if we get the minimum of 12k through crowdfunding - of course, I could do way more in case we get over the target:

    To everybody that supports me outside of Germany, Austria & Switzerland that cannot make it to a cinema in the area will, of course, will get an online premiere video stream link to watch the full "Game Changer" Film with me from an online link.
    For those in the area - we will send you a list of cinemas that will be open to playing my documentary in their cinemas.

    AND FINALLY ...I have decided to give 100% of all my streaming income from the Album (the first 12 months after release) to various Rhino Funds in Namibia - let music heal the world!

    THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT - Spread the word about my campaign and tell your friends & family by sharing it!
    ...let's show them it can be DONE.
    yours

    EES
story_txt:
My Story
I am a born & raised musician from Namibia (Africa) that steadily worked his way up the tough music industry spreading the Afro rhythm to first world countries. End of 2018 I won the German X-Factor with my Band which motivated me to give it another push for my special sound, so I invited 4 top German music producers and a Filmmaker to my homeland in Africa! We set out and created the "Game Changer" (Album) and filmed the whole process of creativeness in the middle of the African wildlife and desert....BUT THEN after being turned down by the Major Label I was signed to, various other Record labels and so-called industry moguls (...bare in mind - none of them even had a listen to my demo Album!!!)...I quickly realized that without proper funding - this masterpiece of connected culture sounds between Europe & Africa will not be released and reach the audience it deserves to spread the positive dancing music vibes of Africa!
THIS IS MY BEST ALBUM I HAVE EVER DONE!!!...so I am putting in all my effort and knowledge to make this CHANGE the GAME and even have the whole making of the album be professionally filmed into a cinema movie.But I cannot do this alone so I am asking for your help to be part of this moment in time and PROVE the stubborn/greedy music industry WRONG!!!...show them that music from the soul is priceless.



Your SUPPORT will ...


get my raw demo album mixed and mastered by top German studio engineers & studios
get the independent radio, tv & online promoter push to the launch
shoot 3 high-end music videos & full cover/poster/online designs done
get the album pressed on CD and USB and shipped to you
get the cinema movie of the album edited/color-corrected & 5.1 sound designed
get the film into independent cinemas in Germany/Austria & Switzerland & online
prove the commercial music industry wrong
SHOW WHAT WE CAN ACHIEVE TOGETHER!!!

Here a budget overview if we get the minimum of 12k through crowdfunding - of course, I could do way more in case we get over the target:


To everybody that supports me outside of Germany, Austria & Switzerland that cannot make it to a cinema in the area will, of course, will get an online premiere video stream link to watch the full "Game Changer" Film with me from an online link.For those in the area - we will send you a list of cinemas that will be open to playing my documentary in their cinemas.

AND FINALLY ...I have decided to give 100% of all my streaming income from the Album (the first 12 months after release) to various Rhino Funds in Namibia - let music heal the world!THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT - Spread the word about my campaign and tell your friends & family by sharing it!...let's show them it can be DONE.yours
EES

story:
A NEW Abney Park ALBUM FOR 2020!
And a STREAMING CONCERT to celebrate!


Esoterica

This October 31st we will be releasing Abney Park's 2020 album, Esoterica! This album is 12 amazing original Abney Park songs, never before released. 

  • Esoterica
  • I know Why the Killers Kill
  • Dank and Dusty Dark and Dreary
  • Gotta Look Away
  • Batten Down The Hatches
  • Been Round The World
  • Turn Up The Noise
  • Don't Let Love Die
  • A Study In Insanity
  • Same Setting Different Story
  • The Jynxed
  • The World Has Gone To Hell

All your favorite Abney Park sounds, in 12 new songs. 

And a live concert to celebrate! 



The day the album goes on sale, we'll be celebrating with a live streamed concert! And you can get the album, and the concert, bundled together for one low cost!

Abney Park will be performing for you, live from our steampunk recording studio. That means flawless sound quality, and amazing visuals, in a riotous and fun full concert! Not bad for $15 bucks, and you don't even have to get off the sofa!

The concert will be held at noon, Pacific Standard Time, which is about 20:00 in Europe. This is our first Europe friendly time slot, so hopefully this works out for everyone. 


CONCERT TIME:
Noon in Seattle, which is:
22:00 in Moscow
20:00 in Paris, Amsterdam, and Frankfurt.
19:00 in London. 

​But you can view the concert at any time you want, after it airs!

DOWNLOAD VIDEO AND AUDIO FOR THE CONCERT:
To simply things, if you want to download the audio and video from the concert, you can add them both to any other perk for another $10. Easy-peasy. (Give me a couple weeks after the concert to get these posted and perfect.)


VIP After Party

After the main concert, we always have our VIP after party. This is a deluxe package, and wow, things get crazy. 

Its sort of like that TV show Drunk History, but if it was a concert. You see, Abney Park will play a whole additional show, but this time we do shots in between songs!  So with each song we get progressively more drunk, until the songs devolve into something a bit more...unexpected? (I even did a 5 minute rap last time... and it was horrible!)

This is more of an "adult" experience.

story:
DARK SARAH - GRIM - NEW ALBUM

Third single "Illumintae" OUT NOW!

Second single "All Ears!" out NOW!

 
First single "Melancholia" out NOW!
 
Meet Korku, the beekeeper of Grim! Grim honey now available here on IGG!


4th cinematic metal album will start a new storyline with a horror fantasy theme.

Please choose a perk, unfortunately we can´t accept donations.

(Want to contribute via PayPal? Please go to www.darksarahwebstore.com to participate the shadow campaign )

About Dark Sarah

Dark Sarah is a cinematic metal band from Finland. It is lead by Heidi Parviainen, a classically trained singer, songwriter and a story teller. Musically Dark Sarah combines elements of film music, metal music, music theater and opera.  Dark Sarah´s music is built around continuing dark fantasy stories.

The first trilogy "The Chronicles" - including albums "Behind the Black Veil", "The Puzzle"  and "The Golden Moth" - tells a story of a woman called Sarah and her evil alter ego Dark Sarah. The Chronicles trilogy ends tragically to Dark Sarah´s death. 

 

New album story

The fourth album called "Grim" will lead us into a new time and space with a new protagonist called "Luna". Who is she? What is the mystery city called Grim? What are "The Orbs", who are "The Ravens" or rabbit headed people? And who is "Mörk"?

You will find the answers to all this and more along with the new, fresh Dark Sarah album.

 

Your helps matters

Dark Sarah´s first trilogy was fully funded by You, our loyal fans, who bought the music and other perks in advance, and gave us the financial opportunity to record & produce the music and cover the costs. The albums have been released world wide and have received amazing feedback. Thank you!

If you are not familiar with the first trilogy, you can read it here:
http://www.darksarah.com/chronicles/

 

 

Our crowdfunding goal

We want to offer you THE BEST quality in our music and production. We have just recently signed a record deal with Napalm Records and we still need to fund everything mainly on our own. In order to cover the costs for our new album (recording, mixing, arranging, producing & mastering the music, shooting new music videos and buying & preparing the campaign perks), we would need your help to reach 25 000€.

(From the funds we raise, we need to pay 24% VAT + the Indie Gogo fees & credit card fees.)

 

Become one of the Luna Children by contributing

We have prepared amazing perks for you to choose from. Many of the perks are designed only for this campaign and you can´t get them anywhere else. 

By contributing you will become an official Luna Child! When you buy a perk, you will receive a diploma with your name on it. By contributing for 250€ or more, you will get a special silver diploma with your name on it.

You can also help us by sharing the word about Dark Sarah and this campaign. We appreciate every bit of your support!

Yours truly, DARK SARAH

(Heidi, Sami, Erkka, Thomas and Rude)

www.darksarah.com

www.darksarahwebstore.com/

www.facebook.com/darksarahhq

www.instagram.com/darksarahofficial/​

www.youtube.com/user/DarkSarahOfficial

twitter.com/DarkSarahHQ

story:
Short Summary

Under the guise of Exposed Brick I have been recording & releasing electronic music for a number of years, garnering numerous fans & enjoying regular air play (e.g. Chris Currie at Mersey Radio, Artefaktor Radio in Mexico, White Lion Radio (Manchester), In The Moog at NCCR to name just a few). The logical next step is a physical release.

This set of 8 electronic tracks has been almost a year in the making, since the original idea surfaced when re-reading Koestler's "Darkness At Noon". There is a thematic consistency to the pieces though I will leave listeners to make the connections. Styles range from minimalist electronica to synthpop; several tracks are instrumental, some have spoken-word & a few have yours truly on vocal duties!

I'm proud of this music, all of which I have composed & recorded solo, & believe that it will be appreciated by many people who may not yet have heard my work.

To commit to a limited run of 200 12" vinyl EPs involves considerable costs, hence this crowdfunder.

What We Need & What You Get

The limited edition (200) EP requires ~£1500 to get off the ground. Costs are the professional mixing & mastering at Satélite Estudios (Oviedo) (already completed) where I have a very reasonable deal with Jorge Otero, for the physical manufacture of the EPs & record sleeves, & shipping. I am not looking to profit financially from this crowdfunder, but rather to recoup the costs & bask in the glorious knowledge that something I have created is sitting proudly in houses in the UK, Spain & beyond, & hopefully getting an occasional spin & providing some joy/entertainment.

You can commit solely to pre-ordering the record. This is obviously a great help.

Or, you can pre-order the record + some delightful experiences/additional products (see perks). This will be even more help!

If I don't reach the full amount I will hopefully still be able to go ahead, using monies raised to pay the studio costs & contribute to the the manufacture, then recouping the rest through sales. And 3 record shops (Dig Vinyl & Collect & Survive in Liverpool, + Alta Fidelidad in Oviedo) have already agreed to stock the EP.

The Impact

This music deserves a release, & not just as a digital file. It merits a physical existence. All pieces are original & have never before been released. I have dedicated almost a year to composition & recording, painstakingly amending, crafting & improving each track until it sounds as it now does. The artwork has been created by the brilliant Andy Butler. Hence, I can offer a beautiful & unique object. Own it, enjoy it, again & again. Be one of the select 200.

Risks & Challenges

There are zero risks to contributors. I fully expect to raise enough to be able to go ahead with the project. If I do not feel able to proceed, I will return all contributions.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, or even if you can/have, sharing & promoting the project online in order to further raise awareness is obviously immensely helpful. Pop into Dig or Collect & Survive & ask when the EP will drop! Everyone can help in some way - including you!

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I'm John Muirhead, an indie-folk artist based in Toronto, Canada. 

• Over the past four years, I've played my music across the country and have self released three EPs. 

• I've shared the stage with some of Canada's best musicians, including Craig Cardiff, Joel Plaskett, Arkells, and many, many more.

• My music has been featured across the country on CBC, SiriusXM, community radio, and television networks like Global and CTV.

• I've played 200+ shows on moving trains, at folk festivals, in backyards, coffee houses, bars, and living rooms. 

• I've worked with some of the best songwriting, performance, and music business mentors in Canada, including John K Samson, Christine Fellows, Graydon James, Lorraine Lawson, Jadea Kelly, and more.

•In  2017, I was nominated Canadian Folk Music Award ​for Young Performer of the Year.

• All the while, I've been writing some of the best songs I've ever written and slowly compiling them into my first full-length album! 

Along with Toronto-based producer Taylor Lucas, I've been hard at work editing, arranging, and recording these songs to make them as amazing as possible for you. As you know, recording and releasing an album is an expensive investment, and I'd love to have you join in on the process!

 

 

Budget and Financial Goals

The total budget of this album release is approximately $7500. This includes tracking, mixing, mastering, content creation, and marketing. I plan to raise $2500 from this campaign - the rest will be self-funded, along with pending grant funding.

The funds raised from this campaign will help to pay some of the up-front costs associated with the early stages of the recording process - production costs, session musicians, and album-related merchandise. 

Here are some of the costs that independent musicians must consider in the making of a full-length album:


- Mixing - the time-consuming process of blending the sounds together cohesively.
- Mastering - the final "cherry on top" to make the final track sound amazing.
- Production - a producer is kind of like an editor - making sure the songs are as strong as possible and the parts within it fit into the bigger picture. These costs also include time at the studio.
- Collaborators - paying fair wages to everyone involved (producers, engineers, musicians)
- Marketing - Large, yet crucial cost to getting our music to new ears (hiring radio trackers and publishers, digital advertising, showcasing, etc)

The Impact

It's clear to me that the time is now to release a full-length album. After self-releasing three EPs, I'm hungry to create a full-length statement - a project that shows the world who I am as a musician and as a songwriter. 

The release of this album will be the backbone of my marketing, content creation, and touring for the next year. It will allow me to share more music with the world, play on bigger stages, and connect with more amazing people, just like you!

This campaign gives you the unique opportunity to be a part of the creation of an album that has potential to leave a lasting impression in the music community across Canada and beyond - and I'd love to have you as part of my team. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the means to donate now, don't worry! There are many ways to support my journey:

-Share this campaign on social media

-Request my songs on your local CBC station

-Stream my music for free on Spotify or Apple Music

-Encourage friends and family to attend a concert

story:
Long lost Hammerbox songs recently discovered!

For a good part of the early 90s, Hammerbox dominated the NW music scene and seemed ready to take over the world at any moment. They toured the relentlessly (much to the delight of thousands and thousands of fans), released fantastic albums, had songs in movies and video games and without a doubt, left an impression on everyone lucky enough to cross their path.

 

While working on the Goodness on vinyl project way back in 2017 (LPR002), we manage to unearth a reel that surprisingly contained a couple of Hammerbox songs that were recorded (obviously) but, never actually saw the light of day. Until now.

 

Capturing the band's undeniable brilliance right at their beginning in 1990, these songs show just how great the band was from the start. It's rare to get a chance to find recordings like this to share with people and we're so excited to do so.

 

With your help, we plan on releasing a 2-song 7" of the previously unreleased Hammerbox songs, Tragic Static and Down In The Hammerbox. PLUS a bonus alternate version of Hammerbox's Under The Moon (that has a lush jazzy feel to it) will be included with the digital download for this release as well.

 

We've put together some pretty cool campaign perks to help us achieve the funding goal to make this happen, including brand new Hammerbox shirts, hats, test pressings, and even a couple of copies of the band's first 7" autographed by ALL THE BAND MEMBERS!

 

If you're a fan of the band you won't want to miss out on getting your hands on a copy of this limited edition colored vinyl 7"

 

Thank you for reading this far and helping spread the word!

 

-Hammerbox & Latent Print Records

story:
I’m super excited to announce that my very First Album is almost here! Will you help me launch it? :) It is a combination of Eastern flavours with Dream Pop vocals and a Rock instrumentation. If you like the sound of this, you’re in for a treat! 

BRAND NEW BUNDLE IS OUT NOW! CHECK IT OUT. IT IS THE FEATURED ONE! 

~ Click on the Bundles (to the right or at the top of this page, depending on your device) to see what's in them :)

~ FOR PAYPAL OPTION GO HERE: https://hellenashop.net/collections/demythed-crowdfunding

~~~~~~~~~~~~

A Personal Message from Hellena:

The debut album has been in the works for more than 4 and a half years! I am very proud of this material and happy to share it with you! It takes a lot to make an album and to create an experience around the music with visuals (artwork, videos etc). In this case, financially speaking, it takes much more than what this campaign goal is asking for...

I am a 100% independent artist and this means I am 100% responsible for managing the entire project, the financing, the creation of the music, the merchandise... everything.

By pre-ordering an exclusive & limited to this campaign bundle, you become an integral part of this project. Your contribution will help bring this album to the world in 2020!

Your involvement in making this album a success will also prove that we can make it on our own without middlemen and labels... which... is... awesome! 

Join me on this mythical journey and let’s launch this together! 

 

~ A bit of a Backstory ~

I consider myself an underdog and a dreamer. I couldn't speak English when I was writing lyrics in English, I didn’t receive guidance from my parents as a child to cultivate my music gifts (it's ok.. they didn't know better), I grew up in a household of domestic violence where seeing hurt and pain was normal. I didn't start cultivating my voice until I was old enough to make decisions for myself. I started later in life it seems, but I'm doing this! Will you help me launch my debut album? :)

Many phenomenal musicians (check them out further below) based in 5 different countries gave their heart and soul to bring this album to life. 

 

~ The Artwork ~

It’s been a couple of years since I immersed myself in ancient Greek mythology. So many characters, so many stories, aaahhh… it’s always such an immersive experience reading it. The imagination can run wild!

I was influenced so much by the mythology and chose a character that depicts the theme of the album well, that of Medusa. A beautiful maiden who went through hell and paid a heavy price for the sins of others. She and even the sound of her name spread horror and fear after having been metamorphosed into a monster, to nowadays being a symbol of power especially for women all around the world! Many things in our lives get Demythed at some point :)

 

~ The Concept & Title ~

The concept for this album is simple: we are all on a unique path, a journey between light and darkness. Balancing life seems impossible at times and even if we lose our way, we have to come back wiser and stronger.

The title for this album is called "Demythed". I wanted to find a word that reflects the concept. Sometimes things aren't as they seem. You can have a specific idea of what a situation would feel like if you lived it, and when you do, it can be completely different to what you expected, right? Demythed seemed the perfect title to me.

It is a word that symbolises change, rebirth. The word doesn't actually exist. I was watching  an interview with David Bowie, while trying to make up a word with the root "myth", and he did it for me! In that interview he said "demythed"!! And I thought... THIS IS IT! That's the Title! Thaaaaanks David! :)

 

 ~ The Story & Sound ~

Some songs I wrote years ago and some of them recently. Due to this, you’ll find an eclectic mix of sounds on this album which I think makes it fresh and unique. Even though each song has its own character and individuality, they all fit together like a glove.

With that said, you’ll find ethereal and distorted sounds, elaborate and very simple orchestrations, siren type vocals but raw ones too. Get ready for a mythical journey my friend!

This album is by far my best work and I haven’t given so much time and effort to anything else in my life! You'll hear it soon enough. Let me know what you think. :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 

~ DEMYTHED - TRACKLIST ~

1. Demythed

2. Crazy 

3. Birds of a Feather

4. Rhythm of Misery

5. Powerful Deluge

6. Nobody Knows

7. A Little Too Late

8. Hopes and Dreams

9. Starry Night

 

It might surprise you to know that it took 4 and a half years roughly to finish this album with only 9 tracks, but being an independent artist takes a lot and it's taken me everything I’ve got to do this. my energy, my soul, my money... my whole being heh :)

I hope you'll love this album as much as I have loved birthing it! 

 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~ Musicians On This Album ~

Hellena - Songwriting, Lyrics, Vocals, Keys, Guitar, Production

Location: United Kingdom

I have been a songwriter for a while. I don’t usually wait for creativity to hit me, I look for it. Sometimes though, I am lucky, and the songwriting process can start with a melody that pops into my mind either when I’m asleep, or not. I play around with it on the piano or guitar (I recently started writing on the ukulele too.. yay!) , coming up with the basic chord structure which usually changes in the process. I get into the songwriting process without thinking of the genre of music I am creating. This is probably why my music has been so diverse.

 

Denis Efimenko - Production, Arrangement, Guitar, Bass, Keys, Mix, Mastering

Location: Greece

Denis is a Genius! We worked on this album together for years and due to this, we grew together throughout the process. I love his input but especially his guitar playing! It is so enchanting and smooth! I close my eyes every time and I am being hypnotised into another realm..

 

Marco Coti Zelati - Bass (Lacuna Coil)

Location: Italy

This man needs no introductions. He’s so giving and always makes me laugh with his incredible sense of humour… it's very Italian :) I cannot express with words how grateful I am that he took part in this project, and especially on a song that means so much to me as it talks about a serious issue, that of domestic violence, called “A little too late”. I only have 1 complaint. I still haven’t tried his delicious-looking cooking on Instagram! :)

 

~ More Beautiful Musicians Involved: ~

Lef Germenlis  - Production, Arrangements, Orchestration, Keys (Until Rain)

Location: United Kingdom

Is there anything that this guy cannot do? I don’t think so! Apart from being one of the best pianists I know, he is also a beautiful human being and I am so happy he graced us with his time and talent on this album!

 

Babis Nikou - Eastern Instruments (Dia Mageias)

Location: Greece

Such a talented musician Babis is! 90% of the Eastern instruments you’ll hear on this album were recorded by him! His bouzouki and santouri will take you to other worlds.

 

Thomas Miller - Drums & Percussion (Caper Parade)

Location: United Kingdom

The drums and percussion Thomas added to this album were incredible. His drumming is classy plus he recorded without a metronome which… well, it takes some skills to do it right...

 

Tom Mandolini - Production/Orchestration/Keys

Location: Switzerland

It was such a pleasure to work with Tom and totally unexpected too! He emailed me one day with a song of mine he had remixed and I was like: “Dude!...this is great! let’s work together!” I sent him the demo of “Demythed” right after! His strings orchestration is like no other! So incredibly talented and such a nice and humble guy he is. I really hope we will work together again! 

 

Owen Smalley - Guitar (on Demythed)

Location: United Kingdom

Owen arrived last into this music project. He was like the icing on a cake, or the cherry on top. :) His sparse and minimal feel is beautiful and completed the Demythed song. He has such an excellent music taste this guy!

 

Ethan Bernhardt - Piano

Location: United States

Life is so much better when you work with nice people and Ethan is the nicest ever! I am so lucky to call him my friend, he is a real artist and always up for a new project. When I sent him my ideas for "Hopes and Dreams", he just recorded his in absolutely no time. His piano playing is magical and heartbreaking… in a great way :)

 

~ Other Contributors ~

Guy - Graphic Artist & Designer
Location: Israel

Guy has been very patient with me and all of the changes I have been asking him to do.. and they were plenty. :) We have a beautiful understanding between us even though we’ve never met and my collaboration with him taught me that things can work from loooong distance, if there is good chemistry between two people who never met. I consider him a friend already and I'm glad to have him in my team!

 

Yiannis Katsaris - Photography

Location: United Kingdom

This was the second time I’ve worked with Yiannis as the first one was for “The Parthenon Marbles” artwork cover. He is so easy to work with and I have good memories of us being in the studio. Both times we had a lot of fun. It is so important to have fun while working and Yiannis was definitely the right photographer to work with.

 

Teresa Fernandez - Body painting (Ephemeral art)

Location: United Kingdom

I found this lovely lady in an endless sea of Google information while looking for a body painter and as soon as we talked on the phone, I just knew she would be my body painter. She is incredible, a sweetheart, punctual and I already miss working with her. sniff.. :(

 

Mike Partington - Personal Assistant
Location: United Kingdom

If it wasn’t for this guy, I don’t know where I would be! He is always...always... Always there! He saved me from a lot of spelling mistakes in English hah... did you think I was fluent in English? No... I am not! ..Mike is! :) and apart from that, he has a big heart and is always 100% committed to our project. Thank you Mike!

~ Budget & Behind the Scenes ~

Nothing worthwhile is easy.  This album is no different. Even though it takes more than what this campaign goal is asking for in order to create it.. with your help, I can launch this album in 2020! Let’s do this! Let’s reach the campaign’s goal! 

There are challenges I face as an independent artist, and yet, they are totally worth it. The support my fans show melts my heart. They are my angels and I love to heavily involve them in my world. I am lucky to have them in my life and their support allows me to keep on releasing music.  You keep the music alive. you really do x 

 

~ How You Can Be Involved ~

Grab a limited edition bundle below or to the right of this page (make sure you click on the bundles to see what's in them.)

Exclusive to this campaign bundle! With both digital album downloads as well as personalised gifts, you will have everything you need! *It can also be a great gift to someone you love! :)

*This bundle was at 14% Off for the first 48 hours of the campaign. I had to re create the bundle with its original price due to Indiegogo page limitations. Due to this, it now doesn't show the actual amount of people who have claimed it, and so, I had to further limit its order capacity :)

This bundle includes:

  • Digital Album Download
  • Instrumental Album Download
  • Your Name in the next Video!
  • Signed “Demythed” Lyric Sheet
  • Limited Signed Photocard
  • SHIPPING INCLUDED!

Limited to 135 orders

 

This is a limited-time-only bundle that you must act on now as it won’t be available after the campaign is over! It can be a great gift for someone you love! :)

The Bundle includes:

  • Autographed CD with 8 page booklet
  • Digital Album Download
  • Instrumental Album Download
  • Your Name in the next Video!
  • Signed “Demythed” Lyric Sheet
  • Limited Signed Photocard
  • SHIPPING INCLUDED!

Limited to 120 orders

 

Fan of Vinyl? I've got you! :) Now is the time to grab your Vintage Bundle my friend. This is limited & exclusive to this campaign & won't be available after this campaign is over. 

This bundle includes:

  • Autographed CD with 8 page booklet
  • Autographed Vinyl
  • Digital Album Download
  • Instrumental Album Download
  • Your Name in the next Video!
  • Signed “Demythed” Lyric Sheet
  • Limited Signed Photocard
  • Q&A + Early Listening Party
  • SHIPPING INCLUDED!

Limited to 100 orders

 

This is it! The very ultimate of all bundles I've ever created! This is a limited-time-only and exclusive to this campaign bundle that you must act on now as it won’t be available after this campaign is over! Oh myyyy hurryyy! :D 

*Your name will be printed on both Vinyl (140G) & Jewel CD for all eternity! - We’ll hook up online for an exclusive live show & you’ll receive a digital DVD of the show to relive the experience whenever you want! AND I will add some special behind the scenes footage! Rejoice! :)

This bundle includes:

  • Your name on CD + Vinyl
  • Private Online Live Show + Digital DVD of the show + Special Backstage Footage
  • Autographed Vinyl
  • Autographed CD with 8 page booklet
  • Digital Album Download
  • Instrumental Album Download
  • Your Name in the next Video!
  • Signed “Demythed” Lyric Sheet
  • Limited Signed Photocard
  • Q&A + Early Listening Party
  • SHIPPING INCLUDED!

Limited to 20 orders!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~ How we can achieve the goal: ~

- Pre-order an exclusive bundle

- Join the official Hellena Street Team: https://www.facebook.com/groups/hellenateam/

- Post the bundle you bought on Facebook/Instagram/Twitter

- Encourage your friends to also join us and help us launch the debut album!

 

~ Other ways you can help: ~

- Post this URL on Facebook: https://igg.me/at/hellena

- Post to your stories or send private messages to friends.

- Join my Newsletter to stay updated on the Campaign plus you'll receive 5 Free Songs: https://hellena.lpages.co/dreampop/

- SHARE this campaign every few days with your friends - Look for the Share buttons at the top of this campaign - You must be logged in your account if you want to win referral prizes.

 

The album is dedicated to all Dreamers out there who might have started later in life and never give up. I can’t wait to have you on this mythical music journey with me. This is gonna be amazing! Let’s do this! 

Hellena.

story:
QUI EST FRANCIS?

Fan inconditionnel des chanteurs populaires québécois, Francis se laisse imprégner par ces grandes voix tout au long de son enfance. Il fait ses débuts très jeune à l’aide d’un système karaoké avec lequel il développe son talent. À l’âge de 13 ans, il participe à son premier concours où il interprète la seule chanson qu’il connaît par coeur. Cet événement lui donne la poussée nécessaire à la poursuite de ses rêves puisqu’il se classe parmi les cinq finalistes. Depuis 10 ans, Francis poursuit sa route et se fait découvrir peu à peu sur la scène musicale.

Finissant du Cégep de St-Hyacinthe en exploration théâtrale et ayant étudié au Cégep de Drummondville en chant pop/jazz, Francis Bédard est un interprète au grand cœur et à la voix puissante et envoûtante. Le nom de Francis Bédard ne tarde à se faire connaître. Son talent toujours grandissant, sa volonté et sa passion le pousseront vers des projets grandioses.

En plus de ses études en théâtre et en chant, Francis a su parfaire son talent par le biais de plusieurs spectacles et concours. Ceci lui a permis d’acquérir une grande expérience sur scène. Il a d’ailleurs remporté plusieurs prix et distinctions dans les dernières années. En 2010, il s’est démarqué plus particulièrement au Concours Bêtes de Scène ainsi qu’au Festival de la chanson Expo-Relève de Saint-Constant. Il a été lauréat et finaliste dans plusieurs autres concours entre 2004 et 2010. Francis faisait également partie de la distribution de l’opéra pop-rock ‘’La vie des anges’’ présenté au Théâtre St-Denis en avril 2012 aux côtés de Marie-Ève Côté (Star Académie). En 2015, on l’aperçoit très ému sur les écrans de millions de québécois lors de son passage à la populaire émission La Voix. Cette aventure lui donnera l'énergie nécessaire à la poursuite de ses rêves! 

"Ce projet est important pour moi car il m'aidera à réaliser le plus grand rêve de ma vie, celui d'avoir un album à moi et le partager avec vous tous et toutes. Il me permettra enfin de révéler qui je suis, personnellement et artistiquement''.

 

NOTRE BUT

Notre but commun est d'amasser 10 000 $ pour la réalisation complète de mon nouvel album comprenant des chansons originales écrites par mes meilleurs collaborateurs de l'industrie musicale québécoise tels que: Marc-André Sauvageau, Karine Ste-Marie, Mathieu Langevin et Marc-André Bourbonnais (également le réalisateur de mon premier album EP).

10 000 $ c'est beaucoup d'argent... mais 10 000 $ pour la réalisation d'un album, c'est très peu. Normalement, la réalisation et commercialisation complète (album 10 chansons) d'un album coûte entre 30 000 et 50 000 $. 

J'ai la chance d'avoir à mes côtés un réalisateur qui croit en mon projet et qui est prêt à investir de son temps dans cet album qui me tient à cœur.  Ce réalisateur de talent travaille actuellement auprès de Bobby Bazini en tant que musicien et a également travaillé sur le projet de l'album éponyme de ma grande amie disparue, Geneviève Breton.
 
Si par bonheur, j'arrivais à dépasser l'objectif financier actuel,  j'investirai cet argent à la production de d'autres chansons, ainsi qu'à leur commercialisation. De cette façon, mes chansons pourront voyager et toucher le plus de gens possible et ce, grâce à vous! 
 
Les contreparties personnalisées que je vous offre sont essentiellement de revoir l'album avant tout le monde, d'être mentionné dans la pochette, d'entendre en version ''LIVE'' mes chansons dans votre salon et d'assister en tant qu'invité(e)s VIP à mon lancement d'album. 
 

Risques et défis

Je suis pleinement conscient du risque à vouloir réaliser cette campagne de socio-financement.  10 000 $ c'est beaucoup d'argent, mais c'est également le prix à payer pour réaliser mon rêve de produire et commercialiser un premier VRAI album! Cet album sera le mien et sera aussi beaucoup le vôtre. 

Nous pouvons atteindre ce but et relever ce défi. J'en suis certain! 

 

D'autres façons d'aider

Certaines personnes ne pourront pas contribuer monétairement, mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas me venir en aide pour la réalisation de mon projet :

  • SVP, passez le mot, partagez cette page sur vos réseau sociaux, parlez de moi. Je vous aime beaucoup et vous suis plus que reconnaissant!
story_txt:
QUI EST FRANCIS?
Fan inconditionnel des chanteurs populaires québécois, Francis se laisse imprégner par ces grandes voix tout au long de son enfance. Il fait ses débuts très jeune à l’aide d’un système karaoké avec lequel il développe son talent. À l’âge de 13 ans, il participe à son premier concours où il interprète la seule chanson qu’il connaît par coeur. Cet événement lui donne la poussée nécessaire à la poursuite de ses rêves puisqu’il se classe parmi les cinq finalistes. Depuis 10 ans, Francis poursuit sa route et se fait découvrir peu à peu sur la scène musicale.
Finissant du Cégep de St-Hyacinthe en exploration théâtrale et ayant étudié au Cégep de Drummondville en chant pop/jazz, Francis Bédard est un interprète au grand cœur et à la voix puissante et envoûtante. Le nom de Francis Bédard ne tarde à se faire connaître. Son talent toujours grandissant, sa volonté et sa passion le pousseront vers des projets grandioses.
En plus de ses études en théâtre et en chant, Francis a su parfaire son talent par le biais de plusieurs spectacles et concours. Ceci lui a permis d’acquérir une grande expérience sur scène. Il a d’ailleurs remporté plusieurs prix et distinctions dans les dernières années. En 2010, il s’est démarqué plus particulièrement au Concours Bêtes de Scène ainsi qu’au Festival de la chanson Expo-Relève de Saint-Constant. Il a été lauréat et finaliste dans plusieurs autres concours entre 2004 et 2010. Francis faisait également partie de la distribution de l’opéra pop-rock ‘’La vie des anges’’ présenté au Théâtre St-Denis en avril 2012 aux côtés de Marie-Ève Côté (Star Académie). En 2015, on l’aperçoit très ému sur les écrans de millions de québécois lors de son passage à la populaire émission La Voix. Cette aventure lui donnera l'énergie nécessaire à la poursuite de ses rêves! 
"Ce projet est important pour moi car il m'aidera à réaliser le plus grand rêve de ma vie, celui d'avoir un album à moi et le partager avec vous tous et toutes. Il me permettra enfin de révéler qui je suis, personnellement et artistiquement''.

Risques et défis
Je suis pleinement conscient du risque à vouloir réaliser cette campagne de socio-financement.  10 000 $ c'est beaucoup d'argent, mais c'est également le prix à payer pour réaliser mon rêve de produire et commercialiser un premier VRAI album! Cet album sera le mien et sera aussi beaucoup le vôtre. 
Nous pouvons atteindre ce but et relever ce défi. J'en suis certain! 
 

D'autres façons d'aider
Certaines personnes ne pourront pas contribuer monétairement, mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas me venir en aide pour la réalisation de mon projet :
SVP, passez le mot, partagez cette page sur vos réseau sociaux, parlez de moi. Je vous aime beaucoup et vous suis plus que reconnaissant!

story:
Quick Summary

"TIME TO LOVE AGAIN" will be my 8th CD project (!!) and I'm excited to have recorded it in the birthplace of my career - MIAMI! The musical team that joined me in the studio represent some of the finest musicians in the world, some who I've known for close to 15 years.  

I'd love and appreciate your support of this campaign to help complete the CD-making process, which includes mixing; mastering; art design; manufacturing; and promo.

In my 20-year full-time career, I've been so fortunate to entertain audiences worldwide and earn three TOP 10 jazz albums in the U.S. and Japan.  I pray this album can also reach peoples' hearts internationally.   

 

What is Needed & What You Get

The goal is to raise $20,000 of which most would go toward marketing and promotion. We will complete the 'music making' by mixing the tracks and mastering those tracks in the studio. Then comes the CD design and manufacturing. Then all kinds of promotion...from jazz & smooth jazz/adult urban radio, to general PR, to social media, and online advertising. If we are able to raise more than the our goal, we can expand the promo plan in both time and concentration. (I was once told, the average marketing spend is $2 per person you want to impact...wow!)

IN RETURN, campaign participants will ALL receive a FREE digital download of the CD and, depending on your level of participation, additional perks like T-shirts; autographed CDs; CD liner note mentions; associate producer credits and EVEN your own 1-hour acoustic house concert! IN ADDITION, I will post photo and video updates of behind-the-scenes activity! 

 

The Impact

Six out of seven of my CDs were self-funded. Though in 2011, my Embraceable CD gained additional support ❤️ through a crowd-funding campaign via ArtistShare. The financial support from that campaign helped pay for promo which helped get that CD to TOP 20 on Jazz Radio and Smooth Jazz Radio Charts! That promo also helped get the single "Waiting in Vain" added to the Sirius XM 'Watercolors' station on which it still plays today! Also recently added to that station's playlist was the April 2021 single release "Feeling Good" which hails from THIS new CD, Time to Love Again. We hope this is a good sign of more to come...fingers crossed! When music is heard and well-received, it eventually opens more doors to venues and audiences around the world.

So in short - your support of my music will put wind in my wings and help my music soar into the ears of listeners worldwide. Your support helps GREATLY☺️. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also spread the word of this campaign on social media or via email to your music-loving friends. There are 'share tools' here on the IndieGoGo page. THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!

story:
COVID-19 UPDATE: My show has been postponed. However, the recording and plans for this crowdfunding are not cancelled as this show will be rescheduled ASAP!

This year and the last one has been a crazy ride for me. Beste Zangers, a solotour and of course the upcoming Nightwish album and world tour! I have always been aware that many people still wanted to see my solo show or were unable to get to see it due to distances or monetary issues.

People are still asking for more shows, but I simply did not have the time to do any more. So what would the alternative be? A live release! With this campaign I want to enable everyone to be able to see the full show and get in touch with my music. This is for you and with you!

With your help I will be able to get the right crew to record the show (video + audio) and the people to process and edit it so you all can see it in all its glory!

 

 

What Is Needed

To make this a reality we are going to need a budget of 25.000 euros. This money will exclusively be used for the production of this release. What you get in return is a digital live release (YouTube and streaming services) for everyone to enjoy (Nightwish fans, Northward fans, new fans)! 

I hope to reach this budget but also have a cool plan ready if we’d to go past this goal. Hence the 35.000 euros goal, which enables us to make an exclusive and professional backstage documentary!

If we happen to achieve this, then 80% of all extra gained funds will go directly to World Land Trust, to support the preservation of our planet through their many unique projects! 

 

Why No Physical Release?

Doing a solo tour plus all preparations for an upcoming Nightwish release and world-tour leaves me with little time left to manage other things. And as this release will not be supported by a label, it would be impossible for me to spend the needed time and energy to get the right team. The production, shipping, returns and all the things that come with distributing a physical release is simply impossible at this moment. 

This is why this is a digital release for you to enjoy on YouTube and streaming platforms!

 

Perks:

Only two different perks are available. Both involve your name being seen in the end video credits and on the dedicated web page for the release. As the release will be publicly available, it would feel wrong to charge all of you a lot. This means that all backers who donate 10 euros or more get their name featured. 

EDIT: Personal videos are not available anymore due to overwhelming success.

What is the plan?

  • 6 Cameras​
    • No cranes due to the sold out venue
  • Audio Mixing & Mastering by Kimmo Ahola​ (Nightwish Live Releases)
  • Artwork to be determined
  • Editing and Production done by FBE Media
  • Release on YouTube with highest quality possible (1080p or upscaled 4K) and streaming platforms (Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer etc.)

story:
Spätkapitalismusik

Sèxe Illégal est enfin devenu capitaliste. Leur prochain album : Spätkapitalismusik, ou musique de capitalisme tardif, est un album de musique capitaliste, mais aussi un album capitaliste de musique. Entièrement composé et produit par le duo légendaire, cette oeuvre marquera un changement de direction musicale pour les deux communistes drogués, qui se sont découvert un nouvel amour pour le « disco » et le « dance », deux genres de musique qu’ils « viennent tout juste d’inventer ».

Pourquoi?

Cette campagne permettra de financer la production entièrement indépendante de l’album. On parle de dépenses comme : acheter du matériel, payer des musiciens, le mix, aller chez le dentiste, le mastering, le pot, la production d’un clip, etc. Plus on va avoir de moyens, plus on va pouvoir vous en offrir en retour (le trickle-down musical).

 

Les options capitalistes

Voici vos options si vous souhaitez participer au projet de société :

12$ (je participe)

Si vous contribuez 12$, vous recevrez l’album Spätkapitalismusik en format numérique.

20$ (j’adore l’art)

Si vous contribuez 20$, vous recevrez l’album Spätkapitalismusik en version numérique ainsi qu’une affiche de l’œuvre de couverture par Julien Charbonneau

100$ (je capote)

Si vous contribuez 100$, vous recevrez le vinyle de l’album Spätkapitalismusik. Tous les vinyles seront fabriqués individuellement et cette version ne sera pas disponible par la suite. C’est un objet de collection offert exclusivement pendant la campagne Indiegogo. Vous recevrez aussi, bien sûr, la version numérique de l’album ainsi que l’affiche de l’œuvre de couverture par Julien Charbonneau.

1 000 000$ (je suis un grand capitaliste)

Si vous contribuez 1 000 000$, vous recevrez l’album Spätkapitalismusik en version numérique, l’affiche de l’œuvre de couverture par Julien Charbonneau, la version vinyle de l’album (import from japan) et vous connaîtrez le bonheur de faire ruisseler la richesse.

 

Quand?

L’album sera prêt à l’automne 2021. Il ne sera pas disponible immédiatement sur les plateformes de streaming. Vous en aurez donc l’exclusivité pour un certain temps. Mais nous nous engageons à le mettre sur Spotify quelque part avant l’an 3000.

Merci de contribuer à la culture indépendante. Fuck la machine. Fuck la pub. Pis fuck la police.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Hollis Webb.  I am a multi-instrumentalist singer/songwriter and producer in San Antonio.  I write and record indie rock music in my home studio in Olmos Park Terrace.  With a little help from my friends, the album I've been working on for the past 6 years is DONE.  

It's D. U. N. 

DONE!

The album will be called Rescue.  We just need some help from you to allow us to press it to 12" vinyl and license the incredible photograph of the submerged polar bear taken by Wildlife Photographer of the Year Joe Bunni.  Let me tell you folks, it is sounding BEAUTIFUL as we are making the final production and mixing touches.  The record is going to sound SO GOOD on vinyl it will be a treat for your ears!

What We Need & The Awesome Things You'll Get

This is a flexible funding campaign.  We must reach our goal of $5000 to master the record especially for vinyl, press vinyl, and then license the photograph for the cover artwork--but even if we don't meet the goal, we will be able to keep what we raise and we will still press CD's and distribute download cards of the record.

<$5000 = CD’s
>$5000 = VINYL AND CD’s WOO-HOO!!!

The Impact

This will be the LAST album I press to a physical medium.  This is the last album in the trilogy of DANGER INVITES RESCUE as well, so this is especially meaningful to me in many ways.  We are going to do some really fun things for you to get this released.  We'll be talking to a few people who helped make the album and get their thoughts on what it was like to record with me in my home studio.  We'll also be talking to some folks who know a lot about vinyl records.

This is going to be a different kind of crowdfunding adventure.  We are going to have FUN telling you about the record, how we made it, and what is next.

Risks & Challenges

If we don't make it to $5000, we're not pressing vinyl, but we WILL press CD's,  We've come too far not to get this out into the world.  All the other perks are guaranteed.  Backers will get a download code for the album at EVERY level.  The record is done, we just need you to be our doula to get it out into the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

PLEASE share this campaign, comment on our posts, ask questions, make jokes, request songs!  We are doing this, folks.  There is no turning back.  Thank you for your help!

story:
STRETCH GOAL #1!  $20K!

If we hit $20K, everyone gets a download of the work tapes of these songs!

But wait til you hear the $30K Stretch Goal!

 

Short Summary

  •  Emmylou Harris calls us her Red Dirt Boys. We've been her rhythm section since 2007.
  • We are Chris Donohue (bass and vocals), Will Kimbrough (guitars, mandolin, and vocals), Phil Madeira (keyboards, guitar, and vocals), Bryan Owings (drums and percussion). Also appearing on the project is the fifth member of Emmy's RDB, the brilliant Eamon McLoughlin (violin and mandolin).
  • We've got two records we want to put in your hands- "Red Dirt Boys" (2019) and "The Real Deal" (2021). Both feature guest performances from Emmylou Harris herself!
  • It's harder than ever to distribute music these days - which is why our 2019 record never formally released - but we're determined to get our music to our fans old and new!
  • As you scroll through our merchandise, please pay attention to the "Add On" sections which will make your RDB experience more fulfilling!  

What We Need & What You Get

Our modest goal of $15,000 will cover manufacturing costs of CDs, Vinyl LPs, and shirts, as well as mixing, mastering, and artwork.  We hope we'll raise enough funds to pay for some marketing and PR as well.

  • Besides the 21 songs between "Red Dirt Boys" and "The Real Deal", we're offering digital downloads of 5 additional songs as well as a recorded running commentary from the band on each record - the process, song meanings, stories, and more!  
  • One featured reward for YOU is the opportunity to sing on our record - and all you need is a smartphone with a voice recording app!
  • If we don't reach our intended goal, our first priority will be making sure YOU receive your backer rewards.  Whatever we have left after you're taken care of will go towards promotion and related costs.

The Impact

  • We're invested in the idea that music can change the world for the better.  Our songs feel good, even when they address life's sorrows and trials.  
  • As individuals, we've run a dozen fundraisers with great success.
  • YOU can help us reach our goal and we can all enjoy this music together.

REFERRAL CONTEST!!

As an incentive to encourage you spread the word to your friends, WE ARE RUNNING A CONTEST!  The backer whose referrals bring in the most money will receive their choice of (A) Double Vinyl, (B) Double CD Plus T Shirt, or (C) the hand-written lyric of their choice!  

Follow these simple instructions in order to receive credit for promoting the project:

  • Make sure you're logged in to Indiegogo.
  • Make use of the Indiegogo sharing tools!  When you share the link, it will contain your unique ID.  When the person you referred reads the tweet or FB share, etc, and clicks through to contribute, Indiegogo will recognize you as the person who helped bring in the amount contributed by the persons you invited.
  • Once the campaign comes to a close, we'll notify the person who leads in funds raised via their referrals.. 
  • Thanks to everyone who shares the campaign!

Risks & Challenges

  • We've done this before.  We take seriously the responsibility of meeting our backers' belief in us.
  • Manufacturing can occasionally take longer than expected but you WILL receive your items.  And if the post office fails to deliver, just let us know and we'll take care of it!

Thanks, everyone!
story_txt:
STRETCH GOAL #1!  $20K!

If we hit $20K, everyone gets a download of the work tapes of these songs!
But wait til you hear the $30K Stretch Goal!
 
Short Summary

 Emmylou Harris calls us her Red Dirt Boys. We've been her rhythm section since 2007.
We are Chris Donohue (bass and vocals), Will Kimbrough (guitars, mandolin, and vocals), Phil Madeira (keyboards, guitar, and vocals), Bryan Owings (drums and percussion). Also appearing on the project is the fifth member of Emmy's RDB, the brilliant Eamon McLoughlin (violin and mandolin).
We've got two records we want to put in your hands- "Red Dirt Boys" (2019) and "The Real Deal" (2021). Both feature guest performances from Emmylou Harris herself!

It's harder than ever to distribute music these days - which is why our 2019 record never formally released - but we're determined to get our music to our fans old and new!
As you scroll through our merchandise, please pay attention to the "Add On" sections which will make your RDB experience more fulfilling!  



What We Need & What You Get
Our modest goal of $15,000 will cover manufacturing costs of CDs, Vinyl LPs, and shirts, as well as mixing, mastering, and artwork.  We hope we'll raise enough funds to pay for some marketing and PR as well.

Besides the 21 songs between "Red Dirt Boys" and "The Real Deal", we're offering digital downloads of 5 additional songs as well as a recorded running commentary from the band on each record - the process, song meanings, stories, and more!  
One featured reward for YOU is the opportunity to sing on our record - and all you need is a smartphone with a voice recording app!
If we don't reach our intended goal, our first priority will be making sure YOU receive your backer rewards.  Whatever we have left after you're taken care of will go towards promotion and related costs.


The Impact

We're invested in the idea that music can change the world for the better.  Our songs feel good, even when they address life's sorrows and trials.  
As individuals, we've run a dozen fundraisers with great success.
YOU can help us reach our goal and we can all enjoy this music together.


REFERRAL CONTEST!!
As an incentive to encourage you spread the word to your friends, WE ARE RUNNING A CONTEST!  The backer whose referrals bring in the most money will receive their choice of (A) Double Vinyl, (B) Double CD Plus T Shirt, or (C) the hand-written lyric of their choice!  
Follow these simple instructions in order to receive credit for promoting the project:

Make sure you're logged in to Indiegogo.
Make use of the Indiegogo sharing tools!  When you share the link, it will contain your unique ID.  When the person you referred reads the tweet or FB share, etc, and clicks through to contribute, Indiegogo will recognize you as the person who helped bring in the amount contributed by the persons you invited.
Once the campaign comes to a close, we'll notify the person who leads in funds raised via their referrals.. 
Thanks to everyone who shares the campaign!

Risks & Challenges

We've done this before.  We take seriously the responsibility of meeting our backers' belief in us.
Manufacturing can occasionally take longer than expected but you WILL receive your items.  And if the post office fails to deliver, just let us know and we'll take care of it!

Thanks, everyone!

story:
Short Summary

I am Jordan Ferrin, a California-based jazz musician who has traveled the world.  Now, I am aiming to create an album of music about it with my project, the Jordan Ferrin Storyband.  But, the album will be more than an album, because I want to combine music and travel.  

Here is an example of how that combination will happen.  This travel package is about Dubai.  There is a whole story to it, and the live recording, entitled "Thinking Of Her From Dubai," represents the story.

This album will have seven pieces of original music, seven full stories, and many, many, photos.  The idea is to read and know the story first, and then have the music complete the whole story. Jazz music, travel writing, and pictures will come together to give the message of global interconnectedness through understanding, compassion, and brotherhood.

 

Edinburgh, Scotland.

 

I worked as a cruise ship musician for over four years.  I did contract after contract, and I went everywhere.  Everywhere.   If you've already traveled to your dream destination, chances are high that I've been there... 

from Singapore:

to Capri:

to Istanbul:

to St. Petersburg:

to New Zealand:

 

I have seen it all....

This will be an album not just of original music, but original tales--hence the title, Tales of Transcendence.  Transcendence is an expansion of normal consciousness through being fully present and concentrated.  You rise above yourself to become a part of something more than yourself.  Transcendence is why this project actually goes beyond me and my experiences.  

I want you and others to know happiness through what I've known.  I want to express how both music and travel not only move us, but guide us the the deepest point within ourselves.  From this point the wisdom of interconnectedness, to everything and everyone, is revealed....  I want to give back to the world what the world gave to me.  Your kindness and generosity will help spread truths that can make the world a better place for us all.  

 

Nice, France.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order for me and my band to bring this message into the world, I definitely need help.  Money is the biggest challenge, and I simply cannot afford all of this on my own.  That's why I'm asking for help to raise $4,500.  This will cover a variety of costs for the album, including:

  • recording
  • mixing and mastering
  • producing
  • album artwork
  • promotion and marketing
  • paying my bandmates for their hard, brilliant work!

 

Now, for what you will receive: 

Every perk's purpose is to connect you to the world in some way.  The album will have seven pieces, and each one has a story--that means everything from captioned photos to entire travel blogs about each piece will be available as perks! 

No matter how much you donate, the perks stack.  You'll get ALL the perks below the price of the perk you choose!

And there's more.  I bet you have a dream destination--somewhere you've always wanted to go.  Honestly, I've probably been there.  So, I have perks that will cater to your dream destination.  I'll tell you about it, from a summary of my time and recommendations for what to do, to a full, personalized travel blog with all the stories of my time in your dream destination!  

 

 

And, that's not all!  For those extremely generous donors, the Jordan Ferrin Storyband will perform for you, too.  If you are here in Southern California, then we can discuss a live performance given Covid-safety concerns.  If you are not in Southern California, then we can certainly do a livestream right to you....

 

NOTE on my photos: 

You'll notice that the quality of my photos varies.  For example, some of them, especially the low-light ones, have tons of grainy noise given high ISO. 

For my first two contracts, I had a pocket camera which produced that grainy noise, and had sub-par megapixels.  Basically, when I started traveling in 2013, I knew nothing about photography gear, nor much of the basics!  All I knew was how to get a good composition for a picture.  Over my years of traveling, I was essentially learning on-the-go!  The most advanced camera I could afford (eventually) was a decent mirrorless, built-in lens that worked quite well.  But however poorly rendered certain photos came out, I took to heart some wisdom from a professional photographer friend on the ship: he said you don't need a great camera if you take great pictures to begin with.  If you are creative and compelling, especially with composition, then you're already halfway there.  

So, do enjoy my variety of different-quality photos, even if they aren't full-frame quality!  I think they still have impact considering the older technology from which they came, and I'm proud of them.  

 

The Impact

Overall, your donations will be honored to bring the music to life.  The perks all come directly from me to you, in all my knowledge and passion for music and travel.  So your donations will not only be honored but made into a deep and personal connection between me and you, through travel, life, and music.   From there, all of us will have contributed to realizing the message of this music-and-travel experience: interconnectedness of all things in this world.

 

Risks & Challenges

It could be likely that we do not reach our goal.  If this happens, then in all honesty, I will find a way to get the album made into a finished product.  It will not have the intended impact, and the time frame for its release would lengthen significantly.  For example, when the campaign raises enough donated funds to pay only for the recording time, I would have to drain most of my savings to get the mixing and mastering done.  I wouldn't be able to pay my bandmates well at all, and PR and marketing (that includes CD printing for the press), and album artwork will have to wait for an indefinite period of time. 

The time is NOW to get this project done for my career; if I have to wait for two or three years, then my career will not benefit.  

Rest assured, all of the perks for your donations are about connecting you to the world, and I am more than happy to tell you about my world-travels in exchange for your generosity.  If the album takes longer than anticipated to release because of shortfalls in the fundraising, then at least you'll still have part of the overall experience through words and pictures.  The complete story--to be finished by the music--will eventually be finished.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please do share this campaign with travelers and creatives alike who you think will love the idea of a music-and-travel experience that brings the world something truly good!  

 

Special Thanks

Thank you to Bradley Davies in England for filming my performance in Greenwich, and thank you to Jason Lomeda in California for filming the majority of my campaign video.  Thank you also to Sandro Razciel for photographing my portrait.  

Jonathan Ward, Genevieve O'Driscoll, Ollie Davie, Jack Williams, and Adam Chinery initially brought this music to life, and I wish them all well.  Thanks so much.  And to my LA band, Zephyr Avalon, Matthew Smith, Jared Sachs, and Ryan Pryor: thanks so much for all your work in putting this music together.  This journey couldn't happen if it weren't for you all.

story:
Help Launch JJ and The Mystics' New Awakening Roots Record

Music is healing!  A force and echo of the spirit... 

I'm JJ Raschel, founder, Singer-Songwriter & Guitarist of JJ and The Mystics. Most of you may know us from our first album 'Golden Shore' - a blues rock reggae journey!  We've been fortunate to be making music for and with you guys for the last several years, and the time has come to take our next steps!

Since moving from my native home of New Mexico over into Texas, I've been blessed to partner with some really talented people.  I can't tell you guys how excited I am to bring new music to your ears!

The New Record

THIS NEW RECORD IS STRAIGHT FROM THE ROOTS... 

"MYSTIC ROOTS"

The music on this album is from the poetry and inspiration of so many experiences of struggle and perserverance in these crazy times we live in. It is a call to inspire those who know of a brighter way to rise up and take place as leaders, and warriors of peace, love and spirit! ONE LOVE!

The Ask

We're asking for your support to help make it happen!  As most of you know, the last 18 months has not been kind to the music industry.  We want to lift your spirits by getting a new record into your hands, but we'll need your help to make it happen.

The Perks

We've got some really cool perks available to choose as a token of gratitude for your support!  Check out the various packages we have on offer and choose the one that's the best fit for you.

From the bottom of our hearts, THANK YOU so much for your support.  We literally couldn't do this without you and can't wait to share new music with you soon!

Uplifting roots from the first album

story:
About me:

Hello everyone! My name is Lilli Worona and I am a singer-songwriter and multi instrumentalist based in Central Oregon.  I've been playing music since before grade school and have been lucky enough to play in a variety of different musical groups spanning genres from classical, to rock, to country.  Over the past ten years I have written quite a few original songs, some of which I have performed in local bands and others which I have kept mostly to myself and played only for close friends.  Very little of my original work has been recorded.  Until now!

For obvious reasons, this year has been very different from my usual routine.  I went from playing live almost every weekend to going months without performing.  In an effort to not lose my mind from the lack of music, I set out to revisit and perfect some of my original material that had been gathering dust.  What emerged was some new and improved original works and a unshakable drive to record my first ever original solo album.  This has long been a dream of mine, but has never come to fruition because of my busy performance schedule and work demands.  I've decided that 2021 will be the year to make my dream a reality.  My music is ready, my studio musicians are prepared; this indiegogo campaign is the last step towards creating my first ever full length solo studio album.

What your contribution will fund:

  • Recording and Production: A large portion of the money raised will go towards recording costs at Grange Recorders in Sisters, OR.  Your contribution will ensure that we have enough time to capture top notch performances from all musicians involved and to record a full length album.
  • Mixing and Mastering: All tracks will be mixed and mastered for the best sound experience possible.  This will guarantee a cohesive album for your listening pleasure.
  • CD printing and distribution:  I plan to print CDs and include the work of local artists and photographers in the CD jacket and booklet.   All backers of my campaign will receive a copy of the CD and it will be available for sale at my local performances as well.  Your contribution will allow me to get my CD manufactured by one of the top companies on the market, ensuring a high quality sound for the CD itself and a stunning presentation for the jacket and CD booklet.
  • Compensation for local studio musicians: I am incredibly blessed to have a solid crew of local musicians who are learning my original songs and adding amazing talent to this record.  Your contribution will help me compensate them fairly for their efforts.

Special Perks as a thank you for your contribution:

In exchange for your generosity, I've put together an exciting array of gifts that are available only through your participation in this campaign.  Perks increase with the amount of money donated.  These can be seen on the right side of your screen.  Of course, all contributors will receive access to the album once it is completed!

Other Ways You Can Help:

Can't contribute?  No worries!  You can help me get the word out by....

  • Sharing this page on social media
  • Telling your friends and family about it
  • Encouraging me to keep it up!

 

I am so appreciative for everyone's support, encouragement and love.  I have the best community out there!  Thank you so much for checking out my campaign page​, I can't wait to share my music with all of you.
