story:
Michael Brown. Trayvon Martin. Sandra Bland. Eric Garner. Tamir Rice. Freddie Gray. Atatiana Jefferson. Philando Castile. Breonna Taylor. Ahmaud Arbery. George Floyd.

"...guilty and innocent, your body is subject to invasion; you are not a citizen of a democracy but the subject of a carceral state."—from The Grey Land

Opera for centuries has told larger-than-life stories about humanity. With the senseless killing of those people above and the many more before and sadly to come, I wanted to tell a story that reflects their humanity and today's truth: the unrelenting systemic injustice black and brown communities endure, even during the upheaval of a worldwide pandemic.

My opera The Grey Land is a story of a Black mother trying to survive the reality in this land that doesn’t fully see her continued hope: that the great American experiment will one day become a belonging place where anyone can dream of “stillness and stars,” free from fear and want; a place where its beautiful promise of happiness, liberty, and life may yet manifest true to finally include her family too.

The Grey Land’s libretto explores those themes of humanity and identity through the intractable triumvirate of race, class, and power in American society. The opera integrates a variety of writings (from myself, Sonia Sotomayor, Frederick Douglass, the Mothers of the Movement, Isaac Butler, Paul Laurence Dunbar, and Carolyn Bryant Donham), as well as contemporary film and video footage, dance, and set and lighting designs, and dramatic elements. The Grey Land's score and non-traditional narrative access Black culture and music, embracing social and musical multitudes and dichotomies of "inside and outside, tradition and innovation.”

The Grey Land features soprano Rebecca Hargrove, narrator Kenneth Browning, and myself conducting my 28-musician chamber orchestra Numinous. The album was recorded by Ryan Streber at Oktaven Studios in Mount Vernon, NY, is edited by Grammy Award-winning engineer Mike Marciano of Systems Two Studios, mixed by Grammy Award-winning engineer Brian Montgomery, and produced by myself and Grammy Award nominated producer Oded Lev-Ari. The album will be released this Fall by the critically-acclaimed, Grammy Award-winning independent classical/new music label New Amsterdam Records.

Opera is an expensive endeavor and even more so as a classical/new music composer working without any institutional funding. This campaign seeks support to finish The Grey Land album's production for the November 2020 release. The support I seek represents only a percentage of the album’s actual costs. I recognize this is a time of financial adversity and struggle for many, including many of my musician and composer friends and colleagues. I hope, if you are able, you will consider supporting this project during these unprecedented times. Any amount of donation will be welcome and will help to bring to a world-wide audience The Grey Land’s story of Black resilience and resistance against systemic adversity and struggle.

 Thank you,

Joseph C Phillips Jr
story_txt: Michael Brown. Trayvon Martin. Sandra Bland. Eric Garner. Tamir Rice. Freddie Gray. Atatiana Jefferson. Philando Castile. Breonna Taylor. Ahmaud Arbery. George Floyd."...guilty and innocent, your body is subject to invasion; you are not a citizen of a democracy but the subject of a carceral state."—from The Grey LandOpera for centuries has told larger-than-life stories about humanity. With the senseless killing of those people above and the many more before and sadly to come, I wanted to tell a story that reflects their humanity and today's truth: the unrelenting systemic injustice black and brown communities endure, even during the upheaval of a worldwide pandemic.My opera The Grey Land is a story of a Black mother trying to survive the reality in this land that doesn’t fully see her continued hope: that the great American experiment will one day become a belonging place where anyone can dream of “stillness and stars,” free from fear and want; a place where its beautiful promise of happiness, liberty, and life may yet manifest true to finally include her family too.The Grey Land’s libretto explores those themes of humanity and identity through the intractable triumvirate of race, class, and power in American society. The opera integrates a variety of writings (from myself, Sonia Sotomayor, Frederick Douglass, the Mothers of the Movement, Isaac Butler, Paul Laurence Dunbar, and Carolyn Bryant Donham), as well as contemporary film and video footage, dance, and set and lighting designs, and dramatic elements. The Grey Land's score and non-traditional narrative access Black culture and music, embracing social and musical multitudes and dichotomies of "inside and outside, tradition and innovation.”The Grey Land features soprano Rebecca Hargrove, narrator Kenneth Browning, and myself conducting my 28-musician chamber orchestra Numinous. The album was recorded by Ryan Streber at Oktaven Studios in Mount Vernon, NY, is edited by Grammy Award-winning engineer Mike Marciano of Systems Two Studios, mixed by Grammy Award-winning engineer Brian Montgomery, and produced by myself and Grammy Award nominated producer Oded Lev-Ari. The album will be released this Fall by the critically-acclaimed, Grammy Award-winning independent classical/new music label New Amsterdam Records.Opera is an expensive endeavor and even more so as a classical/new music composer working without any institutional funding. This campaign seeks support to finish The Grey Land album's production for the November 2020 release. The support I seek represents only a percentage of the album’s actual costs. I recognize this is a time of financial adversity and struggle for many, including many of my musician and composer friends and colleagues. I hope, if you are able, you will consider supporting this project during these unprecedented times. Any amount of donation will be welcome and will help to bring to a world-wide audience The Grey Land’s story of Black resilience and resistance against systemic adversity and struggle. Thank you,Joseph C Phillips Jr

story:
PLEASE DO NOT POST COMMENTS/QUESTIONS ON INDIEGOGO.  Please send us an email:  lounge@richardcheese.com

==========================================

This crowdfunding campaign was successfully funded
on September 20, 2015!  Thanks to our loyal fans!!!
3 New CDs Will Be Released In December 2015!
We will email our contributors with details in October.

The crowdfunding campaign is now closed, but you can
order the new CDs and album downloads at
http://shop.richardcheese.com

==========================================

REMEMBER:
Be sure your IndieGoGo account email address and mailing address are CORRECT before you order!
For customer service,
please DO NOT use IndieGoGo comments/messaging.
Please send one email message to
lounge@richardcheese.com 

Address change?  Question?
Please send an email message to
lounge@richardcheese.com 


==========================================


HELP RICHARD CHEESE & LOUNGE AGAINST THE MACHINE
FUND 3 NEW CDs!!!

Yes, Richard Cheese is back in the studio and ready to produce THREE NEW ALBUMS of swankified hits for your lounging enjoyment!

  • "SUPERMASSIVE BLACK TUX" 
  • "THE LOUNGE AWAKENS" 
  • "LIVE AT THE BOULDER THEATER"

Pre-Order All 3 Digital Albums for just $19!
Or All 3 CDs for just $30!
OR PLEDGE MORE AND GET SWANKY PERKS!
***  Choose a perk from the list at right!  ***

  • The first all-new CD is titled "SUPERMASSIVE BLACK TUX" and will be released in November 2015!  This 16-track studio album features swingin' lounge versions of popular songs like "Can't Feel My Face," "Royals," "Hotel California," "Fancy," "Supermassive Black Hole," "Gangnam Style," "Sharp Dressed Man," "Yellow Ledbetter," "Shake It Off," "Watch Me Whip," and more!  

  • The second all-new CD is called "THE LOUNGE AWAKENS: RICHARD CHEESE LIVE AT THE MOS EISLEY SPACEPORT CANTINA," and will be released in December 2015 just in time for the new Star Wars movie!  Song list will be announced in November!

  • And the third new album is titled "BAKIN' AT THE BOULDER: RICHARD CHEESE LIVE AT THE BOULDER THEATER" and will be released in October 2015!  This fabulous live recording captures Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine on stage at their spectacular April 2015 show in Colorado.  Songs include "Too Drunk To Fuck," "Chop Suey," "Tonight We Are Young," "Smoke Two Joints," "Girls, Girls, Girls," "The Denver Airport Song," and many more!


You get all 3 digital album downloads for one swanky price, just $19.  Or, for $30 plus shipping, you get all 3 CDs plus the downloads!

We're also offering exclusive autographed CDs, prints, your name in the album thank you credits, your voice on an album, and other swingin' stuff! 


*** Choose a perk from the list at right!  ***


We'll be revealing the album covers and complete song lists soon!  We can't wait to share this new music with our swanky fans.

But we need 1,000 pre-orders to make these albums happen,
otherwise I have to sell my plasma,
and no one really wants vodka-infused plasma!!!

Funding deadline is September 20.  Please tell your friends about our CD fund-raising campaign with this link: 

http://igg.me/at/rc3

Let's Lounge Against The Machine together!  Thank you for your loyal support of Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine.


--RC


UPDATE 8/21/2015:  We have just added CDs to the campaign!  
To change your order from $19 digital albums to CDs, just sign-in to IndieGoGo, select My Contributions, click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk," and purchase the new $30 perk with the CDs.  This automatically cancels your previous contribution, which will be refunded  immediately.  Be sure you provide your CURRENT MAILING ADDRESS and make sure your email address works! 

Questions?  Send one email to lounge@richardcheese.com
PLEASE DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS/MESSAGES HERE ON INDIEGOGO.  For customer service, please send one email message to lounge@richardcheese.com

===============================


** FAQs **


What if my address changes before I receive my items?
Please be sure to notify us at lounge@richardcheese.com IF your shipping address changes.  Be sure your IndieGogo account's email address is correct so you can be contacted after funding is complete.  If you provide an incorrect shipping address, and your shipment is returned by the post office, you will be required to pay for the costs of re-shipping before we can re-ship your order.  



$33,000???  WTF??
Um, we're only trying to raise $29,000, dude.


$29,000???  WTF??
Well, the actual cost of recording just one album is $29,000.  So, releasing 3 new albums costs even more -- but we're only asking fans to fund 1/3 of our actual costs.  You're getting 2 extra albums free!  

Recording and releasing albums is expensive.  We have to pay for arranging, production, rehearsal space, studio time, engineers, equipment rental, royalties/licensing, artwork, editing, mixing, mastering, marketing, crowdfunding commissions, legal expenses, Paypal fees, manufacturing, order fulfillment, plus I pay our musicians fairly for their hard work and talent.  

Also, the money we're raising CREATES JOBS!  We DON'T just pocket it!!!!  Musicians, arrangers, engineers, graphic artists, recording studios, manufacturers,  and pornstars will get HIRED to work on our albums.  We are a small business; PLEASE help us help other small businesses!


WHY DO WE NEED OUR FANS TO HELP US?  
We are an indie band without major record label funding.  And, we're a cover band, so we don't make revenue from songwriting and we pay out substantial royalties to the original song artists.  We aren't able to tour extensively, we aren't rich, and we're not even that popular, either!  All of this comes out of my pocket.  I am only seeking enough money to continue making albums for YOU, our devoted and swanky fans.  Can you afford to help?  Please do.  

In the past, we've had about 425 people contribute to our CD funding campaigns.  Out of 118,000 Facebook fans, only 425 people were willing to put their money where their lounge is.  What we need is MORE fans to kick in and spread The Cheese and help us reach the funding goal.  It's up to YOU.  Thanks for your support and loyalty, and thank you for keeping lounge music alive.

===============================


** IMPORTANT NOTES **


PLEASE DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS/MESSAGES HERE ON INDIEGOGO.   For customer service, please send one email message to lounge@richardcheese.com

BE SURE YOUR INDIEGOGO ACCOUNT EMAIL ADDRESS AND MAILING ADDRESS ARE CORRECT BEFORE YOU ORDER.  Please include your full name and current email address in your order.  If you provide an incorrect delivery address, you will be charged for repeat shipping costs.  We will notify all contributors in October/November 2015 about delivery dates.

(C) Copyright 2000-2015 Richard Cheese.  Some restrictions apply.  All rights reserved.  Void where prohibited.   Parental Advisory, Explicit Content.  If you are under 18, you must get permission from your parents to participate.  Judges decisions are final.  The crow flies at midnight.  Offer terms, album titles, content, design, release and delivery schedules, item availability, and lunar cycles subject to change without notice.  Backers will be required to agree to anti-piracy pledge and other terms and conditions.  We reserve the right to refuse/refund contributions at our sole discretion.   Climate change is real.  Thank you.


*** PLEASE READ OUR UPDATES FOR ADDITIONAL OFFER DETAILS, RESTRICTIONS, AND OTHER B.S. ***


Please tell your friends about our fund-raising campaign with this link: 

http://igg.me/at/rc3


==========================================

** MORE FAQs **

Why only U.S. only?

Digital downloads are available worldwide.  But due to ridiculous postal fees, we can only ship merchandise items to U.S. addresses, no international or APO/FPO.  Sorry, mon frère!  If you do order from outside the U.S., the shipping cost is an additional $58!   That's what it costs us to ship internationally with tracking to ensure packages are delivered. 


Why no CDs?
*** UPDATE:  WE ARE RELEASING THE ALBUMS ON CD!!!!!!!  All 3 albums will be released on CDs, to be shipped in December 2015.  See the Perk section at right for offer details.
To change your order from digital albums to CDs, just sign-in to IndieGoGo, select "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk," and purchase the new $30 perk with the CDs.  This cancels your previous $19 contribution, which will be automatically refunded.  Be sure you provide your CURRENT MAILING ADDRESS and make sure your email address works! 


Yay! CDs! Yay!

Yay!  Please tell your friends about our fund-raising campaign with this link:  http://igg.me/at/rc3


What about vinyl?
Not gonna happen, duuuude.


What format are the digital download files?
The digital album downloads will be delivered to you with download codes through BandCamp.com, which offers downloads in MP3, MP3 320, FLAC, ALAC (Apple Lossless), AAC, or Ogg Vorbis.  I have no idea what the fuck any of that means.

Will you still release the 3 albums if you don't hit your funding goal?
We're not sure, let's hope we don't have to find out!  (We chose IndieGoGo's "flexible funding" option because that is the only way to accept payments via both credit cards and PayPal; however, the intent is that this is a "fixed funding" campaign.)  If we don't reach our funding goal, we still hope to release the 3 albums using other funding sources (bank loans, selling plasma, etc.).  If not, we will refund 100% all of the contributions.

Will these albums be family-friendly or do they have swears?
The "Live At The Boulder Theater" album is a filthy and offensive obscenity-filled fuckfest.  But the other two albums are family-friendly because we're trying to get our music into commercials and mainstream TV shows and they're a bunch of pussies.


Can I contribute more than the minimum pledge amount?
Yes. Just click on the "Pledge Amount" and enter the new amount.  Any donation or additional contribution payment above listed perk prices shall be designated as gift.  Please don't contribute unless you're super rich.  Want to modify your pledge? See "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk" instructions above.  Deadline is September 20!


Can I submit a different name to be listed in the credits or for an autograph?
Yes, we can accept your name or a friend's name or a business name.  We will contact all of our contributors in September/October to get the name info.  If you don't specify a name, autograph will be signed to the name on the order.  Names or business names in credits are subject to approval, at our sole discretion.  For autographs, first names only, no messages.  *** UPDATE:  The "Name In Credits" ($75) perk offer has been updated.  Name will be included in the digital booklets for all 3 albums, AND name will ALSO be printed inside the "Supermassive Black Tux" CD jacket!


Can I get an autographed copy of the digital download album?
Ha ha ha, very funny.    No.


How can I hire the Richard Cheese band for my corporate event or wedding?
Visit http://www.richardcheese.com and click "Hire The Band."  You can also check our tour schedule (LA 10/10, SF 10/16, DC 10/30, Vegas 11/13) and read more zany FAQs.


Was my comment deleted?
Please do not post any comments/messages on IndieGoGo.  Send us an email instead to lounge@richardcheese.com.


When will my credit card or PayPal account be charged?
Some payments are processed instantly, some take a few days.  Your statement will show payment to "COVERAGE RECORDS" or "LOUNGEMART" or "INDIEGOGO."  For technical support, visit www.indiegogo.com.


Where is the restroom?
Down the hall, second door on the left.


What if my address changes before I receive my items?
Please be sure to notify us at lounge@richardcheese.com IF your shipping address changes.  Be sure your IndieGogo account's email address is correct so you can be contacted after funding is complete.  If you provide an incorrect shipping address, and your shipment is returned by the post office, you will be required to pay for the costs of re-shipping before we can re-ship your order.  


What happened with those other crowd-funding campaigns?
My loyal fans have been very generous and supportive over the years, helping Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine raise money for four CDs, a book, several T-Shirts, and even to help pay my medical bills for corneal surgery!  You can review our previous crowd-funding campaigns in the Notes section of our Facebook page www.facebook.com/richardcheese.  If you have questions about a past contribution, just send an email to lounge@richardcheese.com with your transaction receipt.


When is your "Atlas Lounged" book finally coming out?
After many delays, due to the aforementioned corneal surgery and a few other medical setbacks, my "Atlas Lounged" autobiography book will finally be released in mid-2016.  For complete details, visit www.atlaslounged.com. 


After the IndieGoGo campaign ends, how can I get the albums/CDs?
You can order CDs and album downloads, while supplies last, at our fabulous webstore at http://shop.richardcheese.com 


REMEMBER:  Be sure your IndieGoGo account email address and mailing address are CORRECT before you order!  For customer service, please DO NOT use IndieGoGo comments/messaging.  Please send one email message to lounge@richardcheese.com

Thank you, goodnight!

Please tell your friends about our fund-raising campaign with this link: 
http://igg.me/at/rc3

story:
A Return To Live Music, With A Virtual Audience

The Norcal Noisefest is the longest running experimental music festival in North America. This Indiegogo campaign helps us to promote the festival and pay performers: half our total festival revenue goes to the artists. Your contribution keeps the Norcal Noisefest diverse, unique and growing. The perks include unique artwork and music, effects pedals & kits, and festival participation. Last year's festival was held entirely virtually, and we are incorporating the lessons from that experience into a combined festival that can be enjoyed in person (safely) and remotely!

Norcal Noisefest 2021 is the 25th annual Northern California Experimental Music Festival, a national gathering of noise musicians that takes place every year in Sacramento, California. This year's Noisefest is scheduled for October 1 through 3, with live performances on Friday October 1 and Saturday October 2 at Cafe Colonial, an all-virtual day on Sunday October 3, and pre-recorded and live virtual performances on all three days, including an all-online day on Sunday. We are seeking funds to promote the festival, pay performers, and subsidize the costs of the video equipment needed to share the live festival events online in real time. We're also taking the steps needed to have an in-person festival safely, with all possible precautions to ensure everyone's well-being and health.

Current Noisefest details can always be found at norcalnoisefest.com

Your Contribution Helps Spread the Noise!

  We are seeking a total of $1500 to promote the Noisefest and create an online festival experience that will help continue the festival and the community it has engendered.

  We are offering a wide variety of perks--including Noisefest membership packages and merchandise, one-of-a-kind artwork, music and experiences, effects pedals and kits, and even the chance to perform at the festival.

  Indiegogo campaign funds will be divided between marketing, performer payment, and livestreaming hardware. We pride ourselves on breaking even on the Fest--all profits beyond basic festival expenses goes to the bands. While performers do not have travel expenses this year, due to the remote festival, we want to support experimental music creators by providing at least some payment to all the performers who request it. The in-person elements of the festival will charge a cover, but the additional funding from this campaign will allow us to livestream the entire festival at no charge; we hope that people will contribute in order to support the increased overhead costs of livestreaming and provide payment to performers!

New Perks Highlight the History of the Noisefest

To celebrate the 25th Norcal Noisefest, we're producing a limited edition, 64 page book that covers the history of the Norcal Noisefest, from its beginnings in the mid-1990s through its revival in 2000 up to this year. It's available as one of our perks and we think it's going to be very popular! The book will include photos and stories from every festival, and some behind-the-scenes revelations from its organizers about how the festival came about, and how it has changed over the past quarter century.

We're also offering a brand new perk by our friends at the Library of Musiclandria: four hours of recording time at a dramatically reduced price!

Keep a Sacramento Noise Tradition Alive!

 The funding campaign for Norcal Noisefest 2020 was a huge success thanks to our Indiegogo supporters--we raised $2785 with a goal of $1500. After adding the revenue generated at the Noisefest, we spent $885.42 on promotion and paid performers $1796, with remaining funds used to pay the cost of creating shirts, masks, CDs, and other festival merchandise; due to the remote nature of the festival, we also spent more than $700 shipping perks and membership materials to supporters and participants. Despite the dramatic effects of the 2020 pandemic and transition to an online festival, Noisefest 2020 nearly broke even: we spent $75 more than we made in revenue!
story_txt: A Return To Live Music, With A Virtual AudienceThe Norcal Noisefest is the longest running experimental music festival in North America. This Indiegogo campaign helps us to promote the festival and pay performers: half our total festival revenue goes to the artists. Your contribution keeps the Norcal Noisefest diverse, unique and growing. The perks include unique artwork and music, effects pedals & kits, and festival participation. Last year's festival was held entirely virtually, and we are incorporating the lessons from that experience into a combined festival that can be enjoyed in person (safely) and remotely!Norcal Noisefest 2021 is the 25th annual Northern California Experimental Music Festival, a national gathering of noise musicians that takes place every year in Sacramento, California. This year's Noisefest is scheduled for October 1 through 3, with live performances on Friday October 1 and Saturday October 2 at Cafe Colonial, an all-virtual day on Sunday October 3, and pre-recorded and live virtual performances on all three days, including an all-online day on Sunday. We are seeking funds to promote the festival, pay performers, and subsidize the costs of the video equipment needed to share the live festival events online in real time. We're also taking the steps needed to have an in-person festival safely, with all possible precautions to ensure everyone's well-being and health.Current Noisefest details can always be found at norcalnoisefest.comYour Contribution Helps Spread the Noise!  We are seeking a total of $1500 to promote the Noisefest and create an online festival experience that will help continue the festival and the community it has engendered.  We are offering a wide variety of perks--including Noisefest membership packages and merchandise, one-of-a-kind artwork, music and experiences, effects pedals and kits, and even the chance to perform at the festival.  Indiegogo campaign funds will be divided between marketing, performer payment, and livestreaming hardware. story:
Metal greetings everyone!

We are PERSONA, a modern metal band founded in Tunisia, and since a year ago based in Hanover, Germany. After two full-length studio albums, one single, six music videos, and quite a number of live concerts, we felt we had to take some time off to rethink, and replan our future steps. The move to Germany was the biggest and most important step of all, which then resulted in line-up changes, and consequently in the change of our vision, and goals. Now we're back, more inspired than ever, and we invite you to participate in the next chapter of our story: OUR THIRD ALBUM! 


The Album

This time we're significantly raising the bar of the sound production and the songwriting process, taking the entire approach to a whole new level. While still following the route of an independent band, this time we have a professional music producer Marco Meyer on board. He's doing a fantastic job in helping us with the arrangements, composition, and production of this album, leading us the way to reaching our full potential. The result you can anticipate will be unique, profound, but at the same time powerful and fun songs, with lots of groove and addictive hooks. 'Alpha' as our first single illustrates one of the multifaceted expressions we're exploring in this album but fear not: all of you who are fans of melodious and clean vocals won't be disappointed either! 

 

What We Need

We are extremely proud of the songs that have been finalized so far, and we can't wait to finish the whole album and share it with you. But first, we are kindly asking for your support because to an independent band like ourselves that support truly means everything.  

We need your help with the expenses required to professionally produce and release a full-length album: 

  • Pre-production days & work with the producer
  • Recording, mixing & mastering
  • Artwork & booklet design
  • Promotion
     

€15.000 is our first goal and it's the amount needed for these necessary steps to be financed. We can assure you that the album will be released no matter what and we can guarantee the delivery of each perk.

€20.000 is our first stretch goal. If we reach that, we will be able to shoot an additional music video and produce a limited amount of VINYL pressed copies of the new album. If it happens during the campaign, we will make it available as a perk, too!

€25.000 is our second stretch goal. This will allow us to shoot one more music video, and to press our albums 'Elusive Reflections' & 'Metamorphosis' on VINYL as well! 


 

What You Get

If you support us by purchasing the album through our campaign: 

  • Your name will be in the booklet!
  • You will get a SIGNED hardcopy of our album!
  • You will get the digital copy of our album BEFORE THE RELEASE DATE!
     

There's also a variety of nice perks you can choose from, some of them with more personalized items like: 

  • Handwritten lyrics
  • Stage outfits
  • Virtual 'Meet & Greet' with the band
  • Jumpsuits used in "Alpha" music video
  • Online music lessons with band members


Here are the details and photos of some of the perks! 

Add-On Perks

With each perk that contains items to be shipped, you can choose an add-on perk at the check out: a signed photo of Jelena and/or a signed band photo!
 

Music Lesson

Have fun with Jelena, Melik, Yosri, Eike or Simon, during an online music lesson! Learn piano, voice, guitar, bass, or drums & have a blast with one of them for 45 min!

 
Drummer Collectibles

The highlight of this perk is a snare drum head and a pair of drumsticks, used in the 'Alpha' video shoot, and for the recording of the new album! Both the snare drum head and the drumsticks will be SIGNED by us!



Jelena's Handmade Designer Corset Top & Stage Skirt

Get your hands on Jelena's corset top and the unique fluffy skirt! These clothing items were Jelena's stage favorites for a long time. The black & white corset has been worn on stage & and in a photoshoot, the skirt as well, and it's been featured in 'Forgotten' music video! You will also get a signed & dedicated thank-you card from Jelena. Both items were a special order, handmade by the Serbian designer Katarina Vukovic. Corset size: S/M; Skirt size: S/M


Corset Top (ONLY 1 AVAILABLE!)


Stage Skirt (ONLY 1 AVAILABLE!)



Alpha Collectibles

Become the owner of 'Alpha' video shoot outfits! You will get a jumpsuit worn by Melik, Yosri, Eike, or Simon! Each jumpsuit comes with a satchel bag, and a piece of rope used in the video shoot, and will be SIGNED by all of us as well! As a bonus, there will be a SIGNED band photo taken on the day of the shoot in the original outfits!

Alpha Jumpsuits (ONLY 4 AVAILABLE!)


'Metamorphosis Backdrop' 

Get our only 'Metamorhosis' backdrop we made for our first ever EU tour in 2017! We can also sign it for you if you like! Dimensions: 200 x 300 cm.  

'Metamorphosis Backdrop' (ONLY 1 AVAILABLE!​)



Gold Concert Ticket

Get FREE entrance to 10 of our concerts, as a SPECIAL GUEST on our guest list! December 2021 is only the approximate delivery date, but the actual one will have to be adjusted according to the circumstances (Corona, YOUR possibility to attend), so there's NO expiration date!

ONLY 10 TICKETS AVAILABLE!​


Live Acoustic Private Online Concert

ONLY 3 AVAILABLE! We will play a private acoustic online concert, just for YOU! After approx. 1h of music, stay and hang out with us a bit - it would be our pleasure! We will plan the concert together with you after the campaign has ended. The experience will be similar to our acoustic concert in MusikZentrum, Hanover in April 2020: 
 



Melik's Guitar

Become the proud owner of Melik's Cort VX-4X guitar! This guitar has been used on stage, for the recording of our previous releases, and was featured in our music videos 'Alpha', 'Blinded', 'Forgotten' & 'Epilogue - The Final Deliverance'. The guitar will be SIGNED by all of PERSONA!

Specifications: 
- Cort VX-4X (Black & White)
- Mahogany Body
- Fingerboard: Setting 3-piece Maple / Rosewood
- 22 Jumbo Frets
- 2 x EMG-HZ H4 pickups
- Volume, Tone, 3-position pickup switch
 

Melik's Guitar (ONLY 1 AVAILABLE!)​

 

Release & Delivery 

The album release is approximately planned for May/June 2021 but we plan to release one more single before that. The official release date will be announced later.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute but you would still like to participate and help us, sharing and spreading the word is also an excellent way to do it!

 

We are truly grateful for your support, because knowing that you're excited about this release as much as we are, gives us extra motivation to work with even more passion and enthusiasm. THANK YOU for your participation! 

Much love, 
PERSONA


Photo credits: Katja Bo, Pascal Röttger, Seth Photography

story:
BIRKENSTOCKS

If we haven't met, my name is Naim and I am always making fun music-related projects. I am working on my next album "MadHappy". I just released my first single "HOLD TIGHT", my ode to everything I love. 

My next project is a video called BIRKENSTOCKS. I shot it already, (you can see a snippet of BIRKENSTOCKS at the end of the HOLD TIGHT video). The problem is BIRKENSTOCKS is entirely too plain. I need help getting the desired FX done to make BIRKENSTOCKS smash way harder when people first see it.

This is important to me because:

  • It is my first big project since I left the states
  • Its' packed  with real attitude and truth
  • Also, my first video hiring a professional FX artist 
  • This videos' impact as a group effort goes farther than I can take it alone.

 

What I Need & What You Get

The idea is simple, I just need to raise the cost of the video FX artist & a small ad $850:

  • I need $750 to secure the funding for the FX artist. Their work is here:  https://www.instagram.com/flash__films
  • I additionally want to run a small $100 ad campaign for the youtube video
  • If you contribute you will get to see the full BIRKENSTOCK video right now before the FX
  • You will also get Executive Producer credits or Actual Executive Producer Credits (ie. $ percentage of earnings)
  • If I don't reach my entire goal, I don't get any of the money
  • If I go over my goal, I will use the funds for the ad campaign and to hire a film crew for the next music video

The Impact

My message is very DIY. I love that about my brand. I would like to take this opportunity to step up the quality in approach for sake of the message:

  • My aim is to always inspire young creatives who look like me to believe in possibilities 
  • I was very happy with what I learned through my last Indiegogo, and how it connected me to my music family https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/relationrock...
  • You can be a part of something dope that could affect more people than just us

Risks & Challenges

  • There is no risk, but the challenge is always time. This will shorten the time required for me to accomplish a video worth sharing.
  • Without you, there is just me. "We" help me feel like there are believers in positivity out there. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this with your friends with money who are looking for to be a part of something cool or want some Executive Producer Credits

story:
We reached our funding goal!

If you still want to buy a shirt, visit http://shop.richardcheese.com !


Thank you for your support.  Shirts and other items shipped in September/October 2014.

Please check the email address you used for your IndieGoGo account.

DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  

Questions about your contribution?  Send us an email instead:  customerservice@loungemart.com 

Additional shirts are on sale now at http://shop.richardcheese.com


* * * * * * * * * * *

July 27, 2014

Dear Beloved Richard Cheese Fan:

Please buy my new $18 "UNITED WE LOUNGE" T-SHIRT and other stuff so I can afford to hire lawyers to sue the shady cheating jerkweasels who ripped me off!


See, there are these shady cheating jerkweasels who have stolen thousands of dollars from my Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine band.  I can't reveal all the details, but there was some shifty accounting, some breach of contract, some credit card fraud, and perhaps even some flight to avoid prosecution.   Let's just say shady cheating jerkweasels covers it.

I recently discovered that one of these showbiz swindlers ripped me off for $6,500, another company owes me $8,000, and another business stole $13,000 from me!  I am not good at math, but I think that's a total of $27,491!

Anyway, after much legal wrangling, my only option now is to take these personae mofos  (that is a Latin legal term) to court. 

Alas, I've already spent more than $6,000 of my savings pursuing these matters, and it's going to cost me at least   $20,000 MORE in court costs and auditor/legal fees!

The reason they stole from me is because they didn't think I would be able to afford to fight them.   They thought they could get away with it.

But   I'm   not   going   to   give   up.

And with your help, I won't have to.   United We Lounge!

So...


I am selling  ALL-NEW RICHARD CHEESE "UNITED WE LOUNGE" MARTINI FLAG T-SHIRTS  for just $18 each, to raise money to help pay for the litigation costs.

These new red-white-and-blue "United We Lounge" T-Shirts are 100% cotton, and they're available in Men's Sizes Small thru 5XL!  (Women's shirts are also available, email us for info.)   These swanky shirts are a perfect fit for the upcoming U.S. elections, too! 


These T-shirts will retail for $25, so order now to save big, just $18 each (plus shipping).   U.S. Only.*


With each "United We Lounge" T-Shirt, you'll also get a free Richard Cheese sticker, and some other free bonus items!   And the first 100 contributors will also receive a free Richard Cheese "Dick At Nite" CD with every shirt order!

Also...

If you contribute $66, I will personally autograph your T-Shirt to you! (U.S. Only!)

And, for $1500, I, Richard Cheese, will PERSONALLY DELIVER YOUR T-SHIRT TO YOU, ANYWHERE IN THE U.S.A.!!!  (U.S. Only!)

You can also contribute to get an eBook of my forthcoming "Atlas Lounged" book, get your name or photo printed in the book, get personally thanked on Twitter/Facebook, or get a personal singing birthday message from Richard Cheese on your birthday, shortie!


Why?

The reason I am asking for contributions is because, as you probably heard, I spent all my savings on medical bills over the last two years.  And, since I've been on the injured list, I haven't been able to bring in any income from performing/touring (we haven't done a show since July 2013).   So, I am asking my fans to buy some shirts so I can afford to fight these nefarious thieving pigdogs.

Once I resolve these disputes, and get this money back, I can afford to start working on a new Richard Cheese album!!!!!

I need $20K to pursue the litigation; I'm trying to raise $10K from this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign.  I just need to sell 400 T-Shirts ... please tell your fellow Richard Cheese fan friends, and share the  http://igg.me/at/unitedwelounge  link, so I can reach my funding goal.


Thanks! :)

I am grateful and lucky to have so many swanky fans, and I appreciate your loyalty.  Thank you very much for your generous support of my Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine band, my unrelenting pursuit of cold hard justice, and my ridiculous font sizes.


United We Lounge,

--RC, 7/27/2014
lounge@richardcheese.com

* * * * * * * * * * * 


IMPORTANT NOTES:

1)  DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  Send us an email instead:  customerservice@loungemart.com 


2) Shipments will be sent in September 2014.  Shirts ship to U.S. addresses only, sorry.  For non-U.S. fans, shirts can be purchased at http://shop.richardcheese.com, but postage cost is very expensive.


3)  Be sure your IndieGoGo account's email address and mailing address are CORRECT before you order.  We will contact all contributors after August 20.


4)  There is no 4.


5)  YES, you can still order shirts even after we've reached the $10,000 goal,while supplies last! http://shop.richardcheese.com


6)  Any additional contribution payment above listed perk prices shall be designated as gift.  Please don't contribute unless you're filthy rich.


(C) 2005, 2014 Richard Cheese.  All rights reserved.   Due to postal fees, we can ship to U.S. addresses only, no APO/FPO.   Some restrictions apply.   Void where prohibited.  Credit Card Statement will show payment to "LOUNGEMART" or "INDIEGOGO."  Delivery schedule, shirt design, and item availability subject to change.  All sales are final, no returns on clothing.  If you provide an incorrect address, you will be charged for repeat shipping/handling costs.  Any similarity between the aforementioned jerkweasels and actual jerkweasels is purely coincidental.


DO NOT POST QUESTIONS/COMMENTS ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.

For customer service or any questions/comments, please send one email message to: customerservice@loungemart.com

* * * * * * * * * * *

RICHARD CHEESE & LOUNGE AGAINST THE MACHINE

America's loudest lounge singer Richard Cheese performs swingin' Vegas versions of rock and rap songs, "swankifying" popular Top40 hits into retro vocal standards. Imagine Sinatra singing Radiohead, and you've got Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine. Since 2000, Cheese has released 15 albums and sold more than 200,000 CDs; his music is available on iTunes, in stores, and at http://shop.richardcheese.com .



FaceBook:  http://www.facebook.com/richardcheese 

Instagram:   @richardcheese

Twitter:   @richardcheese

Webstore:   http://shop.richardcheese.com
story_txt:
We reached our funding goal!If you still want to buy a shirt, visit http://shop.richardcheese.com !Thank you for your support.  Shirts and other items shipped in September/October 2014. Please check the email address you used for your IndieGoGo account.DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  Questions about your contribution?  Send us an email instead:  customerservice@loungemart.com Additional shirts are on sale now at http://shop.richardcheese.com* * * * * * * * * * *July 27, 2014Dear Beloved Richard Cheese Fan:Please buy my
new $18 "UNITED WE LOUNGE" T-SHIRT and other stuff so I can afford to hire lawyers
to sue the shady cheating jerkweasels who ripped me off!See, there are these shady cheating jerkweasels who have stolen thousands of dollars from my Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine band.  I can't reveal all the details, but there was some shifty accounting, some breach of contract, some credit card fraud, and perhaps even some flight to avoid prosecution.   Let's just say shady cheating jerkweasels covers it.I recently discovered that one of these showbiz swindlers ripped me off for $6,500, another company owes me $8,000, and another business stole $13,000 from me!  I am not good at math, but I think that's a total of $27,491!Anyway, after much legal wrangling, my only option now is to take these personae mofos  (that is a Latin legal term) to court. Alas, I've already spent more than $6,000 of my savings pursuing these matters, and it's going to cost me at least   $20,000 MORE in court costs and auditor/legal fees!The reason they stole from me is because they didn't think I would be able to afford to fight them.   They thought they could get away with it.But   I'm   not   going   to   give   up.And with your help, I won't have to.   United We Lounge!So...I am selling  ALL-NEW RICHARD CHEESE "UNITED WE LOUNGE" MARTINI FLAG T-SHIRTS  for just $18 each, to raise money to help pay for the litigation costs.These new red-white-and-blue "United We Lounge" T-Shirts are 100% cotton, and they're available in Men's Sizes Small thru 5XL!  (Women's shirts are also available, email us for info.)   These swanky shirts are a perfect fit for the upcoming U.S. elections, too! These T-shirts will retail for $25, so order now to save big, just $18 each (plus shipping).   U.S. Only.*With each "United We Lounge" T-Shirt, you'll also get a free Richard Cheese sticker, and some other free bonus items!   And the first 100 contributors will also receive a free Richard Cheese "Dick At Nite" CD with every shirt order!Also...

If you contribute $66, I will personally autograph your T-Shirt to you! (U.S. Only!)And, for $1500, I, Richard Cheese, will PERSONALLY DELIVER YOUR T-SHIRT TO YOU, ANYWHERE IN THE U.S.A.!!!  (U.S. Only!)You can also contribute to get an eBook of my forthcoming "Atlas Lounged" book, get your name or photo printed in the book, get personally thanked on Twitter/Facebook, or get a personal singing birthday message from Richard Cheese on your birthday, shortie!
Why?The reason I am asking for contributions is because, as you probably heard, I spent all my savings on medical bills over the last two years.  And, since I've been on the injured list, I haven't been able to bring in any income from performing/touring (we haven't done a show since July 2013).   So, I am asking my fans to buy some shirts so I can afford to fight these nefarious thieving pigdogs.Once I resolve these disputes, and get this money back, I can afford to start working on a new Richard Cheese album!!!!!I need $20K to pursue the litigation; I'm trying to raise $10K from this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign.  I just need to sell 400 T-Shirts ... please tell your fellow Richard Cheese fan friends, and share the  http://igg.me/at/unitedwelounge  link, so I can reach my funding goal.

Thanks! :)
I am grateful and lucky to have so many swanky fans, and I appreciate your loyalty.  Thank you very much for your generous support of my Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine band, my unrelenting pursuit of cold hard justice, and my ridiculous font sizes.

United We Lounge,--RC, 7/27/2014lounge@richardcheese.com
* * * * * * * * * * * 
IMPORTANT NOTES:
1)  DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  Send us an email instead:  customerservice@loungemart.com 2) Shipments will be sent in September 2014.  Shirts ship to U.S. addresses only, sorry.  For non-U.S. fans, shirts can be purchased at http://shop.richardcheese.com, but postage cost is very expensive.

3)  Be sure your IndieGoGo account's email address and mailing address are CORRECT before you order.  We will contact all contributors after August 20.

4)  There is no 4.5)  YES, you can still order shirts even after we've reached the $10,000 goal,while supplies last! http://shop.richardcheese.com
6)  Any additional contribution payment above listed perk prices shall be designated as gift.  Please don't contribute unless you're filthy rich.

(C) 2005, 2014 Richard Cheese.  All rights reserved.   Due to postal fees, we can ship to U.S. addresses only, no APO/FPO.   Some restrictions apply.   Void where prohibited.  Credit Card Statement will show payment to "LOUNGEMART" or "INDIEGOGO."  Delivery schedule, shirt design, and item availability subject to change.  All sales are final, no returns on clothing.  If you provide an incorrect address, you will be charged for repeat shipping/handling costs.  Any similarity between the aforementioned jerkweasels and actual jerkweasels is purely coincidental.DO NOT POST QUESTIONS/COMMENTS ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.
For customer service or any questions/comments, please send one email message to: customerservice@loungemart.com* * * * * * * * * * *

story:
Hello Friends!

It’s Dyanne and Jan of Potter’s Daughter, and we are starting TO RECORD OUR SECOND FULL LENGTH ALBUM!! We’re excited and ready! You have been the ones supporting us and appreciating our vision (THANK YOU!!!), so for the next 30 days, this will be the place where all of you who believe in, respect, and see our vision can support this dream and make it a reality!

Our new album will have nine-tracks; five vocal songs (two featuring beautiful and poignant lyrics by my dear friend, Ronda Dubiel)

and four instrumentals. We are arranging another movement of the Ginastera Piano Sonata, (same Sonata as Movement IV from The Blind Side), and are also arranging an awesome atonal piece composed by my dear friend and renowned composer/conductor/soprano, Julia Schwartz. (www.juliaschwartz.ch)

 

 

 

AND, the crazy talented artist, Armand Cabrera,  will be creating ORIGINAL ART for the cover of the vinyl and CD!! Please check him out at www.armandcabrera.com!! Armand's artwork is represented in galleries throughout the USA. 

We feel it is the right time to do this now, despite Covid, so we can maintain momentum created by our features in Prog Magazine this past December and the ensuing publicity.

We know we have asked you for your help many times in the past, and we want you to know we are truly grateful for your willingness to lend us a hand. And now, we are asking you to help us again, this time, with our crowdfunding campaign to raise funds for our new album.

This crowdfunding features a very special “Scholarship” section. We are thrilled that the amazingly talented young artists, Parker Dubiel

  and Greyson Krisanda,   

have generously offered several original pieces from their portfolios to our campaign. Since they both are hoping to attend college this coming fall (to major in Art!), we have decided that the majority of the profits from the sale of their artwork during our campaign will go directly to them. This way, pledgers have the opportunity to support these extremely talented young artists as well as Potter’s Daughter!

This will be Potter’s Daughter’s third crowdfunding campaign since we began in January 2018 (we crowdfunded The Blind Side and Blood and Water). In between, we have privately funded everything we have released, and all the related expenses. We have learned so much each time, the biggest lesson being that we absolutely CANNOT do this alone. Crowdfunding is SO demanding, not just in time but emotionally as well. It’s not easy to ask your friends to give you money.

But now, especially since Covid, there are few other avenues available for independent artists to raise funds. Record companies have long ago stopped funding recording for all but the biggest and most successful artists. So, we hope that despite the difficulties we all have faced this past year, you will still be willing to share even just a small amount in exchange for some new music and some saucy rewards!

The costs of recording, producing, manufacturing, and marketing music are, well, high. Here’s how it looks: (without any provision for Jan and I)

Rehearsal + 2 days recording for one amazing Drummer (to be announced!) + travel expenses and accommodations  $2800

3 days recording (2 with drummer, 1 overdubs) at SI Studios in Old Forge (YAY, TOM AND WIGGY!!!) $2000

That’s where we came up with the goal of $4800. If we should exceed the goal, it will be used for recording the vocals, mixing, mastering, manufacturing, and marketing! Lots of m’s!!

Along with the fantastic artwork, we are also thrilled to share with you exclusive recordings only for this campaign! We have piano renditions of the beautiful piece, Catherine, by Tom Kelly, and are also offering a never before released piano rendition of the Moody Blues classic, Nights in White Satin! And if you really love piano music, we are offering a never before released ALBUM of piano renditions, featuring Catherine, Nights in White Satin, plus never before released original piano compositions which we arranged for The Blind Side!

And lastly, we have some CRAZY AMAZING opportunities for those of you who are interested and able to afford a little more……?

These two gorgeous oil paintings by Armand Cabrera, "Cosmic Dancer" and "Morningstar" are being offered for sale RIGHT NOW through this campaign!

 

I know you are going to LOVE this new music, it is our BEST so far!!! So please, pick one of our many rewards and become part of the story!! Even if you can’t contribute, that’s ok, there are other ways to help us! Like, help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!!! You can also SHARE this campaign by using the Indiegogo Share tools!!!

Thanks again to all of you!!!!

Peace, Love, and Sunshine

Dyanne and Jan

story:
Help Richard Cheese Pay Legal Bills Because Jerks!

 

 

[DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  USE EMAIL.]

====================

 

 

====================

 

====================

Thanks to everyone who contributed!!!
This IndieGogo campaign has concluded.
We will contact all contributors by April 7.
If you'd still like to buy a T-shirt,
please visit http://shop.richardcheese.com

====================

 

====================

 

 

====================

 

Please buy a new Richard Cheese T-Shirt and some RARE  Richard Cheese Souvenirs so I can afford to pay my legal bills and take on the RatJerks who ripped off me and my band!!
 
 

Contribute Here:

http://igg.me/at/FightRatJerks

FUNDING DEADLINE IS MARCH 18!
 

 

Dear Beloved Richard Cheese Fans:

 

As you may recall, in 2014, my loyal fans generously bought $10,580 worth of Richard Cheese "United We Lounge" T-Shirts to help me pay for some legal action against a variety of shady cheating jerkweasels who had swindled me and my band.

Last year, I took four of those jerkweasels to small claims court and mediation -- and I won!  Justice prevailed in every case and I actually got some of my money back!!!

However, two of the other  RatJerks are being ratjerky, and now I am forced to kick it up to some next level biznass for realz with judges and depositions and gavels and shit.

 

I have a great team of attorneys -- they wrote that last sentence -- and they are confident that I will win this fight.  But, the cost of this litigation is going to be at least another $20,000 for attorney fees, court filings, and other legal expenses.

 

I've already spent $35,000  of my own money pursuing these  RatJerks.  They thought I would give up and let it go, but I'm in it to win it.

I'm  going  to  keep  fighting.  

 

If you want to join the fight, I am selling ALL-NEW RICHARD CHEESE  "LIFE, LIBERTY, AND THE PURSUIT OF SWANKINESS" MARTINI FLAG T-SHIRTS for just $19 each, to raise money to help pay for the litigation costs.

 

 

These new red-white-and-blue on black T-Shirts are 100% cotton, printed in the U.S.A, and they're available in Men's and Women's Sizes.  These snazzy shirts are a perfect fit for the upcoming U.S. elections, too! 

 

 

I am also selling some RARE RICHARD CHEESE COLLECTIBLE SOUVENIRS, including exclusive and out-of-print posters, sheet music charts, original CD artwork, my original lounge microphone, and my one-of-a-kind tiger-striped tux jacket!!!  See pics below!

 

 

*** Choose a perk from the list at right!  ***

 

 

 

I need $20K to fund the fight; I'm trying to raise at least $10K from this Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign.  

 

 

I just need to sell 400 T-Shirts ... please tell your fellow Richard Cheese fan friends, and share the http://igg.me/at/FightRatJerks link!

 

 

 

I am grateful and lucky to have so many swanky fans, and I sincerely appreciate your loyalty and your generous support of Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine.  

I thank you, my musicians thank you, and my ridiculous 

  font sizes   

 

 

 

thank you.

 

 

United We Lounge,

--RC, 3/8/2016
lounge@richardcheese.com

 

P.S. If you have questions, please email me personally at lounge@richardcheese.com and be sure you use the same email address you use on your IndieGoGo account.

 

 

FUNDING DEADLINE IS MARCH 18!

 

 

 

 

==========================================

 

IMPORTANT NOTES / FAQs:

 

 

1)  DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  Send us a direct email instead:  lounge@richardcheese.com


2)  We will contact all contributors by April 7 to get shirt sizes from you.  Be sure your IndieGoGo account's email address and mailing address are CORRECT before you order.

 

3)  Shipments will be sent in May/June 2016.  Items ship to U.S. addresses.  For non-U.S. fans, shipping charge is very expensive, due to international postal regulations and the costly price of tracked shipments.
 

4)  There is no 4.


5)  Any donation or additional contribution payment above listed perk prices shall be designated as gift.  Please don't contribute unless you're filthy rich.  Want to modify your pledge?  See "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk" instructions in your IndieGoGo account.  


6)  Autographed Items:  We will contact contributors and ask you to specify the name you want the autograph signed to by Richard Cheese.  First names only, no messages.  If you don't respond with a name, autograph will be signed to the first name on the order. 


7)  Song Lyric Sheets:  Available songs include most titles from the "Supermassive Black Tux," "The Lounge Awakens," and "Back In Black Tie" albums.  Lyric sheets are for personal use only and may not be copied, reproduced, published, distributed, or otherwise exploited.  Contributors may request specific lyric sheets on a first come, first served basis.  After crowdfunding campaign ends, we will send a list to buyers to get your top 5 choices.

 

8)  Lounge Arrangement Charts:   Here are the 14 song arrangement bass charts available.  Some charts are one page, some charts are multiple pages.  Charts are for personal use only and may not be copied, reproduced, published, distributed, or otherwise exploited.  Contributors may request specific song charts on a first come, first served basis.   After crowdfunding campaign ends, we will contact buyers to get your top 5 choices from this list:  CHOP SUEY, SMACK MY BITCH UP, RAPE ME, GIN AND JUICE, CLOSER, BABY GOT BACK, SMOKE TWO JOINTS, HEY YA, MATERIAL GIRL, USED TO LOVE HER, HOLIDAY IN CAMBODIA, ARE YOU GONNA BE MY GIRL, ME SO HORNY, DOWN WITH THE SICKNESS.

 

9)  YES, you will be able to order T-Shirts even after the crowdfunding campaign ends, but the price will be higher.  Offer valid while supplies last.  Our webstore is http://shop.richardcheese.com . 

 

*** PLEASE READ OUR UPDATES FOR ADDITIONAL OFFER DETAILS, RESTRICTIONS, AND OTHER B.S. ***

 

 

DO NOT POST QUESTIONS/COMMENTS ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.

 

 

For customer service or any questions/comments, please send one email message to:   lounge@richardcheese.com

 

 

** FAQs **

 

What if my address changes before I receive my items?

 

Please be sure to notify us at lounge@richardcheese.com IF your shipping address changes.  Be sure your IndieGogo account's email address is correct so you can be contacted after funding is complete.  If you provide an incorrect shipping address, and your shipment is returned by the post office, you will be required to pay for the costs of re-shipping before we can re-ship your order.  

 

 

 

Why do I keep asking my fans for money?

 

We are an indie band without major record label funding.  And, we're a cover band, so we don't make revenue from songwriting and we pay out substantial royalties to the original song artists.   Everything comes out of my pocket.  We aren't rich, and we're not even that popular, either!  Touring isn't very profitable for us, and we don't sell a lot of CDs/albums due to music piracy.   So, when we face financial challenges like these lawsuits, we have to ask our fans to support our band by buying more merchandise.  Thanks to you, we can keep lounging against the machine.

 

 

Who are the "Rat Jerks" and the "JerkWeasels"?

For obvious reasons, I'm not able to name names or discuss the matters publicly, but let's just say there have been some unauthorized uses of Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine recordings, some financial mismanagement, some credit card fraud, some flight from prosecution, and a facemask penalty.

 

What happened with those other crowd-funding campaigns?

 

My loyal fans have been very generous and supportive over the years, helping Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine raise money for seven CDs, a book, several T-Shirts, and even to help pay my medical bills for corneal surgery!  You can review our previous crowd-funding campaigns in the Notes section of our Facebook page www.facebook.com/richardcheese.  If you have questions about a past contribution, just send an email to lounge@richardcheese.com with your transaction receipt.

 

When is your "Atlas Lounged" book going to be done?

After many delays and setbacks, including TWO  corneal surgeries and a few other medical procedures, my "Atlas Lounged" autobiography book will finally be finished in 2016.  For complete details, visit www.atlaslounged.com. 

 

Where is the restroom?

Down the hall, second door on the left.

 

 

 

RICHARD CHEESE & LOUNGE AGAINST THE MACHINE

America's loudest lounge singer Richard Cheese performs swingin' Vegas versions of rock and rap songs, "swankifying" popular Top40 hits into retro vocal standards. Imagine Sinatra singing Radiohead, and you've got Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine. Since 2000, Cheese has released 20 albums and sold more than 200,000 CDs; his music is available on iTunes, in stores, and at http://shop.richardcheese.com .

FaceBook:  http://www.facebook.com/richardcheese 

Instagram:   @richardcheese

Twitter:   @richardcheese

Webstore:  http://shop.richardcheese.com

 

 

 

 


Thanks for Litigating Against The Machine! :)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
==========================================
 
(C) 2005, 2016 Richard Cheese.  All rights reserved.   Due to postal fees, we can ship to U.S. addresses only, no APO/FPO.   Some restrictions apply.   All rights reserved.  Void where prohibited.   Parental Advisory, Explicit Content.  If you are under 18, you must get permission from your parents to participate.  All payments/refunds transacted via PayPal.  Offer terms, content, design, delivery schedules, item availability, and lunar cycles subject to change without notice.  Judges decisions are final.  The pigeon is in the coop.  Credit Card Statement will show payment to "LOUNGEMART" or "INDIEGOGO."  Delivery schedule, shirt design, and item availability subject to change.  All sales are final, no returns on clothing.  We reserve the right to refuse/refund contributions at our sole discretion.  If you provide an incorrect address, you will be charged for repeat shipping/handling costs.
Any similarity between the aforementioned ratjerks and
actual ratjerks is purely coincidental. 

FUNDING DEADLINE IS MARCH 18!

If you have questions, please email me personally at lounge@richardcheese.com and be sure you use the same email address you use on your IndieGoGo account.  FUNDING DEADLINE IS MARCH 18!    ========================================== IMPORTANT NOTES / FAQs:  1)  DO *NOT* POST ANY COMMENTS HERE ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  Send us a direct email instead:  lounge@richardcheese.com
2)  We will contact all contributors by April 7 to get shirt sizes from you.  Be sure your IndieGoGo account's email address and mailing address are CORRECT before you order.
 
3)  Shipments will be sent in May/June 2016.  Items ship to U.S. addresses.  For non-U.S. fans, shipping charge is very expensive, due to international postal regulations and the costly price of tracked shipments.
 4)  There is no 4.5)  Any donation or additional contribution payment above listed perk prices shall be designated as gift.  Please don't contribute unless you're filthy rich.  Want to modify your pledge?  See "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk" instructions in your IndieGoGo account.  6)  Autographed Items:  We will contact contributors and ask you to specify the name you want the autograph signed to by Richard Cheese.  First names only, no messages.  If you don't respond with a name, autograph will be signed to the first name on the order. 7)  Song Lyric Sheets:  Available songs include most titles from the "Supermassive Black Tux," "The Lounge Awakens," and "Back In Black Tie" albums.  Lyric sheets are for personal use only and may not be copied, reproduced, published, distributed, or otherwise exploited.  Contributors may request specific lyric sheets on a first come, first served basis.  After crowdfunding campaign ends, we will send a list to buyers to get your top 5 choices. 8)  Lounge Arrangement Charts:   Here are the 14 song arrangement bass charts available.  Some charts are one page, some charts are multiple pages.  Charts are for personal use only and may not be copied, reproduced, published, distributed, or otherwise exploited.  Contributors may request specific song charts on a first come, first served basis.   After crowdfunding campaign ends, we will contact buyers to get your top 5 choices from this list:  CHOP SUEY, SMACK MY BITCH UP, RAPE ME, GIN AND JUICE, CLOSER, BABY GOT BACK, SMOKE TWO JOINTS, HEY YA, MATERIAL GIRL, USED TO LOVE HER, HOLIDAY IN CAMBODIA, ARE YOU GONNA BE MY GIRL, ME SO HORNY, DOWN WITH THE SICKNESS. 9)  YES, you will be able to order T-Shirts even after the crowdfunding campaign ends, but the price will be higher.  Offer valid while supplies last.  Our webstore is http://shop.richardcheese.com .  *** PLEASE READ OUR UPDATES FOR ADDITIONAL OFFER DETAILS, RESTRICTIONS, AND OTHER B.S. ***  DO NOT POST QUESTIONS/COMMENTS ON INDIEGOGO, PLEASE.  For customer service or any questions/comments, please send one email message to:   lounge@richardcheese.com  ** FAQs ** What if my address changes before I receive my items? Please be sure to notify us at lounge@richardcheese.com IF your shipping address changes.  Be sure your IndieGogo account's email address is correct so you can be contacted after funding is complete.  If you provide an incorrect shipping address, and your shipment is returned by the post office, you will be required to pay for the costs of re-shipping before we can re-ship your order.     Why do I keep asking my fans for money? We are an indie band without major record label funding.  And, we're a cover band, so we don't make revenue from songwriting and we pay out substantial royalties to the original song artists.   Everything comes out of my pocket.  We aren't rich, and we're not even that popular, either!  Touring isn't very profitable for us, and we don't sell a lot of CDs/albums due to music piracy.   So, when we face financial challenges like these lawsuits, we have to ask our fans to support our band by buying more merchandise.  Thanks to you, we can keep lounging against the machine.  Who are the "Rat Jerks" and the "JerkWeasels"?For obvious reasons, I'm not able to name names or discuss the matters publicly, but let's just say there have been some unauthorized uses of Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine recordings, some financial mismanagement, some credit card fraud, some flight from prosecution, and a facemask penalty. What happened with those other crowd-funding campaigns? My loyal fans have been very generous and supportive over the years, helping Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine raise money for seven CDs, a book, several T-Shirts, and even to help pay my medical bills for corneal surgery!  You can review our previous crowd-funding campaigns in the Notes section of our Facebook page www.facebook.com/richardcheese.  If you have questions about a past contribution, just send an email to lounge@richardcheese.com with your transaction receipt. When is your "Atlas Lounged" book going to be done?After many delays and setbacks, including TWO  corneal surgeries and a few other medical procedures, my "Atlas Lounged" autobiography book will finally be finished in 2016.  For complete details, visit www.atlaslounged.com. 
 
Where is the restroom?
Down the hall, second door on the left.
   RICHARD CHEESE & LOUNGE AGAINST THE MACHINEAmerica's loudest lounge singer Richard Cheese performs swingin' Vegas versions of rock and rap songs, "swankifying" popular Top40 hits into retro vocal standards. Imagine Sinatra singing Radiohead, and you've got Richard Cheese & Lounge Against The Machine. Since 2000, Cheese has released 20 albums and sold more than 200,000 CDs; his music is available on iTunes, in stores, and at http://shop.richardcheese.com .FaceBook:  http://www.facebook.com/richardcheese Instagram:   @richardcheeseTwitter:   @richardcheeseWebstore:  http://shop.richardcheese.com    
Thanks for Litigating Against The Machine! :)

story:
'To Connect And Inspire Songwriters Over 50'

That's the mission.

There is no age limit to enjoying music, as the audience, performer, songwriter or producer.

​And there is no age limit to quality.

This movement exists to:

  • Connect songwriters over age 50 to a supportive community
  • Inspire them to bring out their best work yet
  • Encourage them to share their music
  • Prove that talent has no age limit

 

 

Our Problem

We are a powerful community with over 1500 members across the UK, but our main point of contact is the facebook group.

The group has too many posts every day, and that means that not all of them get seen. It's a disorganised community space, hard to search for relevant topics, and some people end up posting all the time, while others don't post at all because facebook's algorithm does't show their beautiful songs to many people.

It's also hard to moderate, and some members post about irrelevant topics, which clog up our feeds and dampen our experience.

All told, it's a chaotic space!

 

The Solution

To build and host our own fully professional membership site that have free, standard and premium membership levels:

Free tier:

  • Access to fb group
  • Access to monthly masterclasses via facebook group
  • Access to monthly songwriting challenges via facebook group
  • Invites to TisT member events
  • Access to annual competition

£3 (discounted price here) - £5 per month:

  • ‘Educated Entry’ video lesson series
  • Regular masterclasses broadcast with a clear link
  • Members forums on all and any topics
  • A dedicated #GAOSSNL page per month
  • The monthly competition
  • And voting on the monthly competition
  • Clear monthly/annual calendar
  • Access to a co-writer generator for those that want to mix it up
  • Access to assigned online TisT group (online folk club style)
  • Access to local TisT groups (when they are going in the real world)
  • Automated monthly member feature lottery
  • Discounts/free passes to real world member events

£20 (discounted price here) - £30 per month:

  • All standard member benefits, and:
  • Submission to TisT playlist
  • Access to monthly songwriting workshop (via zoom)

I will also assign a number of 'hardship places' for people who would like to be part of the community but can't afford the fee.

 

I am asking you to help me build the custom membership platform by pre-purchasing your membership here for either:

£36 - Standard annual membership

£200 - Premium annual membership

£400 - Premium plus one annual membership for you and one other (of your choice or charitably donated)

£600 - Lifetime premium membership (only 10 available)

£1000 - Sponsor member (max 5 places, sponsoring us for the year 21-22)

The main difference between the premium and standard membership is that the premium membership comes with access to a free one day a month online songwriting workshop to help keep our creativity going all the year round.

By purchasing the membership here you not only get a discount on the price once it's launched, but you'll know you helped create it!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

I have everything ready to build this, the content, the web designer, the plan, and most importantly, 1500 people who would like to join! But I need help raising the initial cost of creating the platform, so I thought a fun way to fund it would be to crowdfund it from the members here on indiegogo, giving you a chance to get in as a founder member, get a discount on what will be the membership costs, and the opportunity to secure either:

  • Lifetime membership - 'Access All Areas Pass' for life. That means, free events, masterclasses, monthly songwriting workshops and more. Forever.
  • Premium membership - Monthly online songwriting workshop, free events and masterclasses, and all other member privileges
  • Standard membership - Access to the members platform with the monthly competition, forums, your own online and real world TisT group, and access to the masterclasses.

 

Crowdfunding Goals

At £1600, I can build the platform in August and launch it in September - October 2021.

At £4000, I can take on a part time staff member to manage the content allowing it to be run more professionally and to create more opportunities for members by reaching out to press, engaging the media and creating real world events.

If we raise £10,000, I can invest in making this community bigger and dedicate more of my time to it. I can run the competition again next year, open it in the USA & EU, and run a free members only event.

 

Did you know that only a third of people who entered the competition donated?

Did you know that thus far, the entire community is run on volunteers?

And as wonderful as that is, it can't stay that way forever. But thankfully it doesn't need to. With a little input from enough people we can create a powerful community membership platform and continue to spread the joy of songwriting and to connect people across the UK.

 

The Impact

After the 'Talent Is Timeless' competition I was left with a community of songwriters bursting with new inspiration.

I couldn't just close the project and leave everyone disappointed! They were thirsting for more.

So I've dedicated the majority of my time this year to running the Talent Is Timeless online community, entirely for free.

As things pick up I not only need to invest in building a custom membership site to make Talent Is Timeless a better platform, but in order to dedicate my time to it, I need to turn it into something that runs with a small budget, month to month, year to year, for running costs of all the tech, some staff fees for people who work on TisT projects, and to give us some resources for putting on events and creating education and performance opportunities for members to develop their craft, connect with each other and get their music heard.

By supporting this indiegogo campaign you are not only helping this platform be built, but you are helping real people in the UK and eventually across the world to tap in to that creative energy that drives us, and to connect with other people who feel it too.

As the founder and leader of this project, I am dedicated to sharing with you the best that the music industry has to offer, and that means: Interviews with celebrities and songwriters, masterclasses with various professionals on honing our craft, giving you trusted contacts of mine to help develop your reach, and creating spaces where you can meet each other and pool your wisdom and experience.

 

The Vision

If we're really going to do this, let's do it right.

Each year this community gets bigger and bigger, but that won't dilute the experience because I'm structuring it so that everyone has their close group of members that entered the same time they did, and their own group feedback sessions online and in person, as well as access to the entire community.

I also see this platform as something people can take and use to make their own. If you want to host a local TisT group - be my guest! The more the merrier, especially when it comes to any creative community.

I will grow this community internationally too, so people from around the world age 50 and over can come together and experience the benefit of being connected to each other and inspired to make music. It will also give our co-writer generator an international twist so we can choose to co-write with local or global members to foster a wider community for those that want it.

Each year as we get more and more members we attract bigger and better celebrity judges, bigger sponsors, and better opportunities for the winner, runners up, monthly winners and members in general. Do you think we can get Dylan as a judge? Tom Jones? Paul McCartney? It's not as far off as you might think.

Some other future ideas:

  • A festival
  • A studio session lottery
  • A playlist for members songs
  • Tour facilitation - where members can help each other to find venues in their local areas for the performing songwriters in the groups

And I will always stay open to feedback for how people can get the most out of the community.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Yes, we need money to develop the platform, but that's not the only way you can help. You can also

  • Share this campaign on social media/email
  • And tell me any great ideas you have for developing this community!

And that's all there is to it.

Let's make this amazing.

Love,

Saskia
